scn NVDLC04BladeOfTheWestKnockdownScript
ref myself ref mytarget
Begin ScriptEffectStart
If myself.hasperk Stonewall != 1 set myself to GetSelf set mytarget to GetCombatTarget mytarget.pushactoraway myself 10 Else ShowMessage StonewallMessage EndIf
End

Scn NVDLC04Road01MMBossCampRavAttackTriggerSCRIPT
; Forces an EVP on a Marked Men upon crossing its associated trigger.
; J.S. 7/19/11
Short bDoOnce Short bRavAttack Float fTimer
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter NVDLC04Road01BossCampMM03REF
If (bDoOnce != 1) ; If not triggered yet, Set bRavAttack to 1; ; This var is checked in the mm's AI packages. NVDLC04Road01BossCampMM03REF.EVP; ; Make the marked man snap out of its regular AI. Set bDoOnce to 1; ; Set the doonce var to 1 then disable the trigger volume. Disable; Return; Endif
END

scn NVDLC04BigHornerKnockdownScript
; This script restores proper big horner functionality for DLC04 that was broken in DLC03. ; CES 07/11/11
ref myself ref mytarget
short rnd
Begin ScriptEffectStart
set rnd to GetRandomPercent
if rnd <= 20 set mytarget to GetCombatTarget
If mytarget.hasperk stonewall != 1 set myself to GetSelf myself.pushactoraway mytarget 12 Else ShowMessage StonewallMessage EndIf endif
End

scn NVDLC04TunnelerKnockdownSCRIPT
; This script controls the knockdown effect on the hulking tunnelers. While doing this, I also fixed the stonewall perk to work properly here. ; CES 07/06/11 ; CES 7/11/11 - Fixed wonkiness with knockback.
ref myself ref mytarget
short rnd
Begin ScriptEffectStart
set rnd to GetRandomPercent
if rnd <= 30 set mytarget to GetCombatTarget
If mytarget.hasperk stonewall != 1 set myself to GetSelf myself.pushactoraway mytarget 12 Else ShowMessage StonewallMessage EndIf endif
End

scn NVDLC04BowieKnifeUniqueSCRIPT
; This script controls the special effects used on the unique bowie knife ; CES 6/27/11 ; J.S. 7/20/11 - Added OnSell block, to prevent the actor effect from remaining if players sell the weapon while having it equipped.
Short bEquipped
BEGIN OnSell Player
Player.RemoveSpell NVDLC04BowieKnifeUniqueAE; Set bEquipped to 0;
END
BEGIN GameMode
If bEquipped == 0 If (Player.GetEquipped NVDLC04WeapBowieKnifeUnique == 1) Player.AddSpell NVDLC04BowieKnifeUniqueAE; Set bEquipped to 1; EndIf Else If (Player.GetEquipped NVDLC04WeapBowieKnifeUnique == 0) Player.RemoveSpell NVDLC04BowieKnifeUniqueAE; Set bEquipped to 0; EndIf EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04CamaraderETimerEffectSCRIPT
; Timer to control ED-E's hourly item crafting ; TLS 05/31/2011
BEGIN ScriptEffectFinish
Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQuest.bCamaraderEHourlyEnergyCells to 0;
END

ScriptName NVDLC04RadiationHealTriggerSCRIPT
; This script handles the radiation healing marked men since radiation doesn't function on NPCs. ; CES 05/20/2011 ; CES 06/23/2011 - Updated to use food so we're not using AddSpell which adds the effect to the base object.
Short bInitOnce; ;Runs the initialize script only once. Reference rActor; ;Blah
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter
Set rActor to GetActionRef;
If ( rActor.GetInFaction NVDLC04MarkedMenFaction == 1 )
If ( rActor.IsSpellTarget NVDLC04RadHealFood== 0 )
rActor.CIOS NVDLC04RadHealFood;
EndIf
EndIf
END
BEGIN OnTriggerLeave
Set rActor to GetActionRef;
If ( rActor.IsSpellTarget NVDLC04RadHealFood== 1 )
rActor.Dispel NVDLC04RadHealFood;
EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Road01MMRushEVPTriggerSCRIPT
; Script that makes two marked men in the Laser Detonator ambush re-evaluate their AI when crossing the associated trigger. ; J.S. 5/17/11
Short bOne Short bTwo
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter NVDLC04Road01MMCamp01Rush03REF
If (bOne == 0) NVDLC04Road01MMCamp01Rush03REF.EVP; Set bOne to 1; Endif
END
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter NVDLC04Road01MMCamp01Rush04REF
If (bTwo == 0) NVDLC04Road01MMCamp01Rush04REF.EVP; Set bTwo to 1; Endif
END

scn NVDLC04SunstoneWave2TriggerSCRIPT
; Spawns 2 more tunnelers - initially disabled to prevent mass assault on player when he first arrives. ; JSH 05/13/11
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
NVDLC04SunstoneWave2Parent.Enable; Disable;
END

scn NVDLC04Road02OverpassDeathclawSCRIPT
; Makes the Deathclaw run out of sight. ; JSH 05/09/11
Short bRunAndHide; ; 1 = Deathclaw is retreating.
BEGIN OnHit Player
If ( bRunAndHide == 0 ) AddScriptPackage NVDLC04Road02OverpassDeathclawTravel; Set bRunAndHide to 1; EndIf
END
BEGIN OnStartCombat Player
If ( bRunAndHide == 0 ) AddScriptPackage NVDLC04Road02OverpassDeathclawTravel; Set bRunAndHide to 1; EndIf
END

Scn NVDLC04Road01LaserDetonatorActivatorSCRIPT
; This script adds the usable Laser Detonator to the Player's inventory, and removes its activator object from the world.
; J.S. 5/5/11
Short bDoOnce
BEGIN OnActivate
If (bDoOnce == 0) If (IsActionRef Player == 1) Player.AddItemHealthPercent NVDLC04WeapSonicDetonator 1 0.99; Set bDoOnce to 1; Disable; MarkForDelete; Endif Endif
END

SCN NVDLC04DivideMarkedMenStealthBoySCRIPT
;Has the marked man throw a grenade at the player. ;Copied over the script from NVDLC04MarkedMenTemplateSCRIPT for OnDeath. ;DM 5/5/11 ; CES 07/13/11 - Updated to not use kill actor to prevent a possible crash with NPCs dying twice.
SHORT DoOnce; ;Only add the stealthboy package once.
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDistance Player <= 1280) && (DoOnce == 0) AddScriptPackage NVDLC04TempleMarkedMenStealthBoy; Set DoOnce to 1; EndIf
END
BEGIN OnDeath
If ( IsKiller Player == 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04EDEREF== 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04UlyssesREF == 0 ) ;KillActor Player 0; If (Player.GetLevel > 30) RewardXP 100; Else RewardXP 50; EndIf EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04DivideMarkedMenGrenadeSCRIPT
;Has the marked man throw a grenade at the player. ;Copied over the script from NVDLC04MarkedMenTemplateSCRIPT for OnDeath. ;DM 5/5/11 ; CES 07/13/11 - Updated to not use kill actor to prevent a possible crash with NPCs dying twice.
SHORT DoOnce; ;Only add the grenade package once.
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDistance Player <= 1280) && (DoOnce == 0) AddScriptPackage NVDLC04TempleMarkedMenThrowGrenade; Set DoOnce to 1; ElseIf (GetDistance Player > 1280) Set DoOnce to 0; EndIf
END
BEGIN OnDeath
If ( IsKiller Player == 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04EDEREF== 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04UlyssesREF == 0 ) ;KillActor Player 0; If (Player.GetLevel > 30) RewardXP 100; Else RewardXP 50; EndIf EndIf
END

scn NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollOnAddSCRIPT
BEGIN OnAdd Player
If ( NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bFirstPickedUp == 0 ) Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bFirstPickedUp to 1; ShowMessage NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKitMSG; Endif
Player.AddItem NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKit 1 RemoveMe
END

SCN NVDLC04AutoSaveTriggerSCRIPT
;Autosaves ;DM 4/14/11 ; JSH 05/16/11 - Modified to run once.
Short bDoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If ( bDoOnce == 0 ) Autosave; Set bDoOnce to 1; EndIf
END

Scn NVDLC04Silo01MainframeLeverSCRIPT
; Script that handles activation states of the lever activator tied to the Mainframe EDE terminal in Silo01. ; J.S. 4/14/11.
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = Lever has been used, and remains in its final position thereafter. Int nState ; 0 = Lever is in off position); 1 = Lever is ready to be used; 2 = Lever has been used. ; these states correspond to the following animation groups on the lever: SpecialIdle, SpecialIdle, and Forward.
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) If (bDoOnce == 0) If (nState == 0) ShowMessage NVDLC04EDELeverOffMSG; Elseif (nState == 1)
Elseif (nState == 2) ShowMessage NVDLC04EDELeverOnMSG; Endif Endif Endif
END

scn NVDLC04MarkedMenTemplateSCRIPT
; Rewards XP to the player if creature/NPC died from a warhead explosion. ; JSH 04/13/11 ; CES 07/13/11 - Updated to not use kill actor to prevent a possible crash with NPCs dying twice.
BEGIN OnDeath
If ( IsKiller Player == 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04EDEREF== 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04UlyssesREF == 0 ) ;KillActor Player 0; If (Player.GetLevel > 30) RewardXP 100; Else RewardXP 50; EndIf EndIf
END

scn NVDLC04CrDeathClaw01SCRIPT
; Rewards XP to the player if creature/NPC died from a warhead explosion. ; JSH 04/13/11
BEGIN OnDeath
If ( IsKiller Player == 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04EDEREF== 0 ) && ( IsKiller NVDLC04UlyssesREF == 0 ) KillActor Player 0; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04RALPHIEPosterTriggerSCRIPT
; Script to increment RALPHIE poster challenge. ; TLS 04/12/2011 ; TLS 04/15/2011 - Added scripting for ED-E to fly to player and beep excitedly. ; CES 06/03/2011 - Updated script to work with activator posters instead of triggers.
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) IncrementScriptedChallenge NVDLC04ChallengeRALPHIE; NVDLC04EDEREF.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04EDEMoveToPlayerPoster; SetDestroyed 1; EndIf
END

; Script used to display a message whenever the Rushing Water ingestible is in effect. ; Also adds a hidden perk (first time only) that controls increased attack speed/aiming functionality. ; ETB 4/11/11

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn NVDLC04PostDLCExplosionTriggerSCRIPT
; This script controls the post DLC explosions at the nuke sites. ; CES 4/11/11
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (GetStage NVDLC04MQ03b == 30) || (GetStage NVDLC04MQ04 == 20) ;Check variable to see which Nuke we should show. ;If (NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 1) ; ;NCR got Nuked ; NVDLC04Long15NukeExplosionREF.PlayGroup Forward 1; ;ElseIf (NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 1) ; ;Caesar's Legion got Nuked ; NVDLC04LegionNukeExplosionREF.PlayGroup Forward 1; ;ElseIf (NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 1) ;Everybody got Nuked NVDLC04LegionNukeExplosionREF.PlayGroup Forward 1; NVDLC04Long15NukeExplosionREF.PlayGroup Forward 1; ShowWarning "Nuked" ;EndIf ApplyImageSpaceModifier MegatonNukeISFX;
;Disable; EndIf
END

scn NVDLC04PortableSleepMenuSCRIPT
; Script created for "Ingestible" bedroll "NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKit" to allow the Player to call the Sleep Menu from an inventory item (bedroll). ; ETB 04/09/11 ; TLS 04/29/2011 - Added scripting to prevent bedroll from working in combat ; TLS 05/20/2011 - Removing combat conditional check in preparation for new flag on ShowSleepMenu. ; CES 6/30/11 - Wrapped the message pop-up to check for the pipboy so it only appears if the pipboy is open.
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
Player.AddItem NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKit 1 1; ; Puts the bedroll back into the Player's inventory w/o a display message. Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bPause to 0; Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bLetsSleep to 1; ; Calls the Sleep Menu from "NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKitSCRIPT". If (MenuMode 1) ShowMessage NVDLC04RoughinItClosePipBoyMSG; ; Tells the Player they must close the Pip-Boy before they can start sleeping. EndIf
END

scn NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKitSCRIPT
; Displays a message box (NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKitMSG) the first time the Player picks up a "Roughin' It Bedroll Kit" (NVDLC04RoughInItBedrollKit). ; ETB 04/09/11 ; CES 05/23/11 - Added in extra parameter to line 24 to make sure it works like all other beds. ; CES 08/02/11 - Set bedroll to not work in Lucky38, Fort, and Greenhouses.
BEGIN OnAdd Player
If ( NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bFirstPickedUp == 0 ) Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bFirstPickedUp to 1; ShowMessage NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKitMSG; Endif
END; onadd player
BEGIN GameMode
; Roughin' It! item (NVDLC04RoughinItBedrollKit) ; ETB 04/09/11 If ( NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bLetsSleep == 1 && NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bPause >= 30 ) If ( Player.IsInInterior != 1 ) && (Player.GetInWorldSpace Lucky38World == 0) && (Player.GetInWorldSpace TheFortWorld == 0) && (Player.GetInWorldSpace GreenhouseWorld01 == 0) ShowSleepWaitMenu 1 1; ; 0 = Wait Menu, 1 = Sleep Menu Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bLetsSleep to 0; Else ShowMessage NVDLC04RoughinItOutsideOnlyMSG; Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bLetsSleep to 0; Endif Else Set NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bPause to ( NVDLC04GenericPerkQUEST.bPause + 1 ); Return; Endif
END; gamemode

Scn NVDLC04Silo01WelcomeDoorTriggerSCRIPT
; This script resides on a trigger volume. It's used to open the first door in Silo01, when players get close enough for it to have a creepy effect.
; J.S. 4/8/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The scene's been kickstarted. Short bStart ; 1 = The GameMode block will do its thing. This is set on the TriggerEnter event.
Int nCount ; Operational integer. Float fTimer ; Timer float.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If the volume is entered by player, we'll start the scene's sequence. Set bDoOnce to 1; Set bStart to 1; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDisabled != 1) ; If the trigger is not disabled. If (bStart == 1) ; If the volume has been entered by player. If (nCount == 0) If (fTimer >= 0.3) ; We run a small timer NVDLC04Silo01WelcomeDoorREF.SetOpenState 1; ; The door opens. Set nCount to 1; Disable; ; We disable the trigger, which will mark it for deletion in the next frame. Return; Else Set fTimer to (fTimer + GetSecondsPassed); Endif Endif Endif Else MarkForDelete; ; Whenever the volume is disabled, here, or elsewhere, this part of the code will mark it for deletion. Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04Silo02DoorSwapCodeholderSCRIPT
; This codebox script enables the doors from Road02 to Silo02, and disables the doors that lead into the elevator lift level. ; We do this to avoid complex retraversing, as the lift sequence is a unique piece of work that does not lend itself to replay.
; J.S. 4/8/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The swap has taken place. Int nCount ; Operational variable.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player ; This TriggerEnter block allows us to disable the doors without having to wait for players to be in Silo02 (where GameMode runs). We can call the event from elsewhere.
If (bDoOnce == 0) NVDLC04Silo2DoorREFDUPLICATE000.Disable; ; We disable Road02's door to the elevator lift. NVDLC04Silo02StartDoorREF.Disable; ; Disable Silo02's door to the elevator lift. NVDLC04Road02ToSilo02DoorREF.Enable; ; Enable Road02's door to Silo02. NVDLC04Silo02ToRoad02DoorREF.Enable; ; Enable Silo02's door to Road02. Set bDoOnce to 1; Disable; ; Disable the codebox, and mark it for deletion. MarkForDelete; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode ; This is the default mode under which the doors will be swapped - unless we call the triggerenter event at a different place (quest, other area's GameMode, etc).
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If we haven't swapped the doors yet. If (nCount == 0) NVDLC04Silo2DoorREFDUPLICATE000.Disable; ; We disable Road02's door to the elevator lift. NVDLC04Silo02StartDoorREF.Disable; ; Disable Silo02's door to the elevator lift. Set nCount to 1; Return; Elseif (nCount == 1) NVDLC04Road02ToSilo02DoorREF.Enable; ; Enable Road02's door to Silo02. NVDLC04Silo02ToRoad02DoorREF.Enable; ; Enable Silo02's door to Road02. Set nCount to 2; Return; Elseif (nCount == 2) Set bDoOnce to 1; Set nCount to 0; Disable; ; Disable the codebox, and mark it for deletion. MarkForDelete; Endif Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04WasteDisposalTrigger2
; Enables NVDLC04SLWasteDisposalTriggerRef1 ; R.Z. 04/06/2011
Short nDoOnce ; 1 = NVDLC04SLWasteDisposalTriggerRef1 in NVDLC04SLWasteDisposal has been enabled.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (nDoOnce == 0)
NVDLC04SLWasteDisposalTriggerRef1.Enable; ; We enable NVDLC04SLWasteDisposalTriggerRef1
Set nDoOnce to 1; ; We mark doonce as complete, then disable, and mark for deletion, the trigger volume. Return;
EndIf
END

Scn NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRefTrigger
; Enables NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef 1-4 upon crossing its associated trigger. ; R.Z. 04/06/2011
Short nDoOnce ; ; 1 = NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef1 in NVDLC04SLWasteDisposal has been enabled.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
PlaySound NVDLC04NPCTunnelerScream;
If (nDoOnce == 0); NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef1.Enable; ; We enable NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef1 NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef2.Enable; ; We enable NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef2 NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef3.Enable; ; We enable NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef3 NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef4.Enable; ; We enable NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef4
Set nDoOnce to 1; ; We mark doonce as complete, then disable, and mark for deletion, the trigger volume. Return;
EndIf
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (nDoOnce == 1) NVDLC04TunnelerLVLWasteRef1.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04DivideSLWasteDisposalTunnelerScarePackage; Set nDoOnce to 2; Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf
END

ScriptName NVDLC04DialogueUlyssesSCRIPT
; Script to hold variables NVDLC04 Ulysses's dialogue. ; CFA 04/06/2011 ; CFA 04/07/2011 - Added variables in for checking the cut-scene stages for when Ulysses breaks in on radio. ; CFA 04/10/2011 - Added variables for checking to see which "Courier Duster" is granted at the end game. ; CFA 04/10/2011 - Added variable for accessing Ulysses camp after asking once. ; CFA 04/10/2011 - Make sure that Ulysses gives the scavenged items only once every 3 days. ; CFA 04/12/2011 - Deleted script check for cutting Ulysses' transmission (didn't feel right). ; CFA 04/15/2011 - Make sure that Ulysses gives recipe advice only once every 3 days and also checking to see if player asked about Hopeville. ; CFA 04/17/2011 - Added "vow" flag for speech characters to keep questioning Ulysses on the promise not to kill each other. ; CFA 04/17/2011 - Check to see if player asked the Ulysses about the logs he left. ; CFA 07/06/2011 - Exclusion boolean for the Primm question in dialogue 3 (different prompts, need to insure none of them can be repeated after one is chosen). ; CFA 07/11/2011 - Exclusion boolean for asking about House on High Road (diff. prompts, need to insure they can't be repeated). ; CFA 07/27/2011 - Exclusion boolean for cutting off asking about Caesar's death once you've said it once (since you potentially can get both "killed" and "died on operating table" if Surgery = 4). ; CFA 07/27/2011 - Exclusion boolean for goodbye nodes, post DLC. ; CFA 07/28/2011 - Adding tracking variables for holotape check on Sunstone Tower to see if you've listened to them all or not (to give PC hints to listen to them for final convo).
Short nFaction; ; 0 = Nothing, 1 = Ulysses believes PC is allied with NCR from opening convo, 2 = Legion, 3 = House. Short nRadioCutScene; ; 0 = None, 1 = This is 1st Cut Scene, 2 = This is 2nd Cut Scene (High Road), This is 3rd Cut Scene (Divide, 1st Glimpse), This is 4th Cut Scene (Abaddon). Used to help track some ED-E variables. Short nDuster; ; 0 = "21", 1 = NCR, 2 = Bull, 3 = Old World Duster. Short bCamp; ; 0 = Player hasn't asked yet, 1 = Player asked, knows that Ulysses has a campfire. Short bGiveTech; ; 0 = Player can ask about tech, 1 = Player received tech (usually rockets and more than Ulysses has given). Short bHistoryLog; ; 0 = Player didn't hear the log, 1 = Heard the log where Ulysses asked the lords of the Big Empty the question, "Who are you, who do not know your history?" Short bWhiteLegsLog; ; 0 = Player didn't hear the log, 1 = Heard the logs where Ulysses talked about the White Legs and their change. Float fTechDays; ; Tracks days since Ulysses gave scavenged items to the player. Float fRecipeDays; ; Tracks days since Ulysses gave new recipes to the player. After getting the tourniquets, this should switch off. Float bGiveRecipe; ; 0 = Player can get new recipes, 1 = Can't, been within the 3 day window. Float bHopeville; ; 0 = Player hasn't asked about Hopeville, 1 = Has, opens up repeating "give scavenged tech option. Float bVow; ; 0 = Player doesn't realize Ulysses made a promise to Caesar not to kill another Courier, 1 = Knows. Float bAskLog; ; 0 = Player hasn't asked about logs, 1 = Has. Short bPrimmCS3 ; 0 = Player hasn't asked about Primm yet, 1 = Has. Short bHouseCS2 ; 0 = Player hasn't asked about House yet, 1 = Has. Short bCaesarDead ; 0 = Player hasn't talked about Caesar yet, 1 = Has. Short bGoodbye ; 0 = Player hasn't gone through the first goodbye chain where Lanius is mentioned, 1 = He has. Short bListenBigMT1Holotape ; 0 = Player hasn't listened to holotape, 1 = Has Short bListenBigMT2Holotape ; 0 = Player hasn't listened to holotape, 1 = Has Short bListenWL1Holotape ; 0 = Player hasn't listened to White Legs 1 holotape, 1 = Has Short bListenWL2Holotape ; 0 = Player hasn't listened to White Legs 2 holotape, 1 = Has
BEGIN GameMode If ( bGiveTech == 1 ) && ( ( GameDaysPassed - fTechDays ) >= 3 ) Set bGiveTech To 0; EndIf If ( bGiveRecipe == 1 ) && ( ( GameDaysPassed - fRecipeDays ) >= 3 ) Set bGiveRecipe To 0; EndIf END

scn NVDLC04UlyssesKnockdownScript
; While equipped with the flagpole, Ulysses can knockdown his target. ; JSH 03/18/11
Short nRandom; ; A randomly generated percentage chance.
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
Set nRandom to GetRandomPercent;
If ( nRandom <= 10 ) && ( NVDLC04UlyssesREF.GetCombatTarget == Player )
If ( Player.HasPerk Stonewall == 0 ) NVDLC04UlyssesREF.PushActorAway Player 5; Else ShowMessage StonewallMessage; Endif
EndIf
END

Scn NVDLC04TunnelSoundScare03TriggerSCRIPT
; This script resides on a trigger volume. It's used to kickstart one of the scenes handled in NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT.
; J.S. 3/16/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The scene's been kickstarted. Short bStart ; 1 = The GameMode block will do its thing. This is set on the TriggerEnter event.
Float fTimer ; Timer float.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If Players cross the trigger for the first time. PlaySound AMBRMetalScrape; ; We play a creepy sound. Set NVDLC04TunnelBox.bPopScare to 1; ; And trigger the codebox with NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT to run the second tunneler scene (scene 2, where tunneler pops out, and depends on bPopScare being 1). Set bDoOnce to 1; Set bStart to 1; Return; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDisabled != 1) ; If the trigger is not disabled. If (bStart == 1) ; If the volume has been entered by player. If (fTimer >= 1) ; We run a small timer (1 sec), after which EDE barks one of his scared lines. If (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat != 1) ; If EDE's not in combat. If (GetRandomPercent <= 20) NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; ; We make EDE bark a scared line. Endif Disable; ; We disable this trigger, and it will be marked for deletion, below. Endif Else Set fTimer to (fTimer + GetSecondsPassed); Endif Endif Else ; Whenever the volume is disabled, here, or elsewhere, this part of the code will mark it for deletion. MarkForDelete; Endif
END

SCN NVDLC04TempleMaintenanceDoorSCRIPT
; Script to display "This door is opened elsewhere" message until Temple doors unlock. ; TLS 03/16/2011
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) && (GetLocked >= 1) ShowMessage GenericDoorActivatedElsewhereMsg; Else Activate; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Silo01MaintenanceDoorSCRIPT
; Script to display "This door is opened elsewhere" message if door is unlocked. ; TLS 03/16/2011
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) && (GetLocked >= 1) ShowMessage GenericDoorActivatedElsewhereMsg; Else Activate; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Silo01MainExitDoorSCRIPT
; Shows "This door is activated elsewhere" message if door is still locked. ; TLS 03/16/2011
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) && (NVDLC04Silo01Box.bEDEMainframeActivated == 0) ShowMessage GenericDoorActivatedElsewhereMsg; ElseIf (IsActionRef Player == 1) && (NVDLC04Silo01Box.bEDEMainframeActivated == 1) Activate; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04MQ03aSCRIPT
; Script to complete Rescue ED-E optional objective when all robots are dead. ; TLS 03/15/2011 ; TLS 03/16/2011 - Added completion of disable Eyebots objective. ; TLS 03/17/2011 - ED-E Faction cleanup to prevent his guards from shooting him in the face a bunch. ; TLS 04/07/2011 - Moving Free ED-E scripting to when the player actually frees him. ; JSH 05/24/2011 - Added a check so non-combat PCs have an easier time when the final battle starts.
Short bCheckPlayer; ; Check player's combat ability.
BEGIN GameMode
If ((UlyssesBattleCodebox.bEyebotDisabledL02 == 1) || (UlyssesBattleCodebox.bEyebotTurnedL02 == 1)) && ((UlyssesBattleCodebox.bEyebotDisabledR01== 1) || (UlyssesBattleCodebox.bEyebotTurnedR01== 1)) && (GetObjectiveCompleted NVDLC04MQ03a 40 == 0) SetObjectiveCompleted NVDLC04MQ03a 40 1; EndIf
; JSH 05/24/11 - Spawn weak enemies if player doesn't have any great combat skills. If ( bCheckPlayer == 0 )
If ( GetObjectiveDisplayed NVDLC04MQ03a 35 == 1 ) || ( GetObjectiveDisplayed NVDLC04MQ03a 40 == 1 )
If ( Player.GetActorValue EnergyWeapons < 75 ) && ( Player.GetActorValue Explosives < 75 ) && ( Player.GetActorValue Guns < 75 ) && ( Player.GetActorValue MeleeWeapons < 75 ) && ( Player.GetActorValue Unarmed < 75 ) Set UlyssesBattleCodebox.bWeakPlayer to 1; EndIf
Set bCheckPlayer to 1;
EndIf
EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04EDEAudioLog02TriggerSCRIPT
; Force greet trigger for ED-E Audio Log 02. ; TLS 03/15/2011 ; TLS 03/17/2011 - Added teleport for bulletproofing ; TLS 03/25/2011 - Added conditional for later replays. ; TLS 04/06/2011 - Replaced MoveToMarkerWithFade with MoveTo, as the former seems to prevent dialogue firing right. ; TLS 05/31/2011 - Removing ED-E waiting check. ; TLS 07/26/2011 - Reduced teleport distance.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) Set NVDLC04DialogueEDE.nAudioLog02 to 1; If (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetDistance Player > 500) NVDLC04EDEREF.MoveTo NVDLC04EDELog02MarkerREF; NVDLC04EDEREF.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04EDELog02PACKAGE; Else NVDLC04EDEREF.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04EDELog02PACKAGE; EndIf Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04MQ01SCRIPT
; Completes warhead detonation objective for MQ01 ; TLS 03/15/2011
BEGIN GameMode
If (NVDLC04Road01CampBarrierWarhead01REF.GetDisabled == 1) && (GetStage NVDLC04MQ01 < 15) SetStage NVDLC04MQ01 15; EndIf
END

Scn NVDLC04TunnelSoundScare02TriggerSCRIPT
; This script resides on a trigger volume. It's used to kickstart one of the scenes handled in NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT.
; J.S. 3/11/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The scene's been kickstarted. Short bStart ; 1 = The GameMode block will do its thing. This is set on the TriggerEnter event.
Float fTimer ; Timer float.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If Players cross the trigger for the first time. PlaySound NPCSporeCarrierHissVox; ; We play a creepy sound. Set NVDLC04TunnelBox.bEmergeScare to 1; ; And trigger the codebox with NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT to run its third scene (2, which depends on bEmergeScare being 1). Set bDoOnce to 1; Set bStart to 1; Return; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDisabled != 1) ; If the trigger is not disabled.
If (bStart == 1) ; If the volume has been entered by player. If (fTimer >= 2) ; We run a small timer (2 secs), after which EDE barks one of his scared lines. If (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat != 1) ; If EDE's not in combat. NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; ; We make EDE bark a scared line. Disable; ; We disable this trigger, and it will be marked for deletion, below. Endif Else Set fTimer to (fTimer + GetSecondsPassed); Endif Endif Else MarkForDelete; ; Whenever the volume is disabled, here, or elsewhere, this part of the code will mark it for deletion. Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04TunnelFinaleTriggerSCRIPT
; This script resides on a trigger volume. It's used to kickstart one of the scenes handled in NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT.
; J.S. 3/11/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The scene's been kickstarted. Short bStart ; 1 = The GameMode block will do its thing. This is set on the TriggerEnter event.
Float fTimer ; Timer float.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If Players cross the trigger for the first time. PlaySound NPCSporeCarrierHissVox; ; We play a creepy sound. Set NVDLC04TunnelBox.bFinale to 1; ; And trigger the codebox with NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT to run its last two scenes (4, and 5, which depend on bFinale being 1). Set bDoOnce to 1; Set bStart to 1; Return; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDisabled != 1) ; If the trigger is not disabled. If (bStart == 1) ; If the volume has been entered by player. If (fTimer >= 2) ; We run a small timer (2 secs), after which EDE barks one of his scared lines. If (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat != 1) ; If EDE's not in combat. NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; ; We make EDE bark a scared line. Disable; ; We disable this trigger, and it will be marked for deletion, below. Endif Else Set fTimer to (fTimer + GetSecondsPassed); Endif Endif Else ; Whenever the volume is disabled, here, or elsewhere, this part of the code will mark it for deletion. MarkForDelete; Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04TunnelTunnelerScareTriggerSCRIPT
; This trigger volume script handles several actions. Primarily, it makes the intro scene deathclaw run to its death when crossing the trigger. It also makes a tunneler spawn when players cross the trigger, or get close enough to the disabled tunneler.
; J.S. 3/11/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The scene's been kickstarted. Short bStart ; 1 = The GameMode block will do its thing. This is set on the TriggerEnter event.
Int nCount ; Operational variable.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter NVDLC04TunnelMoleRat01REF ; If the deathclaw crosses this trigger.
If (NVDLC04TunnelBox.bRunPackage != 1) ; If the scripted scene's codebox has not yet registered that this deathclaw must change to a "run" package. NVDLC04TunnelMoleRat01REF.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04PackageTunnelMoleRat01PatrolToDeath02; ; We give the deathclaw this run package. Set NVDLC04TunnelBox.bRunPackage to 1; ; And update the variable in the codebox. Endif
END
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If Players cross the trigger for the first time. If (bStart == 0) ; If the tunneler hasn't been enabled yet. ;NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF.Enable; ; We enable the tunneler. Set bStart to 1; ; And tell the GameMode block to run its course. Return; Endif Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If we haven't finished doing stuff with the tunneler. If (bStart == 1) ; If the player hasn't crossed the trigger, and it's close enough to the tunneler, we don't wait for a TriggerEnter event. If (Player.GetDistance NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF <= 1600) ; We check for 768 units, and enable the tunneler, making it play a sound. If (NVDLC04TunnelMoleRat01REF.GetDead == 1) If (NVDLC04TunnelBox.nScene <= 1) NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF.Enable; NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF.PlaySound NPCGiantRatIdleSniffsP2; Set bStart to 2; ; We set this var to 1, as if players had triggered the event normally. Return; Endif Endif Endif Elseif (bStart == 2) If (nCount == 0) ; When the tunneler is close to its first nav point, EDE barks a scared line. If (NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF.GetDistance NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01Point01REF <= 128) NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; Set nCount to 1; Return; Endif Elseif (nCount == 1) ; When the tunneler nears its second nav point, we disable it, and tell this script to be done checking stuff. If (NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF.GetDistance NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01Point02REF <= 96) NVDLC04TunnelTunneler01REF.Disable; Set bDoOnce to 1; Endif Endif Endif Else Disable; MarkForDelete; Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04TunnelSoundScareTriggerSCRIPT
; This script resides on a trigger volume. It's used to kickstart one of the scenes handled in NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT.
; J.S. 3/11/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = The scene's been kickstarted. Short bStart ; 1 = The GameMode block will do its thing. This is set on the TriggerEnter event.
Float fTimer ; Timer float.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0) ; If Players cross the trigger for the first time. PlaySound NPCSporeCarrierHissVox; ; We play a creepy sound. Set NVDLC04TunnelBox.bSubmergeScare to 1; ; And trigger the codebox with NVDLC04TunnelCodeHolderSCRIPT to run the first tunneler scene (scene 1, where tunneler burrows, and depends on bSubmergeScare being 1). Set bDoOnce to 1; Set bStart to 1; Return; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (GetDisabled != 1) ; If the trigger is not disabled. If (bStart == 1) ; If the volume has been entered by player. If (fTimer >= 3) ; We run a small timer (3 secs), after which EDE barks one of his scared lines. If (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat != 1) ; If EDE's not in combat. NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; ; We make EDE bark a scared line. Disable; ; We disable this trigger, and it will be marked for deletion, below. Endif Else Set fTimer to (fTimer + GetSecondsPassed); Endif Endif Else ; Whenever the volume is disabled, here, or elsewhere, this part of the code will mark it for deletion. MarkForDelete; Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04Silo01TerminalSecurityTurretSCRIPT
; Script to handle repair options on the turret security terminal on top level of Silo01 (level 1). ; J.S. 3/10/11
Short bRepaired ; 1 = The turret's been repaired. Short bMessage ; 1 = Repair MSG is displayed.
Int bButton ; Var to track buttons pressed by player, defined in the security turret MSG.
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) ; If Player activates the turret, we'll next check to see if it has been repaired. If (bRepaired == 0) ; If not repaired, we'll display a message, and tell the GameMode block to run GetButtonPressed events. ShowMessage NVDLC04Silo01TerminalSecurityTurretMSG; ; MSG displays. Set bMessage to 1; ; GameMode code var to check. Return; Else ; If repaired, we activate normally. Activate; Return; Endif Else ; If something other than player activates, run normal activation. Activate; Return; Endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
If (bRepaired == 0) ; If the turret's not repaired yet, we run GameMode checks, but only if the message's been displayed. If (bMessage == 1) ; If 1, then the message has just been displayed upon activation. Set bButton to GetButtonPressed; ; We get the button pressed If (bButton == 0) ; If 0, by default, we return and reset bMessage var. Set bMessage to 0; Return; Elseif (bButton == 1) ; If 1, that means players have the necessary conditions for this option to appear in message (conditioned in the message entity itself). NVDLC04Silo01TurretTerminalSparksREF.Disable; ; We disable the sparks around the turret. Set bRepaired to 1; ; Set the repaired var to 1. Set NVDLC04Silo01Box.bTurretRepaired to 1; RewardXP 50; Return; Endif Endif Endif
END

ScriptName NVDLC04EndingSCRIPT
; Ending slide dialogue script. ; OMP 03/10/2011 ; OMP 04/14/2011 - Added code to delay firing off the Wild Wasteland sound and message. ; TLS 07/13/2011 - Moved Endgame loot chest enable here. ; TLS 07/18/2011 - Moved Endgame loot population here. ; CES 08/08/11 - Added in call to disable the trigger to add EDE as a companion at the end of the DLC.
Short bEndingStarted; ; Make sure the script runs once only Short bWildWasteland; ; Used to start the timer to delay the Wild Wasteland sound and message from appearing Float fDelayTimer; ; Used to delay the Wild Wasteland sound and message from appearing
BEGIN GameMode
If (bEndingStarted == 0)
Set bEndingStarted to 1; NVDLC04EndgameLootChestREF.Enable; If (NVDLC04UlyssesREF.GetDead == 1) NVDLC04EndgameLootChestREF.AddItem NVDLC04BitterDrinkRecipeNote 1; EndIf
If (NVDLC04DialogueUlysses.nDuster == 0) NVDLC04EndgameLootChestREF.AddItemHealthPercent NVDLC04ArmorDusterCourier 1 0.85; ElseIf (NVDLC04DialogueUlysses.nDuster == 1) NVDLC04EndgameLootChestREF.AddItemHealthPercent NVDLC04ArmorDusterNCR 1 0.85; ElseIf (NVDLC04DialogueUlysses.nDuster == 2) NVDLC04EndgameLootChestREF.AddItemHealthPercent NVDLC04ArmorDusterLegion 1 0.85; ElseIf (NVDLC04DialogueUlysses.nDuster == 3) NVDLC04EndgameLootChestREF.AddItemHealthPercent NVDLC04ArmorDusterOldWorld 1 0.85; EndIf
;CES - Disable EDE companion trigger NVDLC04EDEHireTriggerREF.Disable;
RemoveImageSpaceModifier FriendOfTheNightInteriorISFX; RemoveImageSpaceModifier FriendOfTheNightISFX; StopQuest DisguiseFactionPulseQuest; ; Turn off disguise notifications
Player.DispelAllSpells; ; Removes all chem effects Player.CastImmediateOnSelf NVDLC04RestUp; ; Restore the player's Dehydration, Sleep Deprivation, and Starvation PipBoyRadioOff; ; Turn off PipBoy radio Player.ResetHealth; ; Heal the player
PlayMusic EndSlideShow;
SetInCharGen 1; ; Prevent level up screen from firing Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04PlayerNoSavePackage; ; Prevent player from saving the game DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1; ; Prevent player from doing anything
Player.MoveTo NVDLC04SlideShowMarkerREF; ; Send the player to the "theatre" to start the slide show
EndIf
; Code related to delaying the Wild Wasteland sound and message from appearing If ( bWildWasteland == 1 )
Set fDelayTimer To ( fDelayTimer - GetSecondsPassed );
If ( fDelayTimer < 0 ) Set bWildWasteland To 0;
PlaySound UIWildWasteland; ShowMessage WildWastelandMessage; EndIf
EndIf
END

ScriptName NVDLC04SlideShowTriggerSCRIPT
; Fires off Ending slide sequence for NVDLC04. ; OMP 03/10/2011 ; OMP 04/14/2011 - Moved the projector sound and quick fade out/in out of the topic script; added scripting to delay displaying the Wild Wasteland sound and message. ; OMP 04/19/2011 - Added the condition to check the value of nMissileTarget for the Wild Wasteland slide.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04PlayerNoSavePackage; ; Prevent player from saving the game DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1; ; Prevent player from doing anything
If ( GetQuestRunning NVDLC04Ending == 1 ) ; Has the Ending started? PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier NVDLC04FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfISFX;
If ( Player.HasPerk WildWasteland == 1 ) && ( NVDLC04MQ03b.nMissileTarget == 3 ) Set NVDLC04Ending.bWildWasteland To 1; ; Enable the delay to display the Wild Wasteland sound and message Set NVDLC04Ending.fDelayTimer To 1.5; ; Set the delay time EndIf
NVDLC04NarratorREF.SayTo Player NVDLC04EndingSlideStart; EndIf
Disable; MarkForDelete;
END

SCN NVDLC04Road01EDEWarheadRevealTriggerSCRIPT
; Script that makes ED-E move to the first warhead, and bark a line at the end result of the given AI Package. ; J.S. 3/7/11
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) ; If EDE is hired when players enter this trigger. If (NVDLC04Road01StartBox.bWarheadFound == 0) ; If the Start-Area codebox in Road01 has not registered yet that the warhead has been found. Set NVDLC04Road01StartBox.bWarheadFound to 1; ; We update the codebox's variable. NVDLC04EDEREF.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04PackageEDERoad01WarheadRevealTravel; ; And force an AI package to EDE that makes him travel to the warhead, and bark a line. Disable; ; We disable, and mark for delete, this trigger volume. MarkForDelete; Else ; If the warhead has already been found by other means, we disable, and mark for delete, this trigger. Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04EDEScaredTriggerSCRIPT
; ED-E bark for "scared" emotions. ; TLS 03/02/2011 ; J.S. 03/09/11 - Increased the max distance after which EDE will no longer bark when players cross this trigger (from 500 to 768).
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetDistance Player <= 768) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat == 0) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetUnconscious == 0) NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf
END

; ED-E bark for "excited" emotions. ; TLS 03/02/2011 ; J.S. 03/09/11 - Increased the max distance after which EDE will no longer bark when players cross this trigger (from 500 to 768).
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetDistance Player <= 768) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat == 0) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetUnconscious == 0) NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEExcited; Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04EDESadTriggerSCRIPT
; ED-E bark for "sad" emotions. ; TLS 03/02/2011 ; J.S. 03/09/11 - Increased the max distance after which EDE will no longer bark when players cross this trigger (from 500 to 768).
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetDistance Player <= 768) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat == 0) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetUnconscious == 0) NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDESad; Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04EDEHappyTriggerSCRIPT
; ED-E bark for "happy" emotions. ; TLS 03/02/2011 ; J.S. 03/09/11 - Increased the max distance after which EDE will no longer bark when players cross this trigger (from 500 to 768).
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetDistance Player <= 768) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.IsInCombat == 0) && (NVDLC04EDEREF.GetUnconscious == 0) NVDLC04EDEREF.Say NVDLC04EDEHappy; Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf
END

Scn NVDLC04Road01MMCamp01Scout01AwakenTriggerSCRIPT
; Enables a Marked Men upon crossing its associated trigger.
; J.S. 3/2/11
Short bDoOnce ; 1 = Marked Men in Camp01 has been enabled.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (bDoOnce == 0 && NVDLC04Road01StartBox.bCamp01Enc == 0) ; If not triggered yet, and Camp01 hasn't been "found." NVDLC04Road01MMCamp01Scout01REF.Enable; ; We enable its scout, NVDLC04EDERef.Say NVDLC04EDEScared; ; And we make EDE bark in worry about the danger ahead. Set NVDLC04Road01StartBox.bCamp01Enc to 1; ; We update the Start Area codebox of Road01 with the appropriate value for Camp01's encounters. Set bDoOnce to 1; ; We mark doonce as complete, then disable, and mark for deletion, the trigger volume. Disable; MarkForDelete; Endif
END

Scn NVDLC04Silo01EDEMainframeActivateTriggerSCRIPT
; Script to make EDE activate Silo01's mainframe. It runs on a trigger.
; J.S. 3/1/11 ; TLS 03/29/2011 - Added animations ; J.S. 8/12/11 - Added call to move EDE near the activator, only if EDE's z position is below the first floor of the silo.
Short bActivateOnce ; 1 = EDE has activated the Mainframe. Short bClueOnce ; 1 = EDE has barked when near the Mainframe, and players don't have security codes yet.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player;
If (bActivateOnce == 0) ; If EDE has not activated the mainframe yet. If (bClueOnce == 0 && Player.GetHasNote NVDLC04Silo02LaunchCode != 1) ; Check to see if players have codes, and if EDE has barked in excitement upon seeing the mainframe. NVDLC04EDERef.Say NVDLC04EDEExcited; ; EDE barks if the above check returns false. Set bClueOnce to 1; ; Bark only once. Else If (NVDLC04Silo01MainframeREF.bEDEActivated != 1) ; If the Mainframe's script shows that it has not been activated yet. If (Player.GetHasNote NVDLC04Silo02LaunchCode == 1) ; And player has the security codes. If (NVDLC04EDERef.GetPos Z < 14700) NVDLC04EDERef.MoveTo NVDLC04Silo01AlarmBots01FightMarkerREF; Endif NVDLC04EDERef.Say NVDLC04EDEHappy; ; EDE barks congratulatory note, and receives package to activate the mainframe (goes to the mainframe, OnEnd activates it). NVDLC04EDERef.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04PackageEDESilo01MainframeActivate; NVDLC04Silo01MainframeREF.PlayGroup Forward 1; Set bActivateOnce to 1; Disable; ; All functions are done, we disable the trigger to mark it for deletion. MarkForDelete; Return; Endif Endif Endif Endif
END

SCN NVDLC04DeathclawBossTargetTriggerSCRIPT
;Sets the correct variable when the Deathclaw Boss is in position for the cave in to kill it ;DM 2/25/11 ;DM 3/14/11 - Moved check for deathclaw boss being dead to here. ;DM 4/20/11 - Added timer to swap out the boss with an already dead and placed version. ;DM 6/6/11 - Added a check to see if the player is inside the trigger when the warhead is activated. ;DM 6/30/11 - Refined the check for the deathclaw so that it properly counts him when he is inside the trigger.
Float fTimer Int iStage Int iPlayer Short bDoOnce
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter NVDLC04DivideDeathclawBossREF
Set NVDLC04DivideSupport.bDeathclawBossTarget to 1;
END
BEGIN OnTriggerLeave NVDLC04DivideDeathclawBossREF
Set NVDLC04DivideSupport.bDeathclawBossTarget to 0;
END
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
Set iPlayer to 1;
END
BEGIN OnTriggerLeave Player
Set iPlayer to 0;
END
BEGIN GameMode
;;;;;Checks to see if the player is inside the explosion radius If (NVDLC04DivideSupport.bDeathclawBossExplode == 1) && (iPlayer == 1) && (bDoOnce == 0) Player.Kill; Set bDoOnce to 1; ElseIf (NVDLC04DivideSupport.bDeathclawBossExplode == 1) && (bDoOnce == 0) Set bDoOnce to 1; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04UlyssesTempleDoor01SCRIPT
; Increments main quest ; TLS 02/24/2011 ; TLS 03/14/2011 - Scritping standards update
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) SetStage NVDLC04MQ02 100; SetStage NVDLC04MQ03a 10; Activate; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04WeapSonicDetonatorAddSCRIPT
; Completes objective when player acquires Sonic Detonator. ; TLS 02/23/2011 ; TLS 03/15/2011 - Changed scripting to SetStage ; ETB 03/16/2011 - Added gamemode block and weaponhealth routine to keep Sonic Detonator from degrading. ; TLS 05/09/2011 - Removing GameMode block and adding a first-time message pop-up.
Short bMessage;
BEGIN OnAdd Player
SetStage NVDLC04MQ01 12; If (bMessage == 0) ShowMessage NVDLC04DetonatorMSG; Set bMessage to 1; EndIf
END; onadd player

SCN NVDLC04DivideVistaSiloDoorSCRIPT
; Starts MQ01a ; TLS 02/23/2011
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) SetStage NVDLC04MQ01a 10; Activate; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Silo1EDETrigger01SCRIPT
; Script that makes ED-E activate the window and the door. ; TLS 02/23/2011 ; Removed call to force scriptpackage on EDE. Instead, this trigger now kickstarts the codeholder box that runs gamemode code to organize the missile's reveal event. ; J.S. 3/4/11
short bEDEActivated
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If (NVDLC04DialogueEDE.bEDEHired == 1) If (bEDEActivated == 0) Set bEDEActivated to 1; Set NVDLC04Silo01RevealBox.bActive to 1; ; This kickstarts the scene at its script box. ;NVDLC04EDEREF.AddScriptPackage NVDLC04EDEActivateSilo1; Disable; MarkForDelete; EndIf EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04MQ03bSCRIPT
; Variables for NVDLC04MQ03b ; TLS 02/23/2011 ; TLS 03/14/2011 - Scritping standards update ; TLS 04/04/2011 - Scripting set up for endgame perks.
Short nMissileTarget; ; 0 = No target ; 1 = Target: NCR ; 2 = Target: Caesar's Legion ; 3 = Target: EVERYBODY
Short bMessage; ; Used to trigger the awarding of the final perk. Short nButton;
BEGIN GameMode
If (bMessage == 1) Set nButton to GetButtonPressed; If (nButton == -1) If (nMissileTarget == 0) Player.AddPerk NVDLC04DivideSurvivorPerk; Set bMessage to 0; StopQuest NVDLC04MQ03b; EndIf EndIf EndIf
END
BEGIN MenuMode 1001
If (GetStage NVDLC04MQ03b == 100) Set bMessage to 1; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Silo01ReactorDoorSCRIPT
; This script gives the player the pop-up to get ED-E and power up the reactor. ; TLS 02/23/2011
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionREF Player == 1) If (GetLocked == 1) ShowMessage NVDLC04Silo01ReactorDoorClosedMessage; If (GetStage NVDLC04MQ01a < 20) SetStage NVDLC04MQ01a 20; EndIf Else Activate; EndIf Else Activate; EndIf
END

END

scn NVDLC04DialogueEDESCRIPT
; Script to hold variables NVDLC04 ED-E's dialogue. ; JSH 02/08/11 ; TLS 03/25/2011 - Added audio log variables for replay. ; TLS 03/30/2011 - Added DoOnce for perk upgrade messages ; TLS 04/15/2011 - Added scripting for commisary movement. ; TLS 07/11/2011 - Added variable for ED-E rescue. ; TLS 08/10/2011 - Added variable for ED-E in captivity
Short bEDEHired; Short bEDEFired; Short bEDEAvailable; Short bCamaraderEDoOnce; Short nAudioLog01; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog02; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog03; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog04; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog05; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog06; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog07; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog08; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nAudioLog10; ; 0 = not played yet, 1 = playing, 2 = done Short nCommissary; ; 0 = Not active, 1 = ED-E moving, 2 = ED-E at location Short bEDERescued; ; 0 = Not rescued, 1 = Rescued Short bEDECaptured; ; 0 = Free, 1 = Captive

SCN NVDLC04MQ01aSCRIPT
; Script for NVDLC04MQ01a ; TLS 01/25/2011 ; TLS 03/14/2011 - Script standards update, added security code objective
Short bDoOnce;
BEGIN GameMode
If (Player.GetInCell NVDLC04Silo01 == 1) && (bDoOnce == 0) ForceActiveQuest NVDLC04MQ01a; Set bDoOnce to 1; EndIf
; Complete Acquire Launch Codes objective If (GetHasNote NVDLC04Silo02LaunchCode >= 1) && (GetStage NVDLC04MQ01a < 50) SetStage NVDLC04MQ01a 50; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Silo02DoorSCRIPT
; Script for locked door into Silo 2 that opens when you fire the missile ; TLS 02/23/2011 ; TLS 03/14/2011 - Scritping standards update
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionREF Player == 1) If (GetStage NVDLC04MQ02 < 5) ShowMessage NVDLC04Silo02LockdownMSG; Else Activate; EndIf EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04DivideDoorSCRIPT
; Script to increment the main quest on reaching the Divide ; TLS 02/23/2011 ; TLS 03/14/2011 - Scritping standards update
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) SetStage NVDLC04MQ01c 100; SetStage NVDLC04MQ02 10; Activate; EndIf
END

SCN NVDLC04Silo1DoorSCRIPT
; Completes The Silo, sets MQ01 to stage 15 and MQ01c to Stage 10 ; TLS 02/23/2011 ; TLS 03/14/2011 - Scritping standards update ; TLS 03/15/2011 - Changed stage on MQ01. ; J.S. 06/20/11 - Added code to re-enable fast travel, in the event of players having found a way out of the laser-detonator area without blowing up the barricade's warhead. Highly unlikely, but it's a good safety measure.
BEGIN OnActivate
If (IsActionRef Player == 1) SetStage NVDLC04MQ01a 100; SetStage NVDLC04MQ01 10; SetStage NVDLC04MQ01c 10;
If (NVDLC04Road01GlareBox.nScene > 2 && NVDLC04Road01CampBarrierWarhead01REF.GetDisabled != 1) ; Re-enable fast travel if players found a way out of laser detonator area without blowing up the warhead. EnableFastTravel 1; Endif
Activate; EndIf
END

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have found a Flash Bang grenade! Flash Bangs are special grenades that:
- Deal Fatigue damage. - Reduce enemy weapon skills. - Have a chance to Frenzy Tunnelers.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你发现了一个闪光弹！闪光弹是一种特殊的手雷：
- 造成疲劳伤害。 - 减少敌人的武器技能。 - 有一定几率使掘穴者疯狂。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Attention all base personnel:
This is just a reminder that all base commissary terminals draw from the same central depository. Please do not waste your time or the technicians' by running from commissary to commissary. You won't get any more whiskey than you did from the first one.
-SSGT Lansky
ESP.TRADUIT:
所有基地人员注意:
这只是一个提醒，所有的基地物资终端都从同一个中央仓库提取。请不要浪费您和技术人员的时间，从一个供应终端跑到另一个供应终端。你不会得到比第一次更多的威士忌。
- 兰斯基上士

ESP.ORIGINAL: At 0600 hours, Bravo Team will conduct sweep-and-clear operations in advance of the main force. Early intelligence suggests the tunnels are only sparsely populated by small, subterranean semi-humanoids, which are easily cowed by bright light and loud noises. Bravo Team has been issued flashbang grenades for this purpose, and is expected to meet minimal resistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上6点，B小队将在主力部队之前进行清剿行动。早期的情报显示，隧道里只有稀少的小型地下半人形生物，它们很容易被明亮的光线和巨大的噪音吓住。B小队已经为此目的发放了闪光弹，预计将遇到最小的阻力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This hand written note contains the recipe for Bitter Drink. (The recipe is now unlocked for the campfire crafting station.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 这张手写的纸条上有苦味饮料的配方。（该配方已在营火制作处解锁）

ESP.ORIGINAL:
General,
We found a seized shipment of Chinese "Red Victory" model grenade launchers and thought you might like to have one for yourself. They're quicker to reload then our "Great Bears," but they don't pack quite the same punch. Still, it'll be nice to give those bastards a taste of their own medicine if it comes to that, right?
ESP.TRADUIT:
上将，
我们发现了一批被查封的中国"红色胜利"型榴弹发射器，想必您会想得到一支。它们的装填速度比我们的“巨熊”更快，但它们的威力不如我们。尽不过，如果真到了那一步，让那些混蛋尝尝他们自己的苦果也不错，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Eyebot Maintenance Bay Status:
Pod 1 - INACTIVE/Unoccupied. Power diverted to Eyebot synthesis pod in main launch chamber.
Pod 2 - ACTIVE/Unoccupied
Pod 3 - INACTIVE/Unoccupied. Power diverted to Eyebot synthesis pod in main launch chamber.
ESP.TRADUIT:
眼球机器人维修隔间状态：
吊舱1 - 未激活/闲置。电力转入主发射室的眼球机器人合成舱。
吊舱2 - 激活/闲置
吊舱3 - 未激活/闲置。电力转入主发射室的眼球机器人合成舱。
黎明镇基地 - 军械库访问码
NCR游骑兵行动报告 - 附录

ESP.ORIGINAL: 3rd Platoon, Cazador Company, 4th Ranger Battalion Action Report, addendum: Staff Sergeant Balmoral reporting again. Looks like we aren't the only ones that had the idea to check this place out. Our advance scouts encountered heavy Legion activity in the area. The troopers are gearing up to hit them tonight - hopefully before they know we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第四游骑兵营，第三野战排，猎蜂连队行动报告，附录：中士巴尔莫勒再次报告。看来我们不是唯一想要检查这个地方的人，我们的先遣侦察兵在该地区遇到了大量的军团活动，游骑兵正准备今晚袭击他们，希望是在他们知道我们在这里之前。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
3rd Platoon, Cazador Company, 4th Ranger Battalion Action Report: Staff Sergeant Balmoral reporting. We've reached the area local tribes call "the Divide," but so far, I don't think this will be a suitable route for bringing troops to Hoover Dam. The terrain is a nightmare, we've seen evidence of hostile indigenous life, and the Geiger counters are ticking like grandfather clocks on Turbo.
Full report when the advance scouts come back at 2300, but as of now I'm recommending we abandon this mission.
ESP.TRADUIT:
第四游骑兵营，第三野战排，猎蜂连队行动报告：中士巴尔莫勒报告。我们已经到达了当地部落称之为"大裂谷"的地方，但到目前为止，我认为这不是把军队带到胡佛大坝的合适路线。这里的地形简直就是一场噩梦，我们已发现一些怀有敌意的本土生命迹象，而且盖革计数器正像老爷钟敲在涡轮上一样嘀嗒作响。
当先遣侦察兵在23点回来时报告完整情况，但现在我建议我们放弃这次任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Attention all base personnel:
We will soon play host to one of the greatest American patriots of our day, General Wellesley himself. For those of you whose family trees don't fork, the General is chief liaison officer to the Big MT Research Facility. He and his team are paying us a visit to collect our "guests" and take them someplace where they can do some good for their country beyond stinking of patchouli and shooting the LSD.
Commander Devlin
ESP.TRADUIT:
所有基地人员注意：
我们即将接待全美国当代最伟大的爱国者之一，韦尔斯利将军本人。对于你们当中那些族谱纯正的人来说，韦尔斯利上将是大山脉研究所的首席联络官。他他和他的团队正在拜访我们，收集我们的 "客人"，并把他们带到某个地方，让他们在散发出广藿香气味和射出迷幻剂之外，还能为他们的国家做一些好事。
- 指挥官德弗林

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Attention all base personnel:
The automated Commissary system has been locked down until further notice. It turns out that the "counterfeit-proof" pay chits we've been issuing to you are exactly the same size and shape as ordinary bottlecaps. Until we can correct the problem, you'll have to make your purchases the old-fashioned way.
-SSGT Lansky
ESP.TRADUIT:
所有基地人员注意：
在另行通知前自动化物资供应系统将锁闭。事实证明，我们发给您的“防伪”工资单与普通瓶盖的大小和形状完全相同。在我们解决这个问题之前，你只能用传统的方式购物。
- 兰斯基上士
黎明镇发射井 - 维修区状态

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Minor and nothing to worry about." If that last quake wasn't a 5.0 at least, I'm Dean Domino. That's it, I'm requesting a transfer before the whole plaudsfg099io8u8ioi yti xciokghpt8i9io
ESP.TRADUIT: “很轻微，不需要担心。”如果上次地震没有5.0级以上，我就是迪恩·多米诺。就这样吧，我正申请调任，在整个plaudsfg099io8u8ioi yti xciokghpt8i9io之前

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fantastic. Now there's earthquakes. Earthquakes! Sure, Commander Devlin says they're minor ones and nothing to worry about, but come on. EARTHQUAKES. Did no one think to check fault lines before they built a massive UNDERGROUND MISSILE COMPLEX?
Your tax dollars at work, folks. Swear to God, when my term's up I'm moving to Canada.
ESP.TRADUIT:
太棒了，现在地震也来凑热闹了。地震啊！当然，德弗林指挥官说这些轻微地震没什么可担心的，当我三岁小孩啊，地震啊。难难道没有人在建造大型地下导弹基地之前考虑过检查断层线吗？
这就是你们的税款起的作用，伙计们。我对天发誓，我任期结束后就搬去加拿大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swear to God, if I lose one more night of sleep over these noises I am going to strangle somebody. "Knocking pipes" my ass - do these slumlords think it's easy running the safety protocols for an entire ICBM launch complex on two hours sleep? It's a goddamn miracle nobody's started World War III over a low-flying titmouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对天发誓，如果这些噪声再让我失眠哪怕一个晚上我就马上找个人把他勒死。“敲击管道的声音” 开玩笑啊，难道这些贫民窟房东们觉得每天只睡2个小时也能轻松搞定整个洲际导弹发射设施的安全协议么？没人为了一只低空飞行的山雀而发动第三次世界大战真是个奇迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Listen here you pinko Commie-eyed puke, I got your lily-livered defeatest e-mails. I ignored them because they made me THROW UP IN MY MOUTH! Do you understand we're fighting a war here?! Against the REDS? And the only thing standing between you and hot atomic Armageddon is ME and my base full of GIANT NUCLEAR MISSILES? Answer me this, Specialist Buttinski: if the American people are overrun by Kremlin Joe and his Chicom cronies, what good will clean drinking water be?
Commander Devlin
ESP.TRADUIT:
你这个垃圾左倾共产主义分子,我已经收到你那些胆小如鼠的败战邮件.我无视它们是因为它们忍不住让我想吐！你到底知不知道我们这里正陷在战争中？！对抗赤色分子？你又知不知道我以及我满是巨型核弹的基地是你与急剧升温的核末日之间的唯一屏障？回答我,砖家：如果美国人民被克姆林?乔以及他的中共闺蜜蹂躏了,那纯净水还有什么意义？
- 指挥官德弗林

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Commander Devlin,
I apologize for e-mailing you again, but I still haven't received a response to my previous seven e-mails. Once again, we DESPERATELY need more funding to improve safety protocols at the water treatment plant. Current protocols are absolutely appalling, and I don't even want to think about the consequences of a failure on the local water supply.
Specialist Alan Rothchild
ESP.TRADUIT:
指挥官德弗林，
我很抱歉再次给您发邮件，但是我之前的七封邮件都没有收到回复。我们再次迫切需要更多的资金来改善水处理厂的安全协议。目前的协议实在是太糟糕了，我甚至不想去想当地供水系统出现故障的后果。
- 专家阿兰·罗斯切尔德

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Attention All Base Personnel:
DO NOT engage the protestors outside the construction zone. I know, I know, the presence of those freedom-loving no-goodniks fills my brain with the WHITE-HOT RAGE OF CAPITALIST JUSTICE, but the Political Office has something planned for them, and you mooks better not screw it up.
Commander Devlin
ESP.TRADUIT:
所有基地人员注意：
不要和施工区外的抗议者接触。我知道，我知道，那些热爱自由的坏家伙的存在让我的大脑充满了资本主义正义的白热化的愤怒，但政务官已经对他们有安排了，你们这些笨蛋最好别搞砸了。
- 指挥官德弗林

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody from the Political Office should keep an eye on those guys down at the water treatment plant. That's the third request for extra funds I've had to deny this month - do they think we're made of money? I swear, it's like they want the Communists to win....
ESP.TRADUIT: 政务处的人应该盯紧那些水处理厂的家伙。这是这个月我不得不拒绝的第三次额外资金申请了，他们认为我们有钱吗?我发誓，他们好像是想让共产党赢...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear diary,
I think we did it! We finally convinced the Death Merchants to hear our beautiful Mother Earth's cries! I just had a personal meeting with the base commander, who said they would be taking a long, hard look at our demands and preparing something special for us. I can't wait to see what it is - I bet it's a full nuclear disarmament!
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的日记，
我想我们成功了！我们终于说服了军火商来听我们美丽的地球母亲的哭声！我刚刚和基地指挥官进行了私人会谈，他说他们会仔细考虑我们的要求，并为我们准备一些特别的东西。我迫不及待地想看看这是什么了，我敢打赌这是一次全面的核裁军！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
If you find this, my name is James Rubinek. I'm a trader from the Hub - thought I'd found a new route to markets east. Guess now I know why no routes go through this Godforsaken place. Leg's broken, can't get out, and even if I could there's those crazed ghouls and those digging things waiting for me.
Please, get this note to my ex-wife, Anna. Tell her what happened. Tell her how I died. And I guess you can tell that cheating bitch I hope she's happy with that limp-dick Rory Spencer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果你看到这个，我叫詹姆斯·鲁比内克。我是中枢市的商人，我以为我找到了一条通往东方市场的新路线，现在我知道为什么没有路线经过这该死的地方了。腿断了，出不去了，即使我能出去也有那些疯狂的食尸鬼和挖洞的东西在等着我。
求你了，把这张纸条给我前妻安娜。告诉她发生了什么，告诉她我是怎么死的。我猜你还可以告诉那个出轨的婊子我希望她和那个瘸子罗里·斯宾塞在一起会开心。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Eyebot Maintenance Bay Status:
Pod 1 - INACTIVE/Unoccupied. Power diverted to Eyebot synthesis pod in main launch chamber.
Pod 2 - ACTIVE/Occupied. Estimated Eyebot damage: 0% Please contact an administrator to remove this Eyebot from its pod.
Pod 3 - INACTIVE/Unoccupied. Power diverted to Eyebot synthesis pod in main launch chamber.
ESP.TRADUIT:
眼球机器人维修隔间状态：
吊舱1 - 未激活/空置。电力转移到主发射舱内的眼球机器人合成舱。
吊舱2 - 激活/占用。预计眼球机器人伤害:0%请联系管理员将此眼球机器人从其吊舱中移除。
吊舱3 - 未激活/空置。电力转移到主发射舱内的眼球机器人合成舱。
黎明镇发射井 - 一层安全码
黎明镇发射井 - 二层安全码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Initial recon of the Divide has met with heavy resistance. These ghouls - the troopers have started calling them "Marked Men" - are smarter than the typical ferals we're used to. Yesterday we found some old Pre-War cages they've used to capture Deathclaws - God knows what they were planning to do with them, but one of the things must have escaped, judging from the carnage. I've ordered double watches until we find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对大裂谷的初步侦察遭遇了严重的阻力。这些食尸鬼...士兵们开始称他们为“烙印者”，比我们所习惯的典型的狂尸鬼更聪明。昨天我们发现了一些旧的战前笼子，他们用来抓死亡爪...天知道他们打算怎么处理它们，但从屠杀的场面来看，肯定有个家伙跑出来了。我已经安排了双倍警戒，直到找到为止。
二等兵福斯特的个人日记

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus, this place is a hellhole. I heard it was bad from some of the guys coming back, but... Jesus. Henriksen bought it when one of those unexploded warheads went off, and Jenkins... those things got him. I don't know what they were exactly - ghouls, maybe, but nasty fuckers. LT thinks they were drawn by the explosion that killed Henriksen. I think we're all gonna die here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，这地方简直就是个地狱。我从一些回来的家伙那里听说情况很糟糕，但是...上帝啊。亨里克森被一颗未爆炸的核弹送了命，詹金斯...那些东西抓住了他。我不知道他们到底是什么，也许是食尸鬼，但都是些混蛋。他们是被炸死亨里克森的爆炸吸引来的，我想我们都会死在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: |====================| |MINUTEMAN XI - CONSTANTINE |LAUNCH PROTOCOL 10.77 |SECURITY CLEARANCE ALPHA |====================| |EAM CLEARANCE: G 5 S S 1 8 |* * >> USAF DEFCON |* * >> EXEC:'BAGMAN' |====================| |AUTH CODE: 0000000000 |====================| |RESPONSE SCENARIO MX-CN91 |ICBM RESPONSE/NUCLEAR |BASE COMMAND EYES ONLY |====================|
Not now. Let's settle things here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在还不是时候。让我们先把这里的事情解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're done here, let's leave the Divide behind. If we get separated, I'll meet you above Hopeville, near the Canyon Wreckage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这儿的事结束了，我们就把大裂谷抛在脑后吧。如果我们走散了，我会在黎明镇上方的峡谷残骸附近与你见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Full circle, walked your road - now back again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绕了一圈，走过你的路 - 现在又回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something else in you needing an answer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有什么需要答案的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Debug: Ulysses high level topics, do not translate. >
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在还不是时候。让我们先把这里的事情解决了。

NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: <音乐>...拉尔菲...飞得更远，飞得更快！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fire, and I won't take it lying down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开枪啊，我可不会俯首帖耳的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide belongs to history now. The Mojave awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷现在属于历史了，莫哈维在等待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing more to say. I'll be going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可说的了，我要走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what you stand for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看你为谁而战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷将成为你的坟墓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's have an ending to this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 下一次，你不会再得到怜悯。

ESP.TRADUIT: 一定是离开了，不会离开 - 还不会。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Comes back, we'll deal with it then.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't walk through ash and hell to lose you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是为了现在跟丢你才经历地狱般的磨难的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
