NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set NVDLC04EDEREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0; Set NVDLC04EDEREF.IsFollowingLong to 1;
ESP.TRADUIT: Set NVDLC02FollowsChalkREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set NVDLC02FollowsChalkREF.IsFollowingLong to 1

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set NVDLC04EDEREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1; Set NVDLC04EDEREF.IsFollowingLong to 0;
ESP.TRADUIT: Set NVDLC02FollowsChalkRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set NVDLC02FollowsChalkRef.IsFollowingLong to 0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
I think we should travel together.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll see what you stand for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看你为谁而战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide couldn't stop me, the Mojave couldn't kill me - you don't have much chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷阻止不了我，莫哈韦也无法杀死我...你没有多少机会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll finish history's work. If the Divide couldn't kill you... perhaps these spears of the Old World can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会完成历史的工作。如果大裂谷不能杀死你...也许这些旧世界的长矛可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's end this, Courier, you and I. Here, with the Old World flag as witness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们结束这一切吧，邮差，你和我，在这里，以旧大陆的旗帜作见证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even in this place, NCR's shadow falls. Or is it just, you, Courier, without the Bear's corpse to weigh you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使在这个地方，NCR的阴影依然笼罩着。或者只是你，邮差，没有熊的尸体来拖累你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you came, Frumentarii, Courier - whatever you are now. Come to carry out Caesar's law? His voice carries no weight here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你来了，军团特务，或者该叫你邮差 - 不管你现在是什么。来执行凯撒的法律？他的声音在这里可没有什么分量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your city, Vegas, lies in the other direction... with the rest of its slaves. Or is it just, you, Courier, without the lights and ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的城市，维加斯，在另一个方向...和其他奴隶一起。或者仅仅只有你，邮差，没有灯光和鬼魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you came, Courier, to what - watch your homeland burn one last time. Kill me, perhaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你来了，邮差，为了什么 - 亲眼目睹你的家园最后一次燃烧？亦或，杀了我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judging by your shadow... maybe you can't let your machine go. Doesn't matter now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你的影子来看...也许你放不下你的机器。不过现在都不重要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, the Divide giants are awakening. The missiles here, on their way home. There is no way to stop them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，大裂谷的巨人正在苏醒。导弹在回家的路上，没有任何办法阻止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are too late. The Divide is awakening - the package, and the message within, have come full circle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来得太晚了。大裂谷正在苏醒 - 包裹和里面的信息，已经回到了原点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sequence has begun, just as before. Except this time, the missiles will touch the sky instead of being locked beneath the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和以前一样，这个过程已经开始了。只不过这一次，导弹将触及天空，而不是被锁在地下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought that explosion, that building falling deep in the Divide might have been your work... wouldn't kill you, maybe close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为那爆炸，那座被深深埋在大裂谷里的大楼可能是你的杰作...不会杀死你，也接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew you'd survive... but no need to go any farther. You've brought me what I need - that machine with you, sealed in the Hopeville silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你会活下来的...但不需要再往前走了。你给我带来了我需要的东西，那台封存在黎明镇发射井里的机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Needed someone to unlock it - bring it home. Now the signal's strong enough, no need for you to carry it anymore. I can call your machine to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要有人来解锁 - 把它带回家。现在既然信号已经足够强了，就不需要你再带着它了，我会把你的机器召唤回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopeville, High Road, Ashton... tiny cracks in the Earth, nothing compared to the road carved ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黎明镇、正路、阿什顿...还是那龟裂的大地，这一切都无法和你面前的这条路相比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you... this is the edge of the Divide. Ahead lies your work, the history you burned in the earth. What you brought to the people here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你面前的...是这大裂谷的边缘之地。前方是你的杰作，你在这片大地上燃烧的历史。你给这里的人们带来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you are, you went quiet for a time... knew killing the Bear wouldn't prove easy... you and your machine, you survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来了，你沉默了一段时间...我知道杀死熊并不容易...你和你的机器，都活下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lesson here, in the Divide. Old World history about paving and intentions could teach the Republic a thing or two - if they listened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一个教训，在大裂谷里。旧世界关于铺路和意图的历史可以教给共和国一两件事 - 如果他们认真听的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They have an idea of trying to do what's right, never quite getting there. Maybe you've seen it - Nipton, elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们总想做正确的事，但从来没能做到。也许你见过 - 尼普顿，别的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picking up the signal from your machine... was quiet for a time, thought the Road had claimed another of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你的机器上接受信号...曾沉寂了一段时间，我还以为这条路又夺走了一个军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too many of the Bull have already fallen here... to radiation, fire... and what burrows below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里已经倒下了太多的公牛...辐射、火...还有在下面挖洞的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you are, you went quiet for a time... thought you might have returned to Vegas, its comforts. Maybe you took that machine with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来了，你沉默了一段时间...我还以为你已经回到拉斯维加斯了，那里很舒适。或许你还把那台机器带走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lesson here, in the Divide. Old World history about holding on to something so tightly it breaks... or falls apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一个教训，在大裂谷里。 旧世界的历史是关于紧紧抓住某样东西，使其断裂...或崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: May have seen the cracks in Vegas's walls already. If so, they'll grow, in time, no matter how much you back House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你已经看到维加斯墙上的裂缝了。如果是这样，无论你怎么多支持豪斯，它都会慢慢变大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you are, you went quiet for a time. Then that signal came in strong from your machine, like a heartbeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来了，你沉寂了一段时间。然后你的机器发出了强烈的信号，就像心跳一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Made your way through Old World towns, the tunnels that join them... now, the High Road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过旧世界的城镇，连接它们的隧道...现在是正路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For all you've seen behind you - there's worse along this stretch. Deathclaws - hunt the Marked Men, and they also hunt what burrows below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这一生即使已经见识过许多东西 - 但这条路更糟糕。比如说死亡爪 - 它们不仅会猎杀那些烙印者，他们也猎杀下面洞里的那些家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Storage Node for Skill Checks. Do not Translate. >
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来了，你沉默了一段时间...我知道杀死熊并不容易...你和你的机器，都活下来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's your signal... faint, but there. Just like NCR - voice without fire, without strength, sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的信号...微弱，但还在。就像NCR一样 - 声音没有激情，没有力量，病态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard tales of you walking the Mojave. Giving the two-headed bear strength. Giving hollow men like Kimball, like Crocker, half the life Hanlon had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过你在莫哈韦沙漠漫步的故事。赋予双头熊力量，给金博尔，克罗克这样徒具人形的人，还有汉隆一半的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... let's test that strength. That... "conviction." Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在...让我们来测试一下这种力量，这种“信念”。邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's your signal... faint, but there. A woman in Caesar's service. Looks like the Bear has had its victory, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的信号...微弱，但还在。一个服侍凯撒的女人，看来最终还是熊取得了胜利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's your signal... faint, but there. Charging ahead, like the rest of our brothers, blood in your eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的信号...微弱，但还在。勇往直前，就像我们其他的兄弟一样，眼中充满鲜血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking your chances, coming here. Just like bringing the lord of Vegas his tribute, bending your knee to Old World ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冒着风险来这里。就像向维加斯之王进贡，向旧世界的鬼魂屈膝一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and that Chip - deserve each other, twenty-nine less coins than other traitors have carried, if history's true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和那块芯片，彼此配得上。如果历史是真的，那比其他叛徒少了二十九枚硬币。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now see the road the Old World paves... and what the lights of New Vegas promise, if they haven't blinded your eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在看看旧世界铺就的道路...还有新维加斯的光芒所预示的，如果它们还没有蒙蔽你双眼的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's your signal. Faint, but there. You came, good. Curious, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: }这是你的信号...微弱，但还在。你来了，很好。好奇，也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You walked the Mojave without a flag on your back. That'll end soon, can't walk the Long 15 and not have a nation's shadow fall on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在莫哈维行走并没有背负一面旗帜，不过这样的日子也快到头了，你走不了漫长的15号公路，一个国家的阴影笼罩在你身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you just need to be tested. Or you believe in nothing. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你只是需要接受考验，或者你什么都不相信。我们拭目以待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的信号...微弱，但还在。就像NCR一样 - 声音没有激情，没有力量，病态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的信号...微弱，但还在。就像NCR一样 - 声音没有激情，没有力量，病态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Experiment log 369248/A - Eyebot Duraframe universal interface override system. This is Dr. Whitley presiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验日志369248/A - 眼球机器人硬脊膜框架通用界面超驰系统。现在主持会议的是惠特利博士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Initial tests of the override system are promising. Against unsecured or lightly-encrypted targets, the Eyebots have a 98% success rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超驰系统的初步测试很有希望。针对未加密或轻度加密的目标，眼球机器人的成功率为98%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: More heavily protected systems are still problematic. Military-grade encryption presents a very real possibility of critical overload of key systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 受保护程度较高的系统仍有问题。 军事级别的加密提出了一个非常现实的可能性，即关键系统的严重过载。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've stopped tests before any robots were destroyed, but if we don't address the problem our Eyebots will fry themselves hacking military networks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在机器人被摧毁之前我们已经停止了测试，但如果我们不解决这个问题，我们的眼球机器人就会在入侵军事网络时自己焚毁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Next week on RALPHIE the Robot's Incredible Odyssey!
ESP.TRADUIT: 下周，《机器人拉尔菲的不可思议大冒险》！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Announcer [0100D313] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tune in next Saturday for the exciting conclusion! Only on Vault-Tec Channel 9!
ESP.TRADUIT: 请在下周六收看激动人心的结局！避难所科技九号频道独家播出！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Announcer [0100D313] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad! Hey Dad! Check out this robot I found!
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸！嘿，爸爸！看看我找到的这个机器人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Child [0100D315] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's not dangerous! Look, he's hurt! Can we take him home, Dad? Maybe Mom can fix him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他并不危险！看，他受伤了！我们能带他回家吗，爸爸？也许妈妈能修好他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Child [0100D315] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please? He looks so lonely! Maybe if Mom fixes him, he can help her out around the garage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好不好嘛？他看起来很孤独！也许妈妈修好他，他就能帮妈妈打理车库了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Child [0100D315] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yay! He'll be just like RALPHIE, only this one's not a toy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶！他就像拉尔菲一样，只不过他不是玩具！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Child [0100D315] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, you're back on-line. Listen to me, ED-E - if you stay here, they'll dismantle you for parts. You have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你又上线了。听我说，ED-E，如果你留在这里，他们会把你拆成碎片的。你现在得走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've uploaded destination coordinates for our outpost in Navarro into your system. I want you to go to the Enclave there, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把我们在纳瓦罗前哨的目的地坐标上传到你的系统里了。我要你去找那边的英克雷，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you understand me? It's going to be a long journey, my little friend. You'll have to fly very far, and fly very fast. Can you do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你明白我的意思吗？这将是一次长途旅行，我的小朋友。你要飞很远，飞得很快，你能做到吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you can. Be careful out there, ED-E. Maybe I'll see you again some day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你可以的。小心点，ED-E，也许有一天我会再见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All due respect sir, I think you're making a mistake. We're close to a breakthrough with the Duraframe Eyebots, I can feel it! Yes, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恕我直言，长官，我认为你犯了个错误。我们即将在硬脊膜框架眼球机器人上取得突破，我能感觉到！遵命，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir, I understand that we need the Duraframe assets for Hellfire armor, but-No, sir. Yes, sir. I understand, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，长官，我明白我们需要硬脊膜框架的资产来制造地狱火装甲，但是 -不，长官。遵命，长官。我明白了，长官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell the team to start disassembling the ED series prototypes right away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让团队马上开始拆解ED系列的原型机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E, you little rascal. Were you eavesdropping again? I think those videos you watch are a bad influence on you. How much of that did you hear?
ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E，你这个小淘气，你又在偷听了？我觉得你看的那些视频对你有不好的影响。你听到了多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... didn't Dr. Grant say she'd upgraded your navigational systems? I think I have an idea.... How'd you like to be just like RALPHIE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...格兰特博士不是说她升级了你的导航系统吗？我想我有个主意...你想不想跟拉尔菲一样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe it! Grant actually went to Colonel Autumn and got approval for her damned "efficiency guidelines!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真不敢相信！格兰特真的去找了奥特姆上校，她那该死的“效率准则”获得了批准！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: "All experiments will be carried out with the test subject fully active, to reduce iteration time." It's barbaric!
ESP.TRADUIT: "将在测试对象完全激活的情况下实施所有实验，以减少迭代时间。" 太野蛮了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've explained this to the Colonel - just because the Eyebots don't have true AI doesn't mean they're just machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经向上校解释过了 - 眼球机器人没有真正的人工智能并不意味着它们只是机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess results are all that matter around here. Forget things like "ethical procedures" or "humane treatment."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想在这里结果才是最重要的。忘记“伦理程序”或“人道待遇”之类的东西吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm starting to have serious misgivings about leadership around here. At least I've got you to talk to, huh ED-E?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始严重怀疑这里的领导能力了。至少我有你说说话，是吧，ED-E？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Whitley, there you are. Orders from Colonel Autumn - he feels the Eyebot Duraframe project isn't advancing quickly enough. I'm to-
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，惠特利，你来了。奥特姆上校的命令 - 他觉得眼球机器人硬脊膜框架项目进展不够快。我 -
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Howard [0100D314] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be ridiculous, it's just a machine. See here, I've already increased the navigation system's efficiency by 65%.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别傻了，这只是台机器。看这里，我已经把导航系统的效率提高了65%。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Howard [0100D314] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, Whitley, it's your lab. At least until I tell the Colonel about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，惠特利，这是你的实验室。至少在我把这事告诉上校之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Howard [0100D314] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Grant? What the hell do you think you're doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰特博士？你他妈以为你在干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't even disengage his damage-avoidance protocols! You're hurting him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你甚至都没解除他的伤害规避协议！你在伤害他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the hell out of here!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Experiment log 369248/B - Eyebot Duraframe universal interface override system. This is Dr. Whitley presiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验日志369248/B - 眼球机器人硬脊膜框架通用界面超驰系统。现在主持会议的是惠特利博士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've boosted signal gain and enlarged the overflow buffer system. That should ensure 100% connectivity and control. ED-E, whenever you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们提高了信号增益，扩大了溢流缓冲系统。这应该可以确保100%的连接和控制。ED-E，准备好了就开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Success! Um, reporting full success on 369248/B. ED-E was able to interface with and override the test panel in under three seconds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！成功了！嗯，369248/B宣告全面成功。ED-E能够在三秒内连接并超驰测试面板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great job, team. Now, let's start on the proposal for the full rollout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，伙计们。现在，让我们开始讨论全面推出的提案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, if you don't want to tell me, just say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你不想告诉我，直说就好。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure I heard it. Did something knock your memory modules loose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定我听到了。有什么东西把你的内存模块弄松了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it wasn't your boot-up sequence, it was a recording. Something about someone called RALPHIE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，那不是你的开机序列，那是一段录音。关于一个叫"拉尔菲"的人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that sound you played? Some kind of memory glitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才放的是什么声音？某种内存故障？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful, Tommy - I've never seen a robot like that before. It might be dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，汤米...我从没见过这样的机器人。它可能很危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Father [0100D312] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, son... what if someone comes looking for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，儿子...如果有人来找它怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Father [0100D312] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, boy. But if he breaks anything, it's coming out of your allowance!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，孩子。但如果它弄坏了什么东西，那就从你的零用钱里扣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Father [0100D312] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, ED-E, I'm sure you didn't make the entire trip in one go. It's still impressive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，ED-E，我肯定你不是一次就走完全程的。这仍然令人印象深刻。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, ED-E, I don't want to hear your recordings of "human mating calls." That's just... wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，ED-E，我才不想听你的 "人类叫床声" 录音，太不堪入耳了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, I'd better be careful what I say to you, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？ 好吧，我最好小心我跟你说的话，嗯？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I would have liked him.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He should have obeyed orders. Without respect for the chain of command, the whole unit falls apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他应该服从命令。如果没有对指挥系统的尊重，整个部队就会分崩离析。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'm beginning to see where you get it from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我开始明白你是从哪学来的了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better you than me. Let's do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来肯定比我强，咱们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, ED-E, I won't let you sacrifice yourself like this. There has to be another way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，ED-E，我不会让你这样牺牲自己。一定还有别的办法！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you... are you saying you can stop this missile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是...你是说你能阻止这枚导弹？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like that kid was pretty fond of you. Why did you leave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来这孩子挺喜欢你的，你为什么要离开？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time to talk - I don't like the look of this place, we should keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没时间聊天了...我可不喜欢这地方，我们应该继续前进。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, we need to keep going.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whitley turned you loose all on your own? That must have been scary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠特利把你一个人放出来？那一定很吓人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're trying to get all the way to Navarro? Isn't that in NCR territory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你想一路去找纳瓦罗？那不是在NCR的领土吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... right. Navarro. That... sure is far? From where you started?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...对，纳瓦罗。那...真的很远？你从哪里开始的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess Whitley found a way to keep you from being scrapped. Let's keep going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来惠特利找到了让你免于报废的办法。我们继续。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you record everything that's said around you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会把周围的人说的话都录下来吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like Dr. Whitley was a bit of a rogue element.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来惠特利博士是个不守规矩的人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, do you kiss your mother with that mouth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，你是用这张嘴亲你妈妈的吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to tell me. I would have beat the crap out of her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用告诉我，我会揍的她屁股尿流的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: RALPHIE who? You're still not making sense, ED-E.
ESP.TRADUIT: "拉尔菲"是谁？你还是没讲明白，ED-E。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the hell is "General Winters?" The recording mentioned a Colonel Autumn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 录音里提到了一个秋天(Autumn)上校，那么 "冬(winters)将军" 又他妈的是哪位？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a terrible story, ED-E, but we should get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这故事太糟糕了，ED-E，但我们该走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Grant sounds like a war crime waiting to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰特博士听起来像是战争罪犯。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like Dr. Whitley really cared about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来惠特利博士真的很在乎你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you'll see him again someday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有一天你会再见到他。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm sure he's fine. Wherever he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我相信他很好。无论他在哪。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it might be enough to get us through this silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，也许足够让我们穿过这个发射井了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only panels with a dish-shaped receiver? The console in the main room had one of those, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要带碟形接收器的面板？我想主房间的控制台上就有一个。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that the voice of your creator? What happened to him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是你的创造者的声音吗？他发生了什么事？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a recording from your development - are you saying you can override electronic security?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的一段开发录音 - 你是说你可以绕过电子安全系统吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I could use your help getting out of here. Can you come with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我需要你帮我离开这里，你能跟我来吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E? What are you doing here?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 这个眼球机器人在这里做什么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It could be one of those robo-viruses. You might be contagious - stay away from other computers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是某种机器人病毒。你可能会被传染 - 远离其他电脑。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably just some old data floating around in your memory. Nothing to worry about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能只是一些旧数据在你的内存中浮动。没什么好担心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope those bastards got what was coming to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那些杂种得到应有的惩罚。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see why you left that place, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我知道你为什么要离开那里了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He must have tried to change things. He doesn't seem like the type to let that slide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他一定是想改变些什么，他不像是那种会听之任之的人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He sounds more like a father than an inventor in these logs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这些日志里，他听起来更像个父亲，而不是发明家。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's press on. We've got a lot of ground to cover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们继续吧，还要走很长的路呢。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe they'd approve that. I've met enough robots to know they're more than just machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不敢相信他们会同意。我见过很多机器人，我知道它们不仅仅是机器。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whitley was really protective of his Eyebots, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠特利真的很保护她的眼球机器，对吧？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are more robots like you? With the same memory and everything? Interesting....
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这样的机器人还有很多吗？拥有同样的记忆和一切？有趣...

ESP.ORIGINAL: This silo must have some pretty advanced engineering facilities to remote-scan you and build copies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个发射井肯定有一些非常先进的工程设备可以远程扫描你并制作副本。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're some kind of... robot clone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是某种...克隆机器人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a copy? Made by the military bases in the Divide? Weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个复制品？是大裂谷的军事基地制造的吗？真奇怪。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slow down, slow down - what do you mean you're not the ED-E I know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 慢点，慢点 - 你说你不是我认识的那个ED-E是什么意思？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E? What are you doing in here all alone? And who left these old videos playing? Come on, let's get you into your recharge bay.
ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E？你一个人在这里干什么？是谁放的这些旧录像？来吧，我带你去充电舱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got a big day tomorrow.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Whitley [0100D311] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it. The Legion has this coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别在意，我们给军团来一发吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care! I'll just change the missile's target myself. I never liked the NCR anyways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎！我自己去改变导弹的目标。反正我也不喜欢NCR。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If... if you're really sure you want this, okay. Go ahead and stop the missile. And... goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果...如果你真的想这样，好吧，去阻止导弹吧。还有...再见。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure this is the only way to stop the missile from launching?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定这是阻止导弹发射的唯一办法吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like I can still choose the missile's actual target. Maybe we can work with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来我还是可以选择导弹的实际攻击目标的，也许我们能搞定它。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the log said that this kind of encryption would kill you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是日志上说这种加密方式会害死你！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Illinois? So that's where you got that plate. The other you, I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊利诺伊州？就是你拿到那个模板的地方？我意思是，另一个你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Illin-what? Come on, you're making that name up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊利...什么？得了吧，这名字是你瞎编的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was it worth it? You still haven't made it to Navarro yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这值得吗？你还没到纳瓦罗呢。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gave that up to continue Whitley's mission?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你放弃了这些来继续惠特利的任务？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like they blew out your primary stabilizing jets. I can't believe you kept going after that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来他们炸掉了你的主稳定喷射流。我不相信你在那之后还能继续前进。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That bullet probably did something bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那颗子弹可能做了些坏事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No wonder you didn't make it all the way to Navarro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难怪你没能一路走到纳瓦罗。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're lucky you got away from them. They would have sold you for scrap in a heartbeat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能摆脱他们已经很幸运了。他们会立刻把你当废品卖了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiders, huh? Amateurs. I'd have tracked you down and salvaged you for scrap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者，嗯？外行，如果是我就会找到你，把你当废品回收了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet Whitley would be proud of you for making it this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌惠特利一定会为你走到这一步而感到骄傲。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like it wasn't easy for him, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来这对他来说也不容易。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm amazed you didn't break down somewhere along the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你没有在路上的某个地方报废。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And this road - has reached its end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而这条路 - 已经走到了尽头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Couriers finally, really did it. They blew up the lands West and East of the Mojave... damning them all to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差们最终，真的做到了。他们炸掉了莫哈维西部以及东部的土地...把他们全部送进了地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The act was discovered 200 years later, as other Couriers explored the Mojave wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 200年后，当其他邮差探索莫哈韦废土时，这种行为才被发现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, they saw NCR relics, reminders of their once proud history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，他们看到了NCR的遗迹，提醒他们曾经骄傲的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide erupted in fire, violent, red, as the last message of the two Couriers arced into the sky...
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着两名邮差的最后一条信息射向天空，大裂谷爆发出猛烈的红色火焰...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The missiles rained like spears down on the land, burning flags and communities alike... destroying all they struck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 导弹像长矛一样倾泻在土地上，烧毁了旗帜和社区...摧毁了它们所击中的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The history of the West was erased for the second time, thorough and complete... and America slept once more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西方世界的历史再次被彻底抹去...而美国也再次沉睡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide erupted in fire as the flame trail of the two Couriers' last message arced into the sky...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当两名邮差最后一条信息的火焰尾迹直冲云霄时，大裂谷燃起了火焰...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running low on Small Energy Cells. Can you make me more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的小型能量电池快用完了，你能帮我再做一些吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some Microfusion Cells. Can you make some?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些核融合电池. 可以制造一点吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me access your multitools. I want to make something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我用用你的工具组，我想造点东西。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make some ammo. Can you help me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要制造点弹药，能帮帮我吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I feel the same way. Why do you think I became a courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我也有同样的感觉，你觉得我为什么会成为一名邮差？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, I won't let any mean old generals get you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，我不会让任何卑鄙的老将军抓到你的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do whatever I can to help you get home - after we deal with things here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定会竭尽所能帮你回去，不过当然是我们搞定这里的事情之后。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, ED-E, I'm sure RALPHIE the Robot would be very proud of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，ED-E，我肯定那个机器人"拉尔菲"会为你感到自豪的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, ED-E. We've got to fly far and fly fast if we want to get to the end of the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，ED-E。如果想要走到大裂谷的尽头，我们就就得飞得更快更远。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, ED-E. Time to move on.
Is that what you're doing? Trying to find your way home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你在做的吗？想找到回家的路？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suddenly a lot of things make more sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 突然间，许多事情变得更有意义了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: RALPHIE, hurry! If mean old General Winters catches you, you'll never make it home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉尔菲，快点！如果卑鄙的老温特斯将军抓住了你，你就回不了家了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Child [0100D315] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! RALPHIE, fly far! Fly fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！拉尔菲，飞远点！飞快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Child [0100D315] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But why would he do that? It wasn't to lure me here, Ulysses already knew I was coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他为什么要这么做？这不是为了引诱我，尤利西斯已经知道我要来了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: An override frequency? So, what, Ulysses just... called you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个覆盖频率？所以，尤利西斯只是...叫你来这儿？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I came after you. I wasn't going to leave you behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然来找你了，我不会丢下你不管的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened? You just took off like you finally found home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么事？ 你就这样走了，还以为你终于找到家了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever he's planning, Ulysses obviously wants you there. Come on - I'd hate to disappoint him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他在计划什么，尤利西斯显然希望你在那里。来吧，我可不想让他失望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're at the mercy of your programming, I get it. It's not your fault. Now, are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被你的程序所支配，我明白，这不是你的错。现在，你准备好出发了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, well, don't do it again. Come on, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，别再这样了。来吧，我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. We're ending this. Right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧。我们要结束这一切，就现在。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must have been an override function piggybacked on that broadcast. That's what pulled you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定是那个广播里附带了一个重载函数，所以你才来这里。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just heard that signal and flew off. Are you catching the robot crazies or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到那个信号就飞走了，你是在抓那些疯狂的机器人还是怎么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell happened? You just ran off on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到底发生了什么？你就这么丢下我跑了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play me the trailer for RALPHIE the Robot's Incredible Odyssey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我播放《机器人拉尔菲的神奇大冒险》的预告片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I liked the one where the little kid found you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢那个小孩子找到你的那段。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hear the one where you were attacked by raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来听听你被掠夺者袭击的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to hear the recording of when Whitley sent you on your journey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想听听惠特利送你上路的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play me Whitley's phone call with Colonel Autumn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我放一下惠特利和奥特姆上校的通话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hear the log where Whitley talks about Colonel Autumn's plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来听听惠特利谈论奥特姆上校计划的日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about the one where Dr. Whitley yelled at Dr. Grant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 惠特利博士对格兰特博士大吼大叫的那个怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play the log about your ability to crack encrypted systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 播放关于你破解加密系统的能力的日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to replay one of those audio logs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你重放一段音频日志。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mayday, mayday, mayday! This is NCR Trooper Gleeson calling anyone listening on this channel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求救，求救，求救！NCR士兵格利森呼叫正在收听这个频道的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trooper Gleeson [0100BD37] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My platoon has been wiped out, and I am pinned down by a goddamn huge Deathclaw in a place called the Divide!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的排已经全军覆没，我被一只该死的巨型死亡爪困在一个叫大裂谷的地方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trooper Gleeson [0100BD37] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So far I've been able to scare it away with flares, but I lack any explosives to kill the damn thing! Please assist! I say again, please assist!
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前我还能用照明弹吓走它，但是却没有足够的炸药解决这鬼东西！请求支援！重复！请求支援！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trooper Gleeson [0100BD37] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mayday, mayday, mayday! This is NCR Trooper Gleeson calling anyone listening on this channel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求救，求救，求救！NCR士兵格利森呼叫正在收听这个频道的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trooper Gleeson [0100BD37] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more echoes of the Bull and the Bear. The rest will share their fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不再有公牛和熊的回声，其余的人也将面临同样的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think you'd outlast the machines. Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到你能比那些机器活得久。很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dead men of the New World... they've come for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新世界的死人...他们来找你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took my machines? Hnh. Underestimated you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 控制了我的机器？唔，低估你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just you and me, then. Always was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，就你和我了。一直都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Machines might keep you alive, but they won't save you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器也许能让你活下来，但救不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't stop the Old World's return, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无法阻止旧世界的回归，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've shown them fear, but not enough. More will come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经向他们展示了恐惧，但还不够，还会有更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch the shadows - the beasts cloak themselves in Old World tech.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心那些阴影 - 那些野兽用旧世界的科技把自己隐匿起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've broken them. The Bear and the Bull have no more shadows to throw at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经摧毁他们了，熊和牛不会有更多的影子投射到我们身上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old World's running out of machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的机器快用完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 又一个旧世界的士兵倒下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have forgotten all you were, traded glory for savagery. Fitting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经忘记了自己的一切，用荣耀换取了野蛮。很合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 仁慈的杀戮 - 让他们安息吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beasts from the Divide. To the Divide, they return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自大裂谷的野兽，它们回到了大裂谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch the floor. Mines. Tactics of the Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意脚下，有地雷。熊的战术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They come for us, East and West alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为我们而来，不管是东方还是西方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come all this way - to die alone.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll end you - and your history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会终结你...还有你的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't need Old World medicine to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要旧世界的药物来杀死你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill as many as you want - the Divide will birth more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想杀多少就杀多少...大裂谷会生出更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroying my machines won't help you. This facility will make more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 摧毁我的机器对你没有任何帮助，这个工厂会生产更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you speaking through ED-E?
The idea of a machine bearing a message new to you? Thought that was how House relayed all his messages... through his robots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让机器传递新信息的想法？我还以为豪斯就是这样传达信息的...通过他的机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The machine... the robot. No, not Legion... less history than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器...机器人。不，不是军团...历史没那么长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I heard, Legion didn't use machines as mouthpieces to hide from their enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，军团并没有使用机器作为传声筒来躲避敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The robot with you... all of them are machines - radios, Old World tech reshaped with new hands. Historians. Couriers, carrying messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你在一起的那个机器人...他们全都是机器 - 收音机，经新人之手重塑过旧世界科技。历史学家，邮差们，带着消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen them as I've walked the Divide, tending other machines. That one... sealed inside the Hopeville silo. Sign America is waking up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我走过大裂谷时，看到他们在照看其他机器。 这一个...封存在黎明镇的发射井里。这标志着美国正在苏醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will follow you, obey you. Carry it until we are face to face, then there'll be no more need for it to carry my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它会跟着你，服从你。带着它，直到我们面对面，到那时就不需要它来承载我的话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you better tell me who you are, and what you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你最好告诉我你是谁，你想要什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a courier. Courier Six... was Courier Six. Like you - and not like you, in all the ways that matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个邮差， 六号邮差...是六号邮差。跟你一样...但也跟你不一样，在所有重要的方面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spent too many years looking for you - now, letting you come to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经花了太多年来找你...现在，该让你来到我身边了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought carrying that Chip would end you, no... you got lives in you, hard to kill. Storms, bullets... sand and wind, yet still you walk. For now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还以为带着那个芯片会杀死你，不...你命硬着呢，很难被杀死。风暴、子弹...沙和风，你依然行走。到目前为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough talking. You went to a lot of trouble to lure me here, so let's get on with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说了。你费了好大劲才把我引到这里来，我们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: America sleeps ahead of you, its nightmares filled with quakes, storms. You'll need to find your own path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国沉睡在你的面前，它的噩梦充满了地震和风暴。你需要找到自己的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That means waking America's spears up from their slumber. There's ways - warheads set off the collapse, warheads could open the gates again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着要把美国的长矛从沉睡中唤醒。有办法-弹头引起的坍塌，弹头可以再次将门开启。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're resourceful. That machine, robot with you - can help you find the warheads you need to destroy... and their trigger, the detonator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很机智。那个机器，跟着你的那个机器人 - 能帮你找到你需要摧毁的弹头...以及它们的引爆装置，起爆器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The way ahead is below. The tools are there. The rest - up to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前方的路在下面，工具就在那里。剩下的 - 由你决断。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those... troops, NCR or Legion, the ones in the silo were already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些...士兵，NCR或者军团，发射井里的人都已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are those the bodies I saw in the silo? The soldiers that look like they'd been flayed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是我在发射井里看到的尸体吗？看起来像是被剥了皮的士兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you saw their corpses, you saw mercy. Got what they deserved, coming to the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看到了他们的尸体，你就看到了仁慈。来到大裂谷，他们得到了应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bear and Bull - NCR, Legion - came in waves. Before. And after. Right into the invisible fires... the wind, ground... collapsing beneath them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊和公牛 - NCR、军团 - 前赴后继。之前，之后，进入无形的火焰中...风、地面...在他们脚下坍塌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once under different flags, now they are equal in their hatred of the trespassers. You and I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经在不同的旗帜下，现在他们对侵害者的仇恨是对等的。你和我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide... this place is a slice of it. Old military. Can still smell the pride - and the fear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷...这地方只是其中的一部分。旧军队，还能嗅到骄傲和恐惧的气息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope of the Old World, wrapped in fencing, covered in storm. Got new inhabitants now other than ghosts, more recent... recruits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的希望，被栅栏包裹，被风暴笼罩。现在有了新的居民，除了鬼魂，更多是最近的...新成员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I'll find this trigger - then I'll come find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会找到这个引爆装置的 - 然后我再来找你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide will send its worst against you - it may break you. We'll see if you're stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷会把最坏的东西送给你 - 它可能会击垮你。我们来看看你是否更强壮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Road gets rougher from here... Courier. Left marks for you, colors'll tell the way - if you're smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路从这里开始变得更加崎岖...邮差。我为你留下了记号，颜色会为你指明方向 - 如果你够聪明的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll lead you to your home one more time, lead to the ending of it - maybe remind you why you wander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们会指引你再次回到家乡，指引你到达它的尽头 - 也许能提醒你为什么要流浪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not planning to go into the Divide after you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算跟在你后面进入大裂谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Courier would go to the Divide... but you will. And that's what sets us apart - we walk roads no other Courier will walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有邮差会去大裂谷...但你会。这就是我们与众不同的地方 - 我们走着其他邮差不会走的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And for you... you'll want to see your home one last time, see what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你来说...你会想最后看看你的家乡，看看发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're curious. You walk, leave ruin in your path... you can't leave alone. Still, the choice is yours... what I offer, it's the last I offer you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很好奇。你走着，在你的路上留下废墟...你不能独自离开。不过，选择权在你...我提供的，这是我最后一次给予。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care if you walk the Divide. Turn, walk the Mojave, fight beneath the flags... but you'll wonder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你是否穿越大裂谷。转身，漫步在莫哈维，在旗帜下战斗...但你会想知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't, the Divide will come to you, and the Mojave. That will be my message to you, like the message you had for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不这样做，大裂谷总有一天会降临在你和莫哈维之上。这将是我给你的信息，就像你给我的信息一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm coming after you? Think again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我是来找你的？ 再想想吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Long 15 is no more. The main supply line into NCR is cut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 15号公路不存在了，通往NCR的主要供应线路被切断了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No damage done, not yet. Maybe in years. Keeps the Bear fenced... if Caesar can't drive it back, fire might.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有造成破坏，暂时没有，也许几年以后。把熊关在围栏里...如果凯撒不能把它赶回去，火可能会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only delays the end for the Bull, a new wall for them to scale and cross... once they're done with the Mojave. And Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是拖延了公牛的结局，为他们建造了一堵新的墙，让他们攀登和跨越...一旦他们解决了莫哈韦，和胡佛水坝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never again do you or any other courier and caravan need walk that route. Let the Mojave breathe without that asphalt scar raking it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你或其他任何邮差和商队再也不需要走那条路了。让莫哈韦沙漠呼吸吧，不要被沥青留下的疤痕弄脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dry Wells is destroyed - that was your birthplace?
ESP.TRADUIT: 枯井已经被毁了...那是你的出生地？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, opposite of that. It's where my tribe was taken. Where another history was put to the blade, lesson taught.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，正好相反。那是我的部落被夺走的地方。又一段历史在刀光中泯灭了，那是一段教训。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
