ESP.ORIGINAL: It is where we realized Vulpes did not approach us as equals. Where we realized the wolf had come, and we watched our history die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里我们意识到沃尔普斯并没有平等地对待我们。在那里，我们意识到狼来了，我们看着我们的历史死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now it belongs to Legion... and all the death there now belongs to them as well. Not revenge... just the way of things when you own them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在它属于军团了...那里所有的死亡现在也属于他们。不是复仇...当你拥有他们的时候，事情就是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to hear more about Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想多听听胡佛水坝的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old World wall, run red with blood of Bear and Bull. It'll bleed more before the sun sets on the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的墙，被熊和公牛的血染红。在莫哈维日落之前，还会流更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That place and I have a past, owe it a debt - and it owes me. If your path takes you there, know you're not the only one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个地方和我有一段过去，欠它一个人情，它也欠我一个人情。如果你的道路把你带到了那里，要知道你不是唯一的一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the wall by which this age will be measured, the gravestone of the Mojave. Old World never meant it as such.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是衡量这个时代的墙，是莫哈维的墓碑。 旧世界从来没有这样的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A question one could have asked you not long ago, before walking the road West into the storms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是不久前，在向西走到风暴中之前，人们可能会问你的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to be here, see what was done. It's custom of the Bear to never see the marks it claws in the land... not my custom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得在这里，看看发生了什么。熊的习惯是永远不看它在土地上的留下的爪痕...这可不是我的习惯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's why you've come, too - need to see where the missile from Ashton touched ground down below, in Hopeville... the Courier's Mile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这也是你来的原因 - 想看看阿什顿的导弹落在黎明镇的什么地方...邮差之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to be here, see what was done. In the Divide, in Hopeville... the Courier's Mile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得在这里，看看发生了什么。在大裂谷，在黎明镇...邮差之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me again what you're doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能再告诉我一次你在这里做什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was hoping you could help me shape something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你能帮我塑造一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what gifts the Mojave has for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们看看莫哈维给我们带来了什么礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's make something new from the old.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. I'm going to teach you what crossing the wrong Courier means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先别管这个。我要让你领教下了惹恼了不该惹的邮差是什么下场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen creatures like that before now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前从没见过那样的生物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you mean, "slower death for the Mojave?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的"莫哈维的缓慢死亡"是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Death'll come from below. In the Divide, need to watch the sky and ground... Mojave'll be easy prey for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 死亡自从地下来临。在大裂谷，你需要提防天空还有地面...莫哈维很容易成为它们的猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you say, "slower death for the Mojave," you mean they're spreading out from the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的"莫哈维的缓慢死亡"意思是他们是正从大裂谷向外扩散。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Mojave needs to survive itself first... does that, Tunnelers will be next on the list.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]莫哈维首先要活下去...如果能做到的话，掘穴者就是名单上的下一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this is the High Road... where does it lead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是正路...它通向何方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the end of the High Road lies Ashton - its silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正路的尽头就是阿什顿 - 和它的发射井。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That machine with you, it can open it, wake it up, like it did the one in Hopeville.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个跟着你的机器，它能打开它，唤醒它，就像在黎明镇发生的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the flayed Hopeville soldiers looked like NCR... but fought beside others in Legion armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黎明镇上那些剥了皮的士兵看起来像是NCR...但是和他们并肩作战的人却身着军团的盔甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see true. Not scavengers... it's what they wore before this all happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到的是真的。不是拾荒者...这仅仅是他们在这一切发生之前的打扮而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Those soldiers in Hopeville... were once NCR, I'm sure of it. Why were they with the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]那些在黎明镇的士兵...曾经是NCR，我敢肯定。他们为什么和军团在一起？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pain makes for strange allies... the hate the Bear and Bull shared across the battlefield, now turned against the Divide. Few survived... intact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 痛苦造就了奇怪的盟友...熊和牛在战场上共有的仇恨现在转向了大裂谷。很少有人能活下来...完好无损的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many NCR were already here when the destruction happened. Keeping the route East open, in fear of Caesar. Fear of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毁灭发生的时候许多NCR就已经在这里了。保持东部路线的畅通，因为害怕凯撒，对军团的恐惧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Marked Men in Hopeville - some had strange masks and blades I'd never seen before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些黎明镇的烙印者...有些人戴着我从未见过的奇怪面具和刀刃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You haven't seen enough of the Legion yet to see what they worship... what they hold on to, even after what happened to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还没见识过足够的军团去理解他们所崇拜的...以及他们所坚持的，即使在他们身上发生了那些事之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Those Legionnaires in Hopeville wore Legion armor - and strange masks and blades.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]那些黎明镇里的军团士兵穿着军团盔甲...还有奇怪的面具和利刃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They bear false versions of Legate Lanius' mask, the one Caesar fashioned for him. Thought it was an insult at first.... know better now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都戴着着山寨的拉尼厄斯特使面具，那是凯撒为他量身订做的。起初还以为这是一种侮辱...现在我明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's shaped from Divide metal, not with care and strength, but with hate. Keeps them anchored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是以大裂谷的金属制成的，这之中夹杂的并非谨慎与力量，而是怨恨。戴上后便如同烙印般难以摘下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crude, effective - like the blades they carry, distant mirrors of their Legate. A symbol they can hold on to - while the Divide tears at them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 粗糙，但有效 - 正如他们背负的刀剑，他们军团特使的遥远镜像。当大裂谷撕扯他们的时候，一个可以坚持下去的象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were the creatures in the underpass?
ESP.TRADUIT: 地下通道里的那些生物是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tunnelers. Predators that make their own roads beneath the ground here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掘穴者，在地底下自己开路的掠食者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Divide broke their sky, showed them the world above - and the scent of new prey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷打破了它们的天空，向它们展示了上面的世界 - 以及新猎物的气味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be a slower death for the Mojave than bombs and fire... but they'll come for its people, from where they least expect - below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对莫哈韦来说，这是一个比炸弹和火焰更缓慢的死亡...但他们会来找它的人民，从他们最意想不到的地方 - 地下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of this. Tell me where you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就此打住好了。告诉我你在哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You delivered a package. Had markings that matched those in the Divide. Not all... but enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你送过一个包裹，它拥有与那些大裂谷里配套的记号。并不全...但足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Military markings, from some place the Bear had savaged in the West. Maybe seeing those markings on it reminded you of home... made you carry it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军事标记，来自熊在西部野蛮攻击过的某个地方。也许看到上面的那些标记让你想起了家...你才带上了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This canyon is miles long - maybe longer. Where can I find you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个峡谷有几英里长...也许更长。 我在哪里可以找到你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the end of the Divide, through the trenches and wreckage - that's where you'll find me. My new home, here, amongst dead men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大裂谷的尽头，穿过战壕和废墟，你能在那里找到我。我的新家，在这里，在死人中间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and that machine, keep your eyes on the tower that cuts the horizon... you'll find your way. Made it this far... not much farther to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和那个机器，盯着切开地平线的那座高塔...你会找到你的路。已经走了这么远...没有多远的路要走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in talking - only getting through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对谈话不感兴趣，只想熬过这一关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...back again. Left that crater behind. Got a few holotapes left, ones from the medical center.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...又回来了。别理那个弹坑了，医疗中心那儿还有几个全息磁带没拿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The woman... she fixed the recorder. Said it wouldn't last, repayment for me fixing her. She doesn't like debts, can respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那女人...她修好了录音机。 她说，这持续不了太久，是对我治好她的报答。 她不喜欢欠债，这一点值得尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Payment enough, just to hear someone who believes in the Brotherhood of Steel. Not Elijah. Different view. Same madness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 付出这么多，只是为了听到一个相信钢铁兄弟会的人。不是以利亚，不同的观点，同样的疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She answered me on their philosophy, their way of seeing - the roads they walk. Dead-ends. Empty... as if technology can solve anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她告诉了我关于他们的哲学，他们看待事物的方式 - 他们走的路。死路一条。空洞...好像科技可以解决所有事情似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Empty's proof where that road leads. Just like the Divide, and all the roads that lead to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大空洞就证明了这条道路通向何处。就像大裂谷，以及通往大裂谷的所有道路一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I walked the Great Salt Lake as Caesar's eye, then his hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我作为凯撒的眼睛走过大盐湖，然后是他的手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mongrels there, two-legs and four. Saw the walls of New Canaan the scavengers circled... hadn't the strength or fire to take. Too high, too strong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些杂交犬，不管是两条腿的还是四条腿的，还有四处游荡的拾荒者...我看到了新迦南的城墙，但却没有攻破它的的力量和武器。它太高，太坚固。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: White Legs, they were born for war, they run to it, hungry for battle... yet their hunger is to be a part of history, something larger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白腿，他们为战争而生，他们奔向战场，渴望战争...然而，他们渴望成为历史的一部分，更大的部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like the Legion. As always, brought them a message - from Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像军团。一如既往，给他们带来一个消息 - 来自凯撒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If New Canaan burns, Caesar might see them. "Might." Even the chance was a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果新迦南被烧毁，凯撒才可能会看到他们。“可能”，连这个机会都是谎言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: To honor Caesar - destroy the history of New Canaan, and the way they carry it - in their generations and family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了向凯撒致敬 - 摧毁新迦南的历史，和他们承载历史的方式 - 他们的世代和家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar respects such strength, I told them. That - that was truth, even if "strength" wasn't the word. Obedience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒尊重这种力量，我告诉他们。那 - 那是事实，即使 "力量 "这个词不是很合适。是服从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be willing to kill anyone, children, mothers, the weak, elders... if these New Canaanites value the generations, that is what you must kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须乐意去杀掉 所有人，儿童、母亲、弱者、老人...如果说那些新迦南人珍视的是宗族，那就是你必须杀掉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was like Vulpes was speaking through me. Use the night, silence, and fire to change their words to pleas, to screams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像沃尔普斯通过我说话一样。利用黑夜、寂静和火焰，将他们的话语变为哀求，变为尖叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need for bombs when hate will do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了仇恨，就不需要炸弹了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... asked the White Legs to destroy a people with ancestry, going back thousands of years - another death of history, lost to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...要求白腿部落摧毁一个祖先可以追溯到几千年前的民族 - 又一段历史从此灰飞烟灭，湮灭在时光中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The New Canaanites... they supplied medicine. Food, traded with others. Civilization, a hand from the past, not history...
ESP.TRADUIT: 新迦南人...他们提供医药 食物，与他人进行交易。文明，来自过去的手，而不是历史...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...but maybe a past deeper, farther than that to a place where this... God really exists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新迦南人...他们提供医药 食物，与他人进行交易。文明，来自过去的手，而不是历史...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If so, his handiwork and people belong elsewhere, not in this place. Another symbol, like Bear and Bull, with no meaning in the present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这样，他的作品和他的人民属于别的地方，而不是这里。另一种象征，就像熊和牛，现在没有任何意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Emptiness here - like the sands of the Great Salt Lake, echoed. The beating in the Divide sky... like storm drums of the White Legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里如此空寂 - 就像大盐湖的沙子一样回响着。大裂谷的天空敲打着，就像白腿部落奏起的风暴之鼓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ran with them on the salt beds, at Caesar's command - cut the throats of the two-headed Bear, cut all communities off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在凯撒的命令下和他们一起在盐层上奔跑 - 割断双头熊的喉咙，切断所有群体之间的联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use storm, sky. Disease. Fire, starvation... and the violence of the ignorant to ruin all who could... might stand against him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用风暴、天空、疾病、火和饥饿，无知之人的暴力会毁灭所有...可能反对他的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the White Legs... they couldn't live on their own, like most scavengers. So gave them purpose - turned their hunger into a weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是白腿...他们不能像大多数拾荒者一样，靠自己的力量生活。所以给了他们目标 - 把他们的饥饿变成武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wall of New Canaan... too high for Caesar. Too proud, maybe - or maybe something there, from his past, that needed killing. Memory of Graham.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新迦南的墙...对凯撒来说太高了。也许是他太骄傲了 - 也许那里有什么来自他过去的东西，需要杀死，关于格雷汉姆的记忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helped them dig out Canaan supply caches, and other secrets the sands hid - bunkers, filled with powered weapons even the Brotherhood might desire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助他们挖出迦南的补给仓库，以及其他隐藏在沙土中的秘密 - 地堡，里面装满了连兄弟会都想要的动力武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They called these new weapons "storm drums" in the firing of shells. Taught them the power in the casings... to channel the spirits in their guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们称这些新武器是发射炮弹的“风暴之鼓”。教会了他们弹壳的威力...引导他们枪中的灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me... they called me the Flag-Bearer. Glory in my hand, in my staff that still bore the weight of the Old World just as the symbol on my back did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...他们叫我旗手。荣耀在我的手中，在我的手杖上，它仍然承载着旧世界的重量，就像我背上的象征一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned their weapons as a means of respect. And when it came their turn to pay respect to me... history came rushing back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我学习他们的武器是为了表示尊敬。当轮到他们向我致敬时，历史再次重演。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't escape what's been done. History's there... no matter how far you walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经发生的事无法逃避。历史存在于你所在之处，无论你走多远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever wanted to speak to history - just to know the why of it? I don't. Not any longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是否曾想过与历史对话 - 只想知道原因？我没有，现在没有了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's old stories about gods and men, past history, into myth - where the gods, they're like children... petulant, cruel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有关于神和人的古老故事，过去的历史，变成了神话 - 其中的神，他们就像孩子..任性，残酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those were the voices of the Big Empty, the past. Couldn't leave well enough alone, had to ask. Had to ask the why of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是大空洞的声音，是过去的声音。我不能就这么置之不理，必须得去追问缘由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their answers were madness. And power, stronger than me, would take a hundred Elijahs... someone tougher than him or I to best them in their Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的回答很疯狂，而力量，比我更强，需要一百个以利亚...比他或我更强大的人，才能在他们的穹顶中胜过他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't know why they were there, what had led to that point, their names - like serpents devouring themselves, cannibalizing their own thoughts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不知道自己为什么在那里，是什么引导他们而来，他们的名字 - 像蛇一样吞噬着自己，吃掉自己的思想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When all seemed lost, thought it was the end - my anger gave me strength to ask them my last question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一切似乎都失去了，我以为是结束的时候 - 我的愤怒给了我力量，向他们提出了最后一个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Who are you, that do not know your history?"
ESP.TRADUIT: "你们是谁，连自己的历史都不知道？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they awoke. For... a short time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们醒来了...只是一小会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The flag you wear, they said. We remember. America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说，你身上的旗帜，我们记得。美利坚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't just a flag to them... it was a place, an idea they had cared for. Once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对他们来说它不仅仅只是一张旗帜...而是一个地方，一个他们关心的信念。曾经。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They told me what it was like to grow in that world... all they had done to lift it up... protect it. They... didn't know it was gone, that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们告诉我在那个世界成长是什么感觉...他们曾为之奋斗...保护它。他们...不知道它已经不存在了，那...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...yet they had cared once. Before forgetting their history.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...然而他们曾经关心过，在忘记他们的历史之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As they were talking... kept seeing the Courier's shadow behind them, giving each their words weight. History cast aside... a home, left behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说话时...我一直能感受到他们身上落着的邮差的影子，让他们每个人的话都更有分量。历史被抛向一边...一个家，被丢在了后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I listened. I asked. Was there anything left? Anything that still carries America's voice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听着，我问道，还有什么剩下的吗？有什么东西仍然承载着美国的声音吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they told me I had already been there. I and one other, walking right out of history deeper than we knew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他们告诉我，我已经去过那里了。我和另一个人，径直走出历史，比我们所知道的更深远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They told me what lies in the heart of the Divide, what can be found there. And the words to awaken it - and the one to speak them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们告诉我大裂谷的心脏中有什么，那里能找到什么。还有唤醒它的话语 - 以及说出那话语的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Empty - there's something hidden there, a crater, past wind and sand - so deep in the desert, there's no turning back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大空洞 - 有什么东西藏在那里，一座环形山，饱经风沙 - 在大沙漠的腹地，没有回头路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finding the crater was an accident, was following the weather patterns - the Divide sky torn like that, man's violence, not nature's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发现那个环形山纯属意外，是跟随着气候变化 - 大裂谷的天空就那样支离破碎，那是人为的暴力，而非自然的作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That violence in the sky, had a source. Tracked it. Like following a river current.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天空中的暴力，是有根源的。我追着它，就像追溯河流的源头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Left the colors to mark my way, like always, case someone finds them, learns the pattern - the Courier might.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我留下颜色来标记路线，像往常一样，如果有人发现它们，理解这种模式 - 邮差可能会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I thought sand and wind would never end... came to the crater.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我以为风沙永无止境的时候...我来到了环形山。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there... there was an Old World facility, a weather station, at the edge, still raking the sky with electricity and generators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里...有一座旧世界的设施，一个气象站，在边缘，仍在用电和发电机掠过天空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And beyond it... saw the rest of the Old World hell there, all carved up like garden plots. Had to see what was there, couldn't leave it be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在它之后...我看到了旧世界地狱的其余部分，全都像花园一样被切割开来。我必须看看那里有什么，无法置之不理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things sleep in the Big Empty, the Brotherhood woke them up - can't move quiet, any more than the two-headed Bear can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大空洞里有东西在沉睡，兄弟会唤醒了它们 - 无法悄无声息的行动，就像双头熊一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when they woke up, it was like all of history waking up at once. Almost didn't make it out. Almost. Left with answers I never intended.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而当它们苏醒时，就像整个历史同时苏醒。险些无法脱身，险些。带着我从未想要的答案离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last tape, last message. In case... you best me. If you're hearing this, you have, through blood or word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一盘磁带，最后一条消息，以防...你胜过我。如果你听到这条，那你已经通过血液或语言做到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This message, and all that lies with it - it is for you, Courier. If you want to know the... why of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条消息，以及与之相关的一切 - 都是为你准备的，邮差。如果你想知道事情的...缘由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This world, I've walked a good part of it... I stopped only because of you. What you did - gave me pause.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界，我走过了其中相当大一部分...我的脚步只为你而停下。你所做的 - 让我停下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long ago, I crossed the Colorado, the first among the Legion to see Hoover Dam in all its glory... an Old World wall, yet bridging two sides.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很久以前，我穿过了科罗拉多河，成为了第一位见证胡佛水坝辉煌的军团成员...一面旧世界的墙，却连接着两岸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And beyond it, a symbol of a two-headed Bear, an idea great enough to challenge Caesar himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之上，是一个双头熊的象征，一个足以挑战凯撒本人的伟大理念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might kill him, taking it, whether he won or lost. The Bull needs to fight, needs the challenge, without it... it falters, dies in the dust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能杀了他，夺走它，无论他是赢是输。公牛需要战斗，需要挑战，一旦脱离了这些...它将步履蹒跚，死在尘土中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be a lesson there, in you and me. Leave the thought behind the message to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这对你我都是一个教训。把这个想法留在给你的这条消息里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My message is this - the destruction that has been wrought, at the Divide - or elsewhere, if you couldn't stop me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 以下是我给你的信息 - 在大裂谷已经造成的破坏 - 或者别的什么地方，如果你无法阻止我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can happen again. It will keep happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都会再次发生。还会继续...一直发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If war doesn't change, men must change, and so must their symbols. Even if it is nothing at all, know what you follow, Courier...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果战争不会改变，那么人们必须改变，他们的象征也必须改变。即使一无所有，也要知道你在追随什么，邮差...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...just as I followed you, to the end. Whatever your symbol...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...就像我追随你一样，直到最后。无论你的象征是什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...carry it on your back, and wear it proudly when you stand at Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...背负着它，当你站在胡佛水坝前时，骄傲地展示它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The White Legs... meant to show respect, bribe me for Caesar's favor, echoing mannerisms and words...
ESP.TRADUIT: 白腿...这是为了表示尊敬，为了凯撒的青睐而贿赂我，附和着我的言谈举止...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Showed them tech caches, taught them the workings of chamber and powder, spoke of Caesar's pride in those that used such things... lies. And...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给他们展示了科技库，教他们弹药与火药的原理，谈起凯撒对使用这些东西的人的骄傲...都是谎言。而且...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and then... they tried to honor me - not the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...然后...他们试图向我表示敬意 - 而非军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They brought me before the campfire one night, showed me how they changed themselves, how they wore their hair now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天晚上，他们把我带到篝火前，让我看他们是如何改变自己的，他们现在是如何梳理头发的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was like my entire dead tribe in the firelight, teeth grinning red in the dark - eager corpses, blood-covered ghosts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就像我的整个死去的部落在火光中，牙齿在黑暗中咧开的红色 - 急切的尸体，血淋淋的幽灵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They... had taken my braids, the way of the Twisted Hairs, as if it showed they were like me, of me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们...模仿我的辫子，我们卷发部落的风俗，仿佛这表明他们像我。归属于我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...while every knot in their braids spoke of raping, violence - and ignorance of what the knots meant. They thought to show respect... defiled it.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...然而他们辫子上的每个结都在诉说着强奸、暴力以及对这些结真正意义的无知。他们认为这是一种尊重...实际上是亵渎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lost myself in trying to read the braids they wove, when I remembered they had put no meaning in it. They had no history of what it meant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在试图阅读他们编织的辫子时，我迷失了。直到我记起他们编织的辫子根本没有任何意义，他们对它的含义没有任何历史记忆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't even know the insult in the twists, knots... and Dry Wells came rushing back, the White Legs circled like that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们甚至不知道那些扭曲和结所代表的侮辱...从枯井匆忙返回，白腿部族围在那里...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was like looking at the dead of my tribe, reborn as ghosts - hateful, hungry, bowing to Caesar. Another history... gone, carried by me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就像眼看我部落里的亡者，重生为鬼魂 - 仇恨，饥饿，屈从于凯撒。另一段历史...消失了，由我独自承载。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([0100BD34]NVDLC04AudioHolotapes) Holotape Infos EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find anything in the dust of Hopeville?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在黎明镇的尘土里找到什么了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing but wind, sand... ash. More may reveal itself in time, not now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了风与沙...灰烬。也许随着时间的流逝更多的会慢慢浮现，但不是现在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're determined, return, might be something new surfaces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你下定决心，回来，可能会有新的发现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wind and blood has uncovered more beneath the soil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 风和血揭开了土壤下面更多的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want these Old World relics, they're yours... better you carry them than the Marked Men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要这些旧世界的遗物，那么它们都归你了...至少你带着它们比落在烙印者手里要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以教我点什么配方么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some materials I've gathered, if you wanted to take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收集了一些资料，如果你想看的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this where you're making camp?
Not a camp - vigil, maybe. Never claimed it as mine. If anyone owns the Divide... your claim is stronger than mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是营地 - 岗哨吧，或许。我从未声称它属于我。如果说有人拥有大裂谷...你的声明比我更有力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't feel like adding a campfire to the ones that already burn below. If you brought Mojave gifts, might be able to shape something for the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要想在下面已经燃烧的篝火上再加一把了。如果你带来了莫哈维的礼物，也许能在路上塑造一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends what history has to say about them. There's a lot the land can provide... if you know the road that led to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于历史会如何描述它们。这片土地可以提供很多...如果你知道通往它的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojave's got ways of healing most ills - if not, some tribe's usually found a way you didn't expect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维有治疗大多数疾病的方法 - 如果没有，一些部落通常会找到你意想不到的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like Healing Powders. Tribes back West only use Xander and Broc flower. There's a way the Twin Mothers in the East used to brew it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如治疗粉，西部的部落只使用山德根和布洛克花。不过东部的孪生母亲部落有另一种方法来酿造它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Called it Bitter Drink, mixed up the Xander and Broc in a bottle, added some kick to it so your head doesn't get all clouded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它叫苦味饮料，把山德根和布洛克花混合在一个瓶子里，加了一些效力，这样你的头就不会昏昏沉沉的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以教我点什么配方么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Antivenom's helpful around the Mojave with the Bark Scorpions. Even one sting can kill you. Tunneler bite can be just as bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抗毒血清在莫哈维对付树皮蝎很有帮助，被那玩意儿蛰一下就会没命。被掘穴者咬伤也同样严重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My tribe, Twisted Hairs, had a better way than Antivenom, if you act fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的部落，卷发部族有一个比抗毒血清更好的方法。当然，你得行动迅速才行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Snakebite Tourniquet - cuts off the venom, no need to scavenge glands and blood. Or drink that mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蛇毒止血带 - 直接阻断毒液，就不需要寻找腺体与血液了。或者喝那乱七八糟的玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Part of the reason we wore our hair like we did, like I do now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是我们发型弄成这样的原因之一，就像我现在这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's some for the road - trick to making it's not hard. Get bit, hook and twist it. Fast as blinking, doesn't give poison time to sink in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还有些路上用的 - 制作的技巧并不难。被咬伤后，钩住然后扭转它。动作要快如眨眼，以防止毒液迅速渗入体内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any more recipes.. or histories... you can teach?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么配方...或历史...你能教给我的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing more than I've already shared. We'll have to keep with what we know. Tired of history's lessons, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不外乎这些了。我们必须坚持我们知道的东西。我们已经厌倦历史上的教训了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any more recipes you can teach?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有其他配方可以教教我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Questions have a habit of making others.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide's irradiated... are you sure you want to stay here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个大裂谷都被辐射覆盖...你确定要留在这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The invisible fires burn here, true enough. Still... to have helped carry out such an act, then not face it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 无形的火焰在这里燃烧，这是事实。但是...帮助实施这样的行为，然后又不去面对...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my way. If my life burns out here, so be it... until then, I wait and watch, see what the road brings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的方式。如果我的生命要在这里燃烧殆尽，那就这样吧...在那之前,我会等待和观察，看看这条路能带来什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's part of why I'm here. Watch them - if they attack me, try to enter the Mojave, I answer. Not looking to kill them... save them, if I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我在这里的部分原因。观察他们 - 如果他们攻击我，或尝试进入莫哈维，我就会作出回应。不是想杀了他们...而是拯救他们，如果可以的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There might be something saving in them. If not, then what I do is mercy, not murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们身上可能还有什么值得拯救的。但如果没有，那么我的行为就是一种仁慈，而不是谋杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the Courier's Mile? Is that where the Ashton missile hit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么是邮差之路？那是不是阿什顿导弹打击的地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name for it. If you have a better one, you grant it - my choice in names won't carry past you and I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给它取的名字。如果你有更好的名字，你可以取一个 - 我选的名字不会影响你和我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lies along the road, running from the Hopeville silo... straight on to where the ground burns, and wind howls even stronger than here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沿着正路，从黎明镇发射井开始...直到地面燃烧的地方，风的呼啸比这里更猛烈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your tapes prove you've walked the Mojave, yet learned the wrong lessons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的磁带证明你走过了莫哈维，却吸取了错误的教训。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Comes down to perspective, how far one's walked, and what they've left behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 归结为一个观点，一个人走了多远，以及他留下了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you challenge this moment, let's hear your perspective. If my words are all you have, let's hear them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你现在有所质疑，那就让我们听听你的观点。如果我的承诺就是你的全部，那让我们听听看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you think dropping bombs on the Mojave is going to solve things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你认为在莫哈维丢个核弹就能解决问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The why of it... you taught me the why of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 为什么这样...是你教会我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you believe in something enough, you must be willing to let it burn, lest it claim you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你足够相信某件事，你必须愿意让它烧毁，以免它吞噬你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These governments of the two-headed bear... the Legion... they carry Old World ideas into an age that no longer needs them, where they cannot live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些双头熊的政府...军团...它们将旧世界的思想带入一个不再需要它们的时代，带入一个它们无法生存的时代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to know why you're doing this - not for my sake, for history's sake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要知道你为什么这么做，不是为了我，是为了历史的缘故。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yes, that is what you proved to me at the Divide - what is here, what you showed me... it is enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]是的，这正是你在大裂谷向我证明的 - 这里的一切，你让我看到的...这已经足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've wasted enough of my time. Get ready to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经浪费我太多时间了，准备好赴死吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll finish history's work. If the Divide couldn't kill you... perhaps these spears of the Old World can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会完成历史的工作。如果大裂谷无法杀死你...那么，或许这旧世界的矛可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's end this, Courier, you and I. Here, with the Old World flag as witness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们结束这一切吧，邮差，就你和我。在这里，以旧世界的旗帜为见证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard enough. You're a Legion traitor, and now you'll die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听够了，你就是个军团的叛徒，现在你该去死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. If you want an ending to things, let's do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了这个吧。如果你想结束这一切，那就开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you share the recipe with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能和我分享点什么配方么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can do that and one better... just enough around to mix some. Here - might make the Twin Mothers' history live a little longer, you carrying it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实可以做个更好点儿的...正好可以调制一些。给 - 你拿着它，或许能让孪生母亲部落的历史活得更久一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you drink it, down it all in one shot, or your stomach's not going to want to keep going after the second drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喝的时候，要一饮而尽，否则你的胃不会想喝第二杯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: History? Cures a wound, leaves the bitterness that caused it. The Twin Mothers were always about lessons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 历史？治好了伤口，留下了造成伤口的苦痛。孪生母亲部落总是在吸取教训。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar taught them the last one, though, so that's it for them. Recipe still exists, Legion uses it on forced marches with wounded soldiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒给了她们最后一个, 所以她们就这样了。配方依然存在，军团把它用在急行军的伤兵身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't have made it through Crimson River Trail a few years back without it - losing so much blood early on, was a Cazador feast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年前如果没有它，我不可能穿越绯红河小径 - 一开始流了太多血，简直是猎蜂的盛宴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough Xander root and Broc flower along the trail though, the Legion was able to keep pace and get where they were going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了小径沿途有足够的山德根和布洛克花，军团才能保证行军速度并最后到达目的地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you been to Hopeville since the Ashton missile hit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿什顿导弹袭击后你去过黎明镇吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walk there sometimes, keep the walks short. Still... it's important to see. Something else to answer for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时会去那儿走走，时间不会太常。这...仍然很重要，还有一些事情需要答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Occasionally sift through the dust, the buildings... see if I can find some history. Marks of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 偶尔筛过灰尘，建筑物...看看能不能找到一些历史。美国的印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want them, keep them... you've earned it. Nothing to be gained by me holding them, and more will surface in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要它们，就留着吧...这是你应得的。我拿着它们没有什么好处，迟早会有更多的东西浮现出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds useful. Have any to spare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很有用，还有多余的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'd leave valuable property like you behind? No way. You might be worth some caps one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我会留下像你这样值钱的东西吗？不可能。说不定哪天你就值几个瓶盖了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run off on me like that again and I'll recycle you into tin cans. I own you, robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再这样跟我跑，我就把你变成铁罐。你是我的，机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like a big damn waste of time to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来简直就是浪费时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what all this was about? Some old pre-War kids' show?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是一切的原因吗？一些战前的儿童节目？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh heh. Robot skeet shooting. Sounds fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵呵呵，机器人双向飞碟射击，听着蛮好玩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Boo hoo, poor little robot lost his daddy. Stop moping, trash can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呜呜，可怜的小机器人失去了它的老爹。别闷闷不乐了，垃圾桶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long ago was this? And you still haven't made it? So much for upgraded navigational systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是多久以前的事情了？ 你还没搞定？ 升级后的导航系统也就这样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spill any of my secrets, and I'll spill your electronic guts. Just so we're clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泄露我的任何秘密，我就让你的电子内脏泄露一地。我们先说清楚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ask me, Whitley got too invested. It's just robot research, not having a kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说，惠特利太投入了。只是机器人研究而已，又不是要孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big deal. You're a glorified computer, why bother switching you off to improve you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么大不了的。你是一台被美化过的电脑，为什么要把你关掉来改善你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, whatever. Listen, robot: I own you now. Follow me and try to make yourself useful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随便。听着，机器人：你现在是我的了。跟我走，努力让自己有用起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd better level with me, trashcan, or I might stuff you back in that pod.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好跟我说实话，垃圾桶，不然我就把你塞回舱里去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he's probably dead. Guess that means I own you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他可能已经死了。看来你现在归我了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great. Maybe you'll actually be useful to me, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，那也许你真的对我有用。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Men do, through the roads they walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人会，正如他们走过的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Women do, through the roads they walk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 女人会，正如她们走过的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's said war - war never changes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说，战争 - 战争永远不会改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tunnelers and the Marked Men... avoided the lone figure, as if recognizing the Courier's right to passage... or out of fear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掘穴者和烙印者...避开了这个孤单的身影，似乎承认了邮差的通行权...或是出于恐惧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the Courier... he turned his back on his home for the second time and made his way back, navigating the treachery of the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于邮差...他第二次转身离开自己的家，返回来时的路，在大裂谷的背叛中航行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the Courier... she turned her back on her home for the second time and made her way back, navigating the treachery of the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于邮差...她第二次转身离开自己的家，返回来时的路，在大裂谷的背叛中航行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As his last gesture, he sent one last signal to his counterpart in the Mojave, passing along what the Courier had taught him in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为他最后的姿态，他向莫哈韦的同行发出了最后一个信号，传递了邮差在大裂谷教给他的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was the chance... always, that ED-E's journey would continue, perhaps carried by another Eyebot in the Mojave...
ESP.TRADUIT: 有机会...总是有的，ED-E的旅程仍将继续，或许是莫哈维的另一个眼球机器人来承接...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...the one from which the ED-E from the Divide had been shaped.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...来自大裂谷的ED-E正是从中塑造出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, the Courier knew ED-E's history and could carry it, even if the Eyebot had forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此刻，邮差了解了ED-E的历史并且带上了它，即使眼球机器人自身已经忘记了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When ED-E's circuits burned in the fires of the Divide, there was one small part that held on until the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当ED-E的电路在大裂谷的大火中烧毁时，有一个小部件坚持到了最后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was the fragment that held the Old World memories and the words of his creator in his last moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是这块碎片承载了旧世界的记忆和他的创造者在最后时刻的话语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E, the version given life by the machines of the Divide, remained frozen in the military installation where Ulysses had summoned him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被大裂谷的机器赋予生命的ED-E，仍然冻结在尤利西斯召唤他的军事设施中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The robot's last coded transmission back to his counterpart in the Mojave told of upgrades, unlocked memories... then silence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人最后一次向莫哈维的同行发回的编码信息提到了升级、未上锁的记忆...然后是沉默。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not long after the Courier left the facility, the Eyebot's data banks were wiped, and it was disassembled as rapidly as it had been constructed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差离开工厂后不久，眼球机器人的数据库就被清空了，它被拆解的速度和组装时一样快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before leaving, he sent a coded signal to his original in the Mojave, passing along what the Courier had taught him in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在离开之前，他向莫哈维的原型机传送了一个编码信号，传递了邮差在大裂谷教给他的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that last farewell, he set off, carrying the song of Old World hope with him, which had given him strength and purpose on his journey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做完最后的告别，他带着旧世界的希望之歌出发了，这首歌在旅途中给了他力量和目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And no matter what, he knew there would be a second home to return to, Navarro or not - and that his creator would be proud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论任何，他知道会有第二个家可回，不管是不是纳瓦罗 - 他的创造者都会为此感到骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E, given second life by the machines of the Divide, freed by the Courier, continued his quest west, to Navarro...
ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E，被大裂谷的机器赋予了第二次生命，并被邮差释放，继续向西探索，去往纳瓦罗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...or what remained of what the Eyebot considered "home." Whether he found his homeland or not, his road is unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...或者眼球机器人视为“家”的遗留部分。无论是否找到了自己的家园，他的路是未知的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It may be the journey meant more than the destination - just as his counterpart in the Mojave had learned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这趟旅程比目的地更有意义 - 就像他在莫哈韦的同行学到的那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He remained there, perhaps as punishment for the scars he left on the wastes - or a reminder of a history he could not forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他留在那里，也许是为了惩罚他在废土上留下的伤痕 - 又或是提醒他无法忘却的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For Ulysses... his journey was over. The Courier had been the end of his road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对尤利西斯来说...他的旅程结束了。邮差是他道路的终点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopeville burned lightless in the night, invisible fires of radiation scorching it from within and without.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黎明镇在黑夜里无声无息地燃烧着，无形的辐射之火从里到外炙烤着它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is said a man still walked its streets, with a tattered jacket, an Old World flag etched on the back...
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说仍有一个男人在街上游荡，穿着破烂的夹克，背后铭刻着旧世界的旗帜...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...though whether done as a sign of respect, or in anger for what had been endured to reach this moment - that is unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...尽管这样做是为了表示尊重，还是对为了达到这一刻所承受的一切感到愤怒 - 那就不得而知了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interpretation is something best left to history, and only the surviving Courier would ever know for certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 解释最好留给历史,只有幸存下来的邮差才能真正知晓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the end of the struggle, only one Courier remained in the heart of the Divide. The true Courier, Courier Six.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斗争至最后，只有一位邮差留在了大裂谷的心中。这位真正的邮差，六号邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier tore the ancient flag of the Commonwealth from its cables, and cast it over the corpse...
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差从缆绳上扯下古老的联邦旗帜，把它扔在尸体上...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that message - it is something for Couriers to carry, and for them alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那条信息 - 是邮差要传递的，而且只属于他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lights flickered across the Divide, reminders that the Old World histories persist, and find meaning in the present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光摇曳着划过大裂谷，提醒着旧世界的历史仍然存在，并寻找当下的意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier walked until he stood again upon the edge of the Divide, the last road he would walk before the second battle for Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差一直走，直到他再次站在大裂谷的边缘，这是他在第二次胡佛水坝战役之前要走的最后一条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, beside his feet, was a final package, from one Courier to another - a footlocker, bearing a gift, and a message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，在他的脚边，有最后一个包裹，从一个邮差传给另一个 - 一个小型提箱，装着礼物和一条信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Courier walked until she stood again upon the edge of the Divide, the last road she would walk before the second battle for Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: }邮差一直走，直到她再次站在大裂谷的边缘，这是她在第二次胡佛水坝战役之前要走的最后一条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, beside her feet, was a final package, from one Courier to another - a footlocker, bearing a gift, and a message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里，在她的脚边，有最后一个包裹，从一个邮差传给另一个 - 一个小型提箱，装着礼物和一条信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As catastrophic as the damage was for NCR, the act made the Courier stronger for having no history, and no retreat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管对NCR来说损失惨重，但这一行为使邮差变得更强大，因为他没有历史，也没有退路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was an ending to things - a way of erasing the road that had led to this point and the history that had walked with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种结束 - 一种抹去通往这一点的道路和与之同行的历史的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was an ending to things - a way of erasing the road that had led to this point and the history that had walked with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一种结束 - 一种抹去通往这一点的道路和与之同行的历史的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...missiles fell on NCR and the Long 15 caravan route beyond the Mojave Outpost, the road the Courier had been walking when the tale began.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...导弹越过莫哈维前哨站，飞向NCR和15号洲际公路的商队路线，也就是故事开始时邮差所走的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caravans and NCR outposts along the route were reduced to ash, an Old World gift from the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沿途的商队和NCR前哨站化为灰烬，这是来自大裂谷的旧世界礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...missiles fell on the East and the Legion encampment at Dry Wells... where the Twisted Hairs had allied, then been betrayed by Vulpes and Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...导弹向东方飞行，飞向军团在枯井的营地...卷发部落在那里结盟，然后被沃尔普斯和凯撒出卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion soldiers died, their silhouettes blasted into the ground and earth, the last word of the last of the Twisted Hairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵死了，他们的轮廓被炸进入大地和泥土里，这是最后一个卷发部落的遗言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : Bill the Tax Collector [0100923E] (mod) Quest : ([01009250]NVDLC04Ending) 01009250 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, is that an ArmCo Portable Reloading Bench built into you? That'll be handy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，那是个内置的ArmCo便携式弹药工作台么？那可真方便。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you do anything with bullets? Like, maybe help people make them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有用弹药做些什么吗？比如，帮别人制作一些弹药？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's an impressive multitool suite you've got. I bet I could make all sorts of stuff with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的这个工具组真让人印象深刻。我打赌我能用它制作各种各样的东西。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like a toolbox. Can you help me make stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像个工具箱，你能帮我做点什么东西吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you drop the power output by .24, you'll be able to make more energy ammo with no quality loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你将功率输出降低0.24，你将能够在不损失质量的情况下制造更多能量弹药。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, you're way better at fixing weapons than me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，你修理武器比我牛逼多了！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you switched to the 3/8 wrench and the smaller drill, those weapon repairs would be easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你改用3/8扳手和较小的钻头，武器修理起来会更容易。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, you're way better at fixing weapons than me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，你修理武器比我牛逼多了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need energy cells right now - I'd like some satchel charges, ED-E.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不需要能量电池了 - 我需要一些炸药包，ED-E。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you make me some flamer fuel instead of energy cells?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我做点火焰喷射器燃料而不是能量电池吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remove the safety catches on those Microfusion Cells and you could turn them into satchel charges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拔掉那些核融合电池上的保险栓你就能把它们变成炸药包了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want something that goes boom. Can you do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要些会爆炸的东西，你能做吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, if you strip out the plasma relays on those energy cells, you could make flamer fuel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，如果你卸掉那些能量电池的等离子继电器，你就能做出火焰喷射器燃料了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) NPC : [0010C769] (ID) NPC : [001694E0] (ID) NPC : [001694E2] (ID) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you maybe make some energy cells that catch fire instead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能做些能量电池替代那些燃料么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a .308 round. Probably hand-loaded - that would have destroyed most robots your size.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是.308口径的，很可能还是手装弹...它能摧毁大部分跟你一个尺寸的机器人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought all robots were bulletproof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为所有机器人都是防弹的呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, trashcan. I really don't give a shit about your problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧，垃圾桶。我真的不在乎你的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. I only rescued you for the fire support anyways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧。我救你只是为了得到火力支援。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you wanted me dead, why did you wait?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让我死，为什么还要等？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Promises to keep. To others. And the Mojave's dangerous enough - left to the land, the land has its way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 承诺需要遵守，对其他人。莫哈维足够危险 - 留给土地，土地有它自己的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I wanted you dead, we would have met sooner. Not sure that's the way this ends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我想让你死，我们会更早见面。不确定还会是这个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might be that history needs to have its say. If not, then messages will do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许历史需要有自己的发言权。如果没有，那么信息就可以了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you refused to deliver the Chip - what, to set me up to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你拒绝交出芯片...什么，是想害我去送死吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have death following us, only a question of how close. You dodged it - for a time. You're good at that, talent for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都被死亡追赶着，问题只在于有多近。你躲过了 - 暂时。你很擅长于此，这是一种天赋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With that Chip weighing you down... a burden, lets death move a little faster without me pulling the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那块芯片压在你身上...一个负担，让死亡在没有我扣动扳机的情况下走得快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds like you know me, but I've never met you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你认识我，但我从没见过你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Words aren't the only way couriers meet... sometimes it's the paths we walk. But no... we've never spoken before now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 言语不是邮差们碰面的唯一途径...有时是我们走过的路。但是不...在这之前我们从未说过话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've never spoken before - I'd remember your voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以前从没说过话，我会记得你的声音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I know you. What we have in common, though, isn't in the words we traded.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我认识你。不过，我们的共同点并不在我们交换的话语中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were supposed to carry the Chip?
Meant to? No. Never. Your burden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本应？不，从来不是。你的责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weigh you down long enough to let death catch up to you... but you survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拖累了你足够久，好让死亡赶上你...但你活了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was death in that package, and while the Chip is important to Old World ghosts... no, you are more dangerous than that Chip ever could be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个包裹意味着死亡，而那个芯片对旧世的幽灵来说很重要...不，你比那个芯片本身更危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe why you found each other, little piece of the Old World, speaking to you, waiting for you to wake something else up with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许是你们找到彼此的原因，旧世界的残片，对你说话，等着你用它唤醒其他的某些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] The dead in the silo, some were Legion Frumentarii, scouts. Assassins.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团] 发射井里的尸体，有些是军团的特务、侦察兵、刺客。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might have been. Once. To the Divide they came... in the Divide, they rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是吧。曾经，他们来到大裂谷...他们正在休眠，在大裂谷里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Those bodies in the silo were NCR soldiers... some special forces.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR] 那些躺在发射井里的尸体是NCR的士兵...某些特种部队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might have been. Once. To the Divide they came... in the Divide, they rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是吧。曾经，他们来到大裂谷...他们正在休眠，在大裂谷里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's here? This place looks wrecked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有什么？ 这地方看起来很残破。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] America sleeps in the Divide - giants, beneath the earth. You saw one locked in the silo beneath you. There's more.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 美国沉睡在大裂谷中 - 巨人，在大地之下。你在下面的发射井里看过一个锁着的，但还有更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only takes a few of them, locked below ground, to tear apart the earth... and cast dust, sand... ash... into the skies above.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只需要几个被锁在地下的巨人，就能撕裂大地...把尘土，沙子...灰烬...投向天空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll see the extent - the miles of it, soon enough. You need to see it... walk it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会看见就会看到它的大小，它的里程。你需要看到它...走向它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Area looks like it was hit with earthquakes... or underground detonations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这片区域看起来像遭受了地震袭击...或者地下爆炸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Wasn't always like this. Old World wreckage's nothing new... after that, something you had your hand in - you'll walk it soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]并非一直如此。旧世界的残骸并没有什么新鲜的...在那之后，某些你参与了的事 - 你很快就会走向它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would they want to stay here if this place is killing them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这个地方害死了他们，他们为什么还想留在这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] There's truth in your words, in what I've seen of their tactics, movements - recovery. Those wounds - they couldn't live otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的话很有道理，我看过他们的战术、动作 - 回复。那些伤口 - 否则他们无法生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide winds have torn the skin from many of them - may be the radiation is the only thing keeping them walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷的风已经撕裂了他们中许多人的皮肤 - 或许辐射辐射是唯一能让他们行走的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make camp near silos... warheads. No way to cleanse the radiation - makes them hard to kill there, have to draw them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在发射井附近扎营...弹头。无法清除辐射 - 使得他们很难被杀死，必须把他们引出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation may keep them alive in areas so physically punishing, it would kill others - even ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在辐射对躯体的摧残如此残酷的地区能活下来，这地方能杀死其他任何生物 - 甚至是食尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] They're more beasts than men now. They clutch at their pain as they clutch at their weapons... anchors them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]他们现在更像野兽而不是人。他们紧紧抓住自己的痛苦，就像紧紧抓住武器...精神支柱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rads in this place seem like they would do more damage to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方的辐射似乎会对他们造成更大的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] There's truth in your words, in what I've seen of their tactics, movements - recovery. Those wounds - they couldn't live otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]你的话很有道理，我看过他们的战术、动作 - 回复。那些伤口 - 否则他们无法生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide winds have torn the skin from many of them - may be the radiation is the only thing keeping them walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷的风已经撕裂了他们中许多人的皮肤 - 或许辐射辐射是唯一能让他们行走的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make camp near silos... warheads. No way to cleanse the radiation - makes them hard to kill there, have to draw them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在发射井附近扎营...弹头。无法清除辐射 - 使得他们很难被杀死，必须把他们引出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
