ESP.ORIGINAL: If they've become ghouls, the radiation would strengthen them. Heal their wounds - not the scars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们已经变成食尸鬼，辐射会强化他们。愈合他们的伤口...而不是疤痕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] They're more beasts than men now. They clutch at their pain as they clutch at their weapons... anchors them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]他们现在更像野兽而不是人。他们紧紧抓住自己的痛苦，就像紧紧抓住武器...精神支柱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They look like they were skinned... then got right back up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们看起来像是被剥了皮...然后马上站了起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... even radiation isn't enough to cause those wounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...即使是辐射也不足以造成这些伤口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never seen corpses mutilated like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没见过尸体被肢解成那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even as the fires here burned them from within... the winds of the Divide tore their skin, exposed them... screaming... to the sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如这里的火焰由内而外烧毁了他们...大裂谷的风则撕裂了他们的皮肤，暴露了他们...尖叫...直冲云霄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And just as the Divide tears at them, so they tear at each other, for sport - like some tribal scarification. Falling back to their history, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如大裂谷撕扯他们那样，他们也互相撕扯着对方，为了娱乐 - 就像某些部落的划痕。也许，是回归他们的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter what they suffer... the radiation, fire of the Divide, sustains them. Makes them stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论他们遭受了什么...辐射、大裂谷的烈焰，支撑着他们。让他们变得更加强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever happened at the Divide, there weren't any survivors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论大裂谷发生了什么，都没有幸存者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inhabitants? It doesn't look like anyone's alive down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居民？这里看起来不像是有活人的样子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: These new inhabitants... not natives... most of them. Came with duty, purpose... ready to kill each other. The Divide was stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些新居民...他们中的大多数...不是本地人。他们带着责任和目标而来...准备互相残杀。但大裂谷比他们更强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Left marks on them, too. Not Bear, not Bull - now... radiation's marked them, made them equal in history's eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他们身上也留下了印记。不是熊，不是公牛 - 现在...辐射给他们打上了烙印，让他们在历史的眼中变得平等。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As vicious as the storms are, these shadows of Legion, of NCR - silhouettes of things to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如风暴一样恶毒，这些军团的影子，NCR - 未来事物的轮廓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了这个吧。你想要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: An ending. To this road, you and I. First, you need to find your way. At the end, I'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个结局。这条路，你和我。首先，你得先找到你的路，在终点，我等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may not know my voice, but we've walked the same places. The Long 15 to Primm... that wasn't the only road you ever walked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也许不知道我的声音，但我们走过同样的路，从15号洲际公路到普瑞姆...你不是唯一走过那些路的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been to your home, the place you kept returning to... may not be the place you were born, was the place you gave life to, same thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去过你的家，你一直试图返回的地方...也许不是你出生的地方，却是你赋予生命的地方，相同的事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: People forget couriers can keep communities alive... until the day they're gone, and their breath catches in their throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们忘记了邮差能够维持一个社区的活力...直到离开的那一天，他们如鲠在喉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, eyes alert, watch the streets below. There's still life in the Divide - threats other than the storms and wind... new inhabitants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此刻，眼睛要警惕，盯住下面的街道。大裂谷中还有生命 - 除了暴风雨和气流之外的威胁...新居民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's something left down there? Town looks like it was bombed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面还有什么东西吗？整个城镇看起来像是被炸过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] America sleeps in the Divide - giants, beneath the earth. You saw one locked in the silo beneath you. There's more.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]美国沉睡在大裂谷中 - 巨人，在大地之下。你在下面的发射井里看过一个锁着的，事实上不止一个.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only takes a few of them, locked below ground, to tear apart the earth... and cast dust, sand... ash... into the skies above.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只需要几个被锁在地下的巨人，就能撕裂大地...把尘土，沙子...灰烬...投向天空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The damage here looks like it was caused by underground detonations - on a scale I've never seen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的破坏看起来像是地下爆炸造成的 - 规模之大我从未见过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Wasn't always like this. Old World wreckage's nothing new... after that, something you had your hand in - you'll walk it soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]并非一直如此。旧世界的残骸并没有什么新鲜的...在那之后，某些你参与了的事 - 你很快就会走向它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide won't stop me from reaching you, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷无法阻止我找到你的，相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better hope you've got enough ammo when I kick down your door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好祈祷我踹开你的门时你有足够的弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what you have to say. I only want to know where you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你要说什么，我只想知道你在哪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other Marked Men had NCR gear - and they weren't carrying masks or blades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的烙印者穿着NCR的装备...而且他们没有装备什么面罩和刀具。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the two-headed Bear... NCR... they don't have symbols in the same way Legion does.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于'双头熊'...NCR...他们没有军团那样的象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They revere their mines and explosives, guns... that is their religion - death from afar, take pride in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们崇尚地雷和炸药，枪支...那是他们的宗教信仰...来自远方的死亡，以此为荣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could care less about history - and even less about Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太关心历史，更不关心凯撒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't his time, and wouldn't have been how he wanted to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是他的时代，也不是他想要的死亡方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not how most would've wanted him to die, either, Bear or Bull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论是熊或者牛，大多数人不希望他这样死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure how you'd take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你会如何接受。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done with blame, and Caesar was big on strength making right. Seems to me you proved that philosophy to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谴责完毕。凯撒曾经非常推崇强者为是，在我看来，你向他证明了这一理念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he was too weak to stop you, too weak to defend himself, then he needed to die with his beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他太软弱，无力阻止你，无力保护自己，那么他就需要带着信仰死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He let another hold a knife to him. If he was weak enough to allow the knife so close to his neck, maybe it needed to be his ending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他让另一个人拿刀指着他，如果他软弱到可以让刀如此接近他的脖子，也许这就是他需要的结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar would be history's hypocrite if he was angry about what happened. I'm not one for it, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果凯撒对所发生的事愤怒的话，那么他将成为历史上的伪君子。我也不支持这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems you just proved his philosophy to him. If he'd been stronger, he'd be alive, and we wouldn't be talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你刚刚向他证明了他的理念。如果他更强，他就能活着，我们也不会讨论这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Topic Storage: Discussing Caesar's Death. Do not translate. >
Too soon to tell what will happen, let history weigh what you’ve done, if it gets that far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在说会发生什么还为时过早，让历史来衡量你的所作所为吧，如果它能走到那一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless you do the same for the Legate that comes, you'll get no thanks from me. When that Monster arrives, he's not going to have a leash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你同样对待来的特使，否则你不会从我这里得到感谢。当那个怪物到来时，他不会被束缚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar could command him. Not now. The Bear's going to burn, and burn slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒能够命令他，但不是现在。熊将会燃烧，缓慢的燃烧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar is dead, died on the operating table.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒死了，死在手术台上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's died twice to history. If the West thanks you... the East won't, in time. Fall apart, back to the tribes, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字在历史上已经死去了两次。如果西部感谢你...东部就不会。最终分崩离析，回到部落，也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar is dead, I killed him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒死了，我把他做掉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's died twice to history. If the West thanks you... the East won't, in time. Fall apart, back to the tribes, maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字在历史上已经死去了两次。如果西部感谢你...东部就不会。最终分崩离析，回到部落，也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Topic Storage: Wrapping up thoughts on House. Do not translate. >
If you saw House, you didn’t see a man. An Old World spirit, perhaps - filthy, diseased. If so, killing him was mercy, not cruelty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看见豪斯，你看到的不是一个人。也许是一个旧世界的灵魂 - 肮脏、病态。如果是这样，杀了他是一种仁慈，而不是残忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let House sleep in his chamber. Let him dream of the Old World he remembers, and keep those memories where they belong, in his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让豪斯睡在他的房间里。让他梦回记忆中的旧世界，并将这些记忆留在原本该在的地方，他的脑子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Vegas falls apart, seems like more history will be lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果维加斯分崩离析，似乎会失去更多的历史。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought you might be glad House was dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你可能很高兴豪斯被解决了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you did was for the best. The Old World died long ago. Anyone who believes they can make it return and everything will be as it was...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你所做一切都是最好的选择。旧世界早已死去，任何相信自己能使旧世界回来，一切都会像以前一样的人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...it is a dangerous belief. Needs to be silenced before their belief spreads.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...这种是一种危险的信念。在他们的信念传播之前，必须消除这种声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reached Vegas, and I dealt with House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到了维加斯，和豪斯打了交道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: House spoke, acted through machines. Sometimes can judge a man by his messengers. Sometimes the messengers judge him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯通过机器说话、行动。有时可以通过他的信使评判一个人，有时信使会评判他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder what happens to Vegas now. The tribes - families. We'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想知道现在的维加斯会发生什么。那些部落 - 家族，我们拭目以待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I think I'll just go ahead and trigger the launch. I never liked either of those places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我还是直接启动发射吧。我不喜欢这些地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll leave it to history, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就把它留给历史吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide belongs to history now. The Mojave awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷现在属于历史了。莫哈维在等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll leave it to history, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们就把它留给历史吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide belongs to history now. The Mojave awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷现在属于历史了。莫哈维在等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Topic Storage: Talking about Joshua Graham, why Lanius should heed story. Do not translate. >
That Legate's mistake is he didn't die trying. His name was Joshua - Joshua Graham. Answered for his failure - twice, some say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个特使的错误在于他没有死于尝试。他的名字是约书亚 - 约书亚·格拉汉姆，为他的失败付出了代价 - 有人说，是两次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar had him burned and cast into the earth, into the largest canyon you've ever seen. Watched the flames trail all the way to the bottom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒把他点燃丢在地上，扔进了你见过的最大的峡谷里。看着火焰一直延伸到峡谷底部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somehow Joshua walked away from that, went beyond Caesar's gaze. His footsteps trailing fire, walking from one hell - maybe to another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知何故约书亚走了出来，逃出了凯撒的视线。他的脚步拖着火焰，从一个地狱 - 走向或许另一个地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When one is ruined like Graham was... sometimes home is the only place left. If so, he went to New Canaan, Caesar's anger written on him like a book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一个人像格拉汉姆一样被毁灭时...那么家就会是他唯一可以去的地方。如果是这样，他应该去了新迦南，凯撒的愤怒像书一样写在他身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's orders to the Frumentarii were to watch for him, find Graham. Kill him. Didn't try. Could've, no good would have come of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒给军团特务的命令是密切注意他，找到格拉汉姆，杀了他。没有尝试，本来可以的，但不会有什么好结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Graham earned his life, and his nature... it'll kill him more surely than any blade of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格拉汉姆赢得了他的生命，还有他的本性...这比军团的任何刀刃都能更有效地杀死他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if you've heard word of it or seen sign of him, let it keep. Let his history keep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此如果你听说了什么消息或者见过他的踪迹，留着吧。让他的历史继续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are other Legates, and the one before Lanius couldn't take Hoover Dam for Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其它特使，在拉尼厄斯之前那个也没能为凯撒拿下胡佛大坝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个特使？你指的是格拉汉姆吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Graham was broken on the wall of the Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，格拉汉姆在大坝的墙上被打败了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are other Legates, and the one before Lanius couldn't take Hoover Dam for Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其它特使，在拉尼厄斯之前那个也没能为凯撒拿下胡佛大坝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He crosses me, I’ll break him.
His strength lies in his title - and it is his weakness. He will not fight a losing battle and destroy what he represents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的优势在于他的头衔 - 这也是他的弱点。他不会打一场必败之仗，毁掉他所代表的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put the idea of loss in him. Convince him the Bear will not be the twentieth tribe beneath his heel, it will make him pause like nothing on earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他有失败的想法。让他相信熊不会成为他脚下的第二十个部落，这会让他异乎寻常的暂停下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do not need to convince him alone. Draw upon history. The past of other Legates are not filled with victories. Remind Lanius of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无需单独说服他，以史为鉴，其它特使的过去并非充满胜利。提醒拉尼厄斯这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea on how to beat him?
Nineteen tribes could not do it. All the lights in Vegas cannot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 十九个部落没有做到这一点，拉斯维加斯所有的灯光也做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: To take Hoover Dam, Legion will need something as big as the Old World itself - another symbol, forged by history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了拿下胡佛水坝。军团需要一个和旧世界本身一样庞大的东西 - 由历史铸就的另一个象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if I were a slave or a dog, I'd be scared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果我是一个奴隶或者一条狗，我一定会害怕的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's just one general. I can handle him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他只是个普通人，我可以搞定他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lanius carries all the terrors of the East with him. He's the myth, the weapon the Legion needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉尼厄斯集东方世界所有的恐怖于一身。他是一个神话，也是军团需要的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When he arrives, he'll fall on Hoover Dam like a hammer, break the Bear in two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他到来之时，他会像铁锤一般砸向胡佛水坝，将熊分为两半。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about him?
Enough. Whatever waits at Hoover Dam, I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了。无论胡佛大坝有什么，我都准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there is nothing more to be done. The Mojave awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后就没什么可做的了，莫哈维在等待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide belongs to history now. The Mojave awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷现在属于历史了。莫哈维在等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough. Whatever waits at Hoover Dam, I'm ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了。无论胡佛大坝上有什么在等待，我都做好准备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide belongs to history now. The Mojave awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷现在属于历史了。莫哈维在等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lanius... the "Butcher." Monster, Terror of the East.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉尼厄斯...人称"屠夫"。怪物，东方的恐惧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not even his slaves have seen his face - struck them blind so they can't. Wears a mask, don't even know if it's the same man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 甚至连他的奴隶也没见过他的真容 - 因为他们已经事先被弄瞎了。他永远戴着一个面具，甚至不知道面具之下是不是同一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He put Colorado to the sword, broke the Hangdogs by throwing their hounds upon the flames, so they might burn forever in the afterlife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他屠杀科罗拉多，将卑躬屈膝者投入火焰中，让他们在来生永远燃烧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Topic Storage: As player turns to leave, Ulysses speaks of Lanius. Do not translate. >
Bear and Bull shed too much blood there to let it go. Can’t stop you from going, wouldn’t.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊和公牛在那里洒下了太多的血，不会放手的。但我不能阻止你去，也不会阻止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A warning, though - the Legate, Lanius. Whether Caesar stands or not, Lanius will come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个警告， - 那个特使，拉尼厄斯。无论凯撒是否倒下，他都会来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we don't need to fight about this - we can talk this out, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们没必要为此争吵，我们可以好好谈谈，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] No... no, I couldn't. And I'm thinking you can't kill me, either. If you did, you'd answer for it, just as I would.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 不...不，我不能。当然我认为你也杀不了我，如果你能，你也会付出代价，就像我一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let the land do the killing for you, that's one of the things you taught me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让土地替你杀戮，这是你教会我的事之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing is personal - so's vows, promises. Last bit's more important to me than the first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀戮是个人行为，誓言和承诺也是。对我来说，后者比前者更重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You brought me here to talk. If you wanted to kill me, you'd have waited until I came for the Chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你带我来这里是为了谈谈。如果你想杀我，你就会等到我来拿芯片。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Talking... words won't settle this. The Road will. And the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 谈...语言解决不了问题。道路可以，在尽头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... this is about fighting? Or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...这是关于战斗？还是...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] War. Call it that. Our part in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 战争，是这么叫吧。我们在其中的角色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ulysses wasn't made for the flag he followed. He wasn't made for peace. That's the lesson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤利西斯不是为了他追随的旗帜而生的，他不是为和平而存在的。这就是教训。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you follow a symbol to the end, ask yourself what that means. More important, ask what happens after the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你始终追随着一个象征，问问自己那到底意味着什么。更重要的是，问问之后还会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You chose Ulysses because of the "two flags" reference - is that tied to the war in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你选择尤利西斯是因为“两面旗帜”的意义...这和莫哈维的战争有关吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Fighting? Yes... but different weapons than you're used to.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 战斗？是的...但与你习惯的武器不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're wasting time. Stalling. Won't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在浪费时间，拖延时间。帮不了你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ulysses... that sounds like a Legion name... a Legion hero?
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤利西斯...听起来像是一个军团人的名字...一个军团英雄？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ulysses walked a hard road. A general, like Caesar and Oliver. He was Brahmin-stubborn, gave him strength on the battlefield.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤利西斯走了一条艰难的路。一个将军，像凯撒和奥利弗那样。他有着婆罗门式的顽强，在战场上赋予他力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He led his side to victory, turned two flags into one. That's when he lost - when the fighting was done, the sickness took hold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他带领着他的队伍走向胜利，将两面旗帜合二为一。就在那时他倒下了 - 战斗结束后，病魔开始侵袭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lesson there, if history's to be believed. One you should heed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果历史可信的话，这就是一个教训。你应该听从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Ulysses." Not the myth. You're honoring history, not stories.
ESP.TRADUIT: “尤利西斯”不是神话。你尊重的是历史，而不是传说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Search history, might find meaning in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 探索历史，也许能在其中找到意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just a name - you have no idea who I am. You'll know by the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是个名字 - 你不会知道我是谁。到最后你会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the one who sent the radio message - Ulysses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是那个发送无线电信息的人 - 尤利西斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my given name, close enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我的真名， 但很接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took it from history, found it in a book. It's an Old World name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从历史中得到的，在一本书中找到的。这是一个旧世界的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ulysses lived a long time ago, long before the Old World set fire to itself. He made a mark without being myth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤利西斯生活在很久以前，远在旧世界用火毁灭自己之前。他留下了标记而不是神话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to fight during a time when his world had two flags, and he had to make them one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他生活的世界上有两面旗帜，所以他不得不战斗，必须将它们合为一面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget your name. Back to the job you refused.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就忘掉你的名字，回到你曾经放弃的事业上去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... Courier. If the why of it matters to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的...邮差。如果原因对你很重要的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... so you swore not to kill me? Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...所以你发誓不杀我？为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of world would this be if Courier killed Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果邮差杀了另一个邮差这世界会变成什么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got enough distance ahead of you - save your breath for the road, don't waste it on words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你前面还有很长的路程 - 省点力气走路，不要浪费在言语上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in your politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的政治不感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that's why you chose Vegas... the lights can blind, make people forget themselves. Their convictions - vows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这就是你选择了维加斯的原因...灯光会让人盲目，让人们忘记自我。他们的信念 - 誓言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to waste time trying to make the blind see. Took a chance coming here - same as I did. Now we'll see how it plays out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会浪费时间试图让盲人看清。冒着风险来到了这里 - 和我一样，现在我们会看到结果如何的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're too far from Vegas to argue perspective on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们离维加斯太远，为了它争论没有意义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe not. Maybe that's why you fell in with the Bear in the first place - can't see what you're following.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能不是。也许这就是为什么你一开始就投靠熊的原因 - 无法看清自己到底在追随什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to convince a deaf man with words. Shown strength coming in here - if strength's what you respect, then you belong East of the Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用语言无法说服一个聋子。来到这里展示了你的力量 - 如果力量是你所尊崇的，那么你就属于科罗拉多以东。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least they're trying to help the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少他们在试图帮助莫哈维。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trying doesn't hold much weight with me. Legion doesn't try to kill people, they do it. The Bear kills people trying to protect them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试图对我来说没什么意义。军团并不试图杀人，他们就是这么做的。熊杀人是在试图保护他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Irony's sharp. And Legion... their flag may be old, but it's not at war with itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 极其讽刺的是，军团...虽然他们的旗帜可能很古老，但它并没有自相残杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter now. Bear couldn't hold the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在无关紧要了，熊抓不住大裂谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and that machine, are all that remains of NCR here... rest fell to radiation, fire... and what burrows below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和那台机器，是仅存在这儿的NCR了...其它的都归于辐射，火焰...还有地下那些家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. And any Courier could tell you the same, see it everywhere. The Bear...
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，任何一个邮差都会告诉你同样的事，随处可见。熊...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Bear's too busy carving up the Mojave with knives, roads, borders, and how things should be to see how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...熊正在忙于用刀子、道路、国界以及事物应该如何发展来切割莫哈维。却看不到它本来的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're stretched thin, can't protect their frontlines, their towns, think paper's power, radio means control - all of it, useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们捉襟见肘，无法保护他们的前线，他们的城镇。认为纸的力量，无线电意味着控制 - 所有这些，都是无用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a lot of hate for NCR. That kind of hate isn't new in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对NCR恨之入骨，这种恨在莫哈维并不新鲜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... not new. And not new among all those in the shadow of the Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...不新鲜。在熊的阴影下这并不新鲜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know their flag, a bear with two heads. Symbol's an Old World one, had one head then, better off for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他们的旗帜，一只有两个头的熊。旧世界的那个象征，当时只有一个头，那样更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their flag speaks to their spirit. They're split like any two-headed animal, trying to go in different directions, ending up nowhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的旗帜表达了他们的精神。他们像任何双头动物一样分裂，试图往不同的方向前进，最终无处可去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the Mojave, that'll only get you sand between your fingers - or over your grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在莫哈维，这只会让你的手指间有沙子 - 或者你的坟墓上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you’re afraid of Vegas and of Mr. House - you should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你害怕维加斯和豪斯先生...你确实应该害怕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is New Vegas's power a threat to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 新维加斯的力量对你有威胁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Power isn't strength. Power can wall off someone, when they believe it's freed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 权力不是力量。当一个人认为权力解放了他时，权力也会把他隔离起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: House's power... you've seen the wall around Vegas. He gains more power, that wall will grow. The Mojave'll become Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯的权力...你见过新维加斯周围的墙。他获得更多的权力，那堵墙就会更高。莫哈维将会变成维加斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's more lights than strength. You'll see the way of it soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但更多的是光而非力量。你很快就会看清楚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that why you're not Legion anymore, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么你不再是军团了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you m... I see the way of it. Have fight in you, at least. Save it for the road ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意...我看清楚了...至少你内心有斗志，把它留给前方的路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A woman in the Legion surprise you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团里的女人让你感到惊讶？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not Legion - the Legion I know, but they change, even in small ways as they march West, with every tribe they break.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是军团 - 我所了解的那个军团。但他们会改变，在向西行进的过程中每打败一个部落都会发生微小的变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yes... last I heard, you needed a weapon between your legs to carry one for Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但确实...上次我听说，你需要把武器夹在两腿之间才能赢的凯撒的支持。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hold Legion to be my brothers... even as misguided as they are. And you... more so than most.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我视军团所有成员为兄弟...尽管他们迷失了方向。而你...比大多数人更是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Storage Node Ulysses talking about player being Legion. Do not translate. >
Heard tales of you walking the Mojave. Casting off your disguise... yet you carried that Chip, determined to take it to Vegas... not Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听过你在莫哈维行走的故事。抛掉伪装...然而你带着那个芯片，决心把它带到维加斯...而不是凯撒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and that Chip deserve each other, 29 fewer coins than other traitors have carried, by history's mark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和那块芯片配得上彼此，从历史的角度来看，比其他叛徒少拿29枚硬币。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mojave is behind us. I want to know what's ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维在我们身后. 我想知道前面是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The High Road... not the Divide yet, many more miles to walk. But you got this far. You and that machine that shadows you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正路...还没到大裂谷，还有很多路要走。但你已经走了这么远了，你和那台跟着你的机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't sure if both of you'd make it - above, then below the underpass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你们两个是否都能到达 - 这条从地上直至地下的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. Keep your opinions about Vegas, I'll keep mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了这个吧。你保留你对维加斯的看法，我保留我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I doubt you've ever met House.
No... only seen his works. Those he's broken with light and gold. His messengers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有...只见过他的作品 - 那些被他用灯光和金钱打碎的。还有他的信使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But everything in Vegas speaks of someone who can't let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但拉斯维加斯的一切都讲述了一个无法放手的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: House takes a shovel to history's graves, props up the dead, then puts words in their mouths. The tribes don't even know how they were broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯拿着铲子来到历史的坟前，支撑起死者，把话塞进他们嘴里。部落甚至不明白他们是如何被驯服的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a world I want to be part of, going through motions until we're all smiling faces on some robot's screen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想成为这个世界的一份子，走走过场，直到我们的笑脸出现在某个机器人的屏幕上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL:
; Prevents node from looping and breaking into ED-E's high level topics.
Set NVDLC04DialogueUlysses.bHouseCS2 to 1;
House is more pragmatic than you might think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯比你想象的要务实。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe that. Vegas runs, I've seen what it's done to those who oppose it. And I've seen its messengers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信这一点。我见过那些想挡住维加斯脚步的人的下场，我也见过他的信使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tribes? You mean the Vegas families?
ESP.TRADUIT: 部落？你指的是维加斯的几大家族？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Families of Vegas were once tribes. Got drunk on the Vegas lights, the spirit bled out of them. Old World history, under a different flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯的几大家族原来曾是部落，在维加斯的灯光下醉生梦死，他们的灵魂流失殆尽。旧世界的历史，在不同的旗帜下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever traditions or rituals they had, most likely squeezed out of them by now, turned into something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论他们过去有什么传统或者仪式，现在很可能都被排斥，变成了别的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if not, then I'm afraid what's going to happen when they come creeping back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是这样，那么我担心当他们回来的时候会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas is one of the safest places in the Mojave, and that gives me hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯是莫哈韦沙漠中最安全的地方之一，这给了我希望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been, you've seen the Wall. Safe? No... what's inside - that's what worries me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过，你见过那堵墙。安全吗？不...里面的东西 - 那才是我担心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inside, Old World's waking up. No facts or history I've heard tells me that city ever went to sleep, and that makes me think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在里面，旧世界正在苏醒。但我听说过的任何事实和历史都没有告诉我那座城市曾经沉睡过，这让我陷入了沉思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The blue of the Mojave skies - isn't like the rest of the world. Don't hear a Geiger ticking there, more to fear from predators than rads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维天空的蓝天 - 与世界其他地方不一样。在那里听不到盖革计数器的滴答声，人们更害怕的是剥削者而不是辐射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The city - the whole Mojave, wasn't hit by bombs. Been my call, Vegas would be one of the first pieces of the Old World to burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座城市 - 乃至整个莫哈维，几乎没有受到核弹的打击。按照我的决定，维加斯将成为旧世界中第一个燃烧的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone protected it. Wasn't chance, wasn't luck. Something larger - yet they let the rest of the world suffer. And they'll do it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人保护了它。这不是偶然，也不是运气，是某种更大的东西 - 然而他们让世界其他地方受苦。他们会再次这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you mean before, "it's a dance?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前所谓的“这是场舞会”是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the wrong word. "Theater" is better - the families, the Bear all on a stage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用了错误的词。“剧场”更合适 - 那些家族，熊都在一个舞台上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: House. He's the one watching. The why... you'd know better than I would. If you don't - you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯，是他在观看。为什么...你比我更清楚。如果你现在不清楚 - 你迟早会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: House's plans for the future run longer than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯对未来的计划远不止于此。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have against Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对维加斯有什么不满？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas is Old World, filled with Old World ghosts. And ghosts need the living to do their work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯是个旧世界，充满了旧世界的幽灵。而幽灵需要活人来完成他们的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why the families are there, why the Bear stumbles there to lose itself. It's a dance, I don't know its purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么家族会在那里，为什么熊会在那里跌跌撞撞迷失方向。这是场舞会，我不知道它的意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been, you've seen the Wall. It's what's inside that worries me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过，你见过那堵墙。我担心的是里面的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be quick to discount Vegas. There's more strength there than may seem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要轻易低估维加斯，在你看不到的地方隐藏着无数的力量。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As obsessed as you are about history, the future's what I prefer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如你对历史的痴迷一样，我更喜欢未来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your future with House has two roads. The road the tribals in Vegas walked... their spirits crushed...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和豪斯的未来有两条路。一条是维加斯的部落们走过的路，他们的精神被击垮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...or your face on a robot servant, smiling forever in a dead casino. There's future in neither.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...或者你的脸被印在机器仆人的屏幕上，永远在死去的赌场里微笑。两条路都没有未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Storage Node Ulysses giving player final direction. Do not translate. >
For now - find the trigger for the warheads, buried in Hopeville. Use it to keep moving... and keep alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在 - 找到引爆弹头的装置，埋在黎明镇。用它来继续前行，并活下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... there's more I wanted to talk about. About... all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...我还有很多想说的。关于...这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] "Who are you, who do not know your history?"
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] “你是谁，连自己的历史都不知道？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came all this way for answers. Only currency I have, nothing else to be gained - could turn around, walk away at any time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走了这么远来寻求答案。我只有货币，没有其他收益 - 可以转身，随时走人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If history matters to you... you'll need to earn it. Any logs of mine I have already cast away in the Divide, they're lost to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果历史对你很重要...你需要努力去获取。 我的所有日志都丢在大裂谷里了，都丢给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we share history, then before going forward, I want to know the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们有共同的历史，那么在继续之前，我想知道过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You want to know more, keep walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你想知道更多，就继续走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give answers as you go. Not before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你边走我边给你答案。在这之前没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you saying... they were here before all this destruction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说...他们在这一切毁灭之前就在这里了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Makes sense. Truth favors that, matches the history of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 说得通。真相偏向于此，与这个地方的历史相符。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were signs they were here for a long time, before Marked Men, before what happened to the Divide cracked their sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 种种迹象表明它们在这里存在了很长时间，在烙印者出现之前，在大裂谷发生的事打破它们的天空之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: If so, they were buried deep. Might have been born the day America's embers started to settle. Seen worse things twisted by radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这样，它们被埋得很深，可能是在美国的余烬开始沉淀的那天出生的。我见过被辐射扭曲的更糟糕的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation from the War might have created them. Then detonations, quakes, caused them to surface?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是战争中的辐射创造了它们。然后大爆炸、地震，让它们浮出了地面？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Don't know the history of them - only their patterns, how they hunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不知道它们的历史 - 只知道它们的行为模式，捕猎方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, takes a long time for such patterns to develop. A longer history than what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这种模式的形成需要很长时间。比这里的发生的历史更长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Storage Node: Ulysses discussing Denver and the East. Do not Translate. >
Walked the East, too, before the Bull came. Then... much like the Mojave before the Bear... tribes, towns, clutching to life. Bull did a better job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在公牛到来之前，我也走遍了东部。那时...很像熊染指之前的莫哈维...部落、城镇，挣扎着生存。公牛做得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Mojave and the Divide aren't the only places I've walked.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]莫哈维和大裂谷不是我唯一走过的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Denver hounds?" Denver's far to the East - Legion territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: “丹佛猎犬？”丹佛在遥远的东部 - 军团的领地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Another city fallen to nations, in the east... not important. Doubt you'll ever walk that far, you'd need the land to sustain you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]另一座沦陷于国家的城市...不重要。我怀疑你走不了那么远，你需要土地来支持你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] You've been to Denver? That's Legion territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团] 你去过丹佛？那里是军团的地盘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojave and the Divide aren't the only places I've walked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维和大裂谷不是我唯一走过的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Storage Node: Ulysses is discussing tunnelers and the future. Do not Translate. >
They'll start emerging throughout the Mojave in time, might be years. Probably less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在不久就会在莫哈维出现，可能需要几年时间，可能更快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They breed fast, hunt in groups, more than enough to bring down the strongest in the Mojave. Once they draw blood...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们繁殖迅速，成群结队狩猎，足以让莫哈维的最强者倒下。一旦让它们见血...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seen them tear apart Deathclaws... Deathclaw might get some, but the rest will swarm it, tear it apart, like Denver hounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见过它们折磨死亡爪...死亡爪可能会杀死一些，不过其他的还是会蜂拥而上，把它撕成碎片，就像丹佛猎犬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in talking, I only want to know where to head next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对谈话不感兴趣，我只想知道下一步该去哪里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What burrows below? You mean those creatures in the underpass?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么在下面挖洞？你是说地下通道里的那些生物吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been to Denver? That's Legion territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过丹佛？那里是军团的地盘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojave and the Divide aren't the only places I've walked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维和大裂谷不是我唯一走过的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should tell me what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你该告诉我发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR saw the worth in that road you made. Staked a claim, whether it was wanted there or not - true elsewhere in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR看到了你走出的路的价值。于是他们主张权利，无论是否需要 - 在莫哈维的其他地方也是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And where the Bear tries to cling to life, the Legion comes... bearing messages. Some brought by blade. Others... by Couriers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在熊坚持生存的地方，军团随之而来...带着信息。有些通过刀剑传达，其他的...通过邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You knew what was coming, as sure as I know what's coming for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道会发生什么，就像我知道你会发生什么一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This time you carry the burden. Walk west into the sun, and keep walking until it dies. There - I'll be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次你承担重任。向西边的太阳走，一直走到太阳消失。在那里 - 我等着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no other supply line to the Mojave beyond the Long 15.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了15号公路就没有其他补给线通往莫哈维了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not any more. If one existed, the two-headed Bear would have claimed it. And it tried to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再也没有了。如果有的话，双头熊也会去宣称。它也试图这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still making assumptions about all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仍然在对这一切做假设。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you believe happened, you have it wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你认为发生了什么，你都是错的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wrong? No, I know the truth of it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was you walking that road that kept the Divide alive. It grew from what you did. Settlers... camps... filling that Old World city.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是你走过那条路才让大裂谷得以存活，它从你的所作所为中成长起来。定居者...营地...填满了那个旧世界的城市。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chance for a new nation, new beginning. New way of thinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个新国家的机会，一个新的开始。新的思维方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could've breathed new life into the Mojave, bridging East, West. Like Hoover Dam... but not Old World, something you made. Road was a supply line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以给莫哈维注入新的活力，连接东部和西部，就像胡佛水坝一样...但不是旧世界，是你创造的。道路是一条补给线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're crazy. Your head's messed up worse than the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经疯了，你的脑子比大裂谷还混乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you've forgotten. Forgotten everything. Careless, as careless with futures then as you are now in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经忘了，忘掉了一切。 漫不经心，对莫哈维的漫不经心就如同你当时对待未来一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've walked a lot of hard roads, Mojave and before. Doesn't mean anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走过很多艰难的路，莫哈维还有之前都是如此。这并不意味着什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It means everything - even if you deny it, cast it aside, that speaks to what you are, proves what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它意味着否认它，抛开它，那也证明了你是什么，证明了这里发生的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Placeholder Node: Ulysses talking about the Divide history. Do Not Translate >
Never would have known the Divide had it not been for you. The road you made with your tracks, again and again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是你，我永远不会知晓大裂谷。你用你的足迹创造的道路，一遍又一遍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were the only one willing to make the journey to and from here... a hard road. Kept the land before the Divide alive through seasons, storms...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是唯一愿意往返于此的人...一条艰难的路。让大裂谷面前的土地在季节，在风暴中生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...can't have been just a job. Was something more to you. Don't feel for a place that hard unless it's home.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...不可能只是一份工作，对你来说意味着更多。除非是家，否则不要对一个地方有太强烈的感情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You keep saying that, as if you know where I was born - you don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直这么说，好像你知道我在哪里出生似的...你根本不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Home isn't where you're born into this world. You taught me that. Part of your message, whether you meant it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 家不是你出生的地方，你教会了我这一点。你传达的信息的一部分，无论你是否有意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can be a place of mind, a moment where you know who you are, the history of it. And they can be places you breathe life into.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以是一个心灵之地，一个你知道自己是谁的时刻，它的历史。是你可以为之注入生命的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been here before, at least not from this road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没来过这里，至少从这条路没来过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever they were carrying, they were fighting side by side with the ones in Legion armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他们带着什么，他们都和那些穿着军团盔甲的人并肩作战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not done talking to you yet, there's more I want to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没跟你谈完，我还有更多想知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already heard you once, long ago and loud enough for history to hear. Tired of your messages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经听过你一次了...很久以前，声音大到足以让历史听到。厌倦了你的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still - curiosity drove you this far. Let's see what else it can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过 - 好奇心驱使你走了这么远。让我们看看它还能做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanted me to come to the Divide, I'm here. Now what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我来大裂谷，我来了。现在呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your road's not done. Haven't walked it full yet, not nearly enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的路还没走到底。还没走完，还远远不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've had enough of this - whatever your game, I'm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够了...不管你在玩什么把戏，我都受够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you are. Cut off your retreat, your supply line. Ashton missile, turned Hopeville into a furnace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你没有。切断你的退路，你的补给线。阿什顿的导弹，将黎明镇化为一座熔炉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could walk back. Still can - but the Divide will mark you, sickness will set in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以回头，仍然可以 - 但大裂谷会给你打上烙印，病痛会来袭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not immediate, maybe, but in time. Slow burn, a little faster than before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是立即，也许，但是还算适时。缓慢的燃烧，比以前快一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The way ahead and below - leads to the heart of the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前方和下方的路 - 通往大裂谷的心脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there... you and I, we'll have an ending to things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里...你和我，我们将有一个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't intend to set off that missile over the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不打算在大裂谷上空引爆那枚导弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had no idea the silo was active until the missile was in the air toward Hopeville.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在导弹飞向黎明镇之前我都不知道发射井已经启动了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't stop you, though. Like carrying the Chip to Vegas, Old World death in your hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，并没有阻止你。就像把芯片带到拉斯维加斯，旧世界的死亡掌握在你的手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pieces of the Old World like that just need someone careless enough to take them where they need to go, to do their killing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的旧世界碎片只需要一个足够漫不经心的人带到它需要去的地方，进行杀戮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand how a package could have done this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白一个包裹是怎么做到的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will. I'll show the Mojave, Bear and Bull the way of it. How Couriers can break nations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会明白的。我会向莫哈维，熊和公牛展示，邮差是如何摧毁国家的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened here... can happen again. You've already proved it, what you did in Ashton. The silo there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里发生了什么...还有可能再次发生。你已经证明了这一点，你在阿什顿所做的一切，那里的发射井。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't be sure it was me.
No... I'm certain. What I hadn't known was that you still lived after the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...我很确定。我不知道的是你在大裂谷之后还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not responsible for this, there's no way I could have known.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的责任，我根本不可能知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you had been there when it happened. If you had seen the Divide break, you would know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果事情发生的时候你在场，如果你看到了大裂谷的崩塌，你就会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You carry death wherever you go - if the Mojave doesn't know it yet, it will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你走到哪里都带着死亡 - 如果莫哈维现在还不知道，它也会知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been West, it's possible, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去过西部，这是可能的，但是...

ESP.ORIGINAL: This package... I don't recall it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个包裹...我记不太清楚了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was from the West. From deep in NCR. Whether made by them or not... it came here. Through your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自西部，来自NCR的深处，不管是不是他们的制造的...它来到了这里。通过你的手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said I brought it from the West?
It was a device, a detonator. One I'd never seen before - or heard before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个装置，一个起爆器。我以前从未见过 - 也没听说过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You carried that thing to the Divide. I know because I followed you as you walked the road, watched you do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把那个东西带到了大裂谷。我知道，因为我在你走过的路上跟着你，看着你这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You brought it here, to the community you built. And you are responsible for what happened after - when the device opened, started to speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把它带到这里，带到你建立的社区。而你要对之后发生的一切负责 - 当这个设备打开，它开始说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it did, the Divide answered back. Those missiles you've seen, buried in their silos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当它说话之时，大裂谷回应了。你看到的那些导弹，埋在它的发射井里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They exploded beneath the ground, cracked the landscape. Sand, ash... the dead... the Divide skies became a graveyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们在地下爆炸，破坏了大地。沙尘、灰烬...死者...大裂谷的天空成为了墓地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had nothing to do with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟这事一点关系都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The logs of the Big Empty mentioned you'd spoken to history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大空洞的日志里提到你曾与历史对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had, did. It was madness... asked them a question in anger. Got an answer, more than I expected.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有过，做过。这很疯狂...愤怒地问了他们一个问题，得到了答案，比我预期的要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Answer told me what happened here at the Divide, the how of it, and that was enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答案告诉了我大裂谷发生了什么，是如何发生的，这就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tape has the telling of it, don't need me adding to the questions already there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 磁带里已经讲述了一切，不需要我再加上已经存在的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the logs... you mentioned a tribe called the Twisted Hairs - your tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在日志里...你提到一个叫做“卷发”的部落...你的部落？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Twisted Hairs are dead, lost at Dry Wells, died in Vulpes' smile. Won't discuss their fate with you, not now - their past is mine to keep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卷发部落已经死了，在枯井里消失了，死在了沃尔普斯的微笑中。我不会和你谈论他们的命运，现在不会 - 他们的过去由我来保留。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Walk farther, see me face to face - you might earn more. Now, let the words keep you without me adding to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走远一点，来和我面对面 - 你可能会得到更多。现在，让这些话陪伴你而不用我再补充。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some recordings from you on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在路上找到了一些你的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tapes... didn't think those would be found... weren't worth the words anyway, not like I'd forget what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些磁带...没想到会找到这些...反正也不值得多说，我也不会忘记发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had the tech from the Big Empty, recorder a woman gave me... on its last legs, didn't survive the road. Cast it and the tapes aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自大空洞的技术，一个女人给我的录音机...奄奄一息，没能在路上幸存。把它和磁带扔到一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you heard them... they're of no consequence. Ramblings, reminders for a man who doesn't need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你听了那些...它们毫无意义。胡言乱语，提醒一个不需要它们的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How were you planning to attack the Divide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算怎么进攻大裂谷？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't know, but Couriers can travel anywhere. They make roads into places no one else will go, guarded or not. Was going to watch, see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道，但是邮差能去任何地方。他们把路铺到别人去不了的地方，无论有没有守卫。本来打算观察的，看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion... thought it might get into the community through me, just as I'd found the way by following you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团...认为它可能通过我进入社区，就像我追随着你找到了路一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you struck first, shattered the ground, and let your home burn instead. Nearly killed me. And everyone here, walking or still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你先下手为强，粉碎了地面，让你的家被烧毁。差点杀了我，还有这里的每一个人，不管是走路的还是静止的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the Legion doesn't know what happened here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以军团也不知道这里发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, they don't know the history of it. So send others to find out, more to die... at the hands of their brothers the Divide has claimed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他们不知道它的历史。所以派其他人去寻找，更多的死亡...死在了那些被大裂谷认领的兄弟手上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter, the Bear's reach was cut off. Now only the Long 15 remains. Once that's finished, Mojave will be under the flag of the Bull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，熊的影响力被切断了 - 现在只剩下15号洲际公路。一旦那件事完成，莫哈维将在公牛的旗帜下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were planning to attack the NCR here, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你打算在这里袭击NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested in the history of this, we're done talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这段历史不感兴趣，我们谈够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Done with words, then, won't get you where you need to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。言尽于此，那么，不会带你去需要去的地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bear made its shadow felt here, more than I could handle. Heavy guard, watchful. I watched, waited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊在这里投下影子，超出了我的承受能力。重兵把守，严阵以待。我观察着，等待着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And as I watched, studied the people. The flag, markings. Thought perhaps... if I got rid of the Bear... what you had given life to might come again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一边观察，一边研究这些人。旗帜，标记，我想也许...如果我除掉了熊...你赋予生命的东西可能会再次出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waited too long. Hesitated. A Courier isn't meant to stay in one place for long. And then you came, with the package. History.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待的时间太久了，犹豫不决，邮差不该在一个地方待太久。然后你来了，带着那个包裹。历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the first I've heard of Legion coming this far West of the Colorado.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我第一次听说军团来到科罗拉多以西这么远的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, when they come this far, they aren't Legion. They walk as Couriers. Like we do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，当他们走到这一步，他们就不是军团了。他们以邮差的身份行走，就像我们一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Divide is the reason no Legion has been seen. None belong to Caesar. Not in this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而大裂谷就是没有军团出现的原因。没有一个人属于凯撒，至少在这里没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ones that came... were following orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来的那些人...都是奉命行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you are part of the Legion. One of their scouts? Assassins?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你也是军团的一员。他们的侦察兵？刺客？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assassin? If killing needs to be done, I'll face my victims... not kill from a distance, like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刺客？如果必须杀人，我会面对我的受害者...而不是像你一样从远处杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what made the Legion come to the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是军团来到大裂谷的原因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar’s orders. Every supply line gets cut, every community that feeds the Bear... cut its throat, starve the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒的命令。切断每一条补给线，每一个给熊提供食物的社区...割开它的喉咙，饿死莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the High Road, you mentioned NCR and Legion fought here... before and after the Divide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在正路上，你提到军团和NCR在这里战斗...你说的是这里变成大裂谷之前，还是之后？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The two-headed Bear made its claim, dug its claws into the trail you made. For once, it seemed like it might succeed - cut a route to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 双头熊提出了宣称，将爪子伸进了你留下的踪迹。这一次，它似乎可以成功 - 开辟一条通往莫哈维的路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't let NCR stay in the Divide. Trade route, road the military could use... can't have two roads into the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能让NCR留在大裂谷。贸易路线，军队可以使用的道路...不能有两条路通往莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not after the work we'd done to cut off New Canaan, other routes, killing caravans... all we'd done to make the West bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们切断了新迦南，其他路线，屠杀商队...我们为了让西部流血所做的一切之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing to keep me from walking out of here and letting you rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么能阻止我离开这里，让你腐烂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spent years looking for you. If you head back to the Mojave, it's like nothing's changed. Can live with that. Had to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 花了多年时间寻找你。如果你回到莫哈维，就像什么都没有改变。可以接受，不得不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't sure if history would matter to you. If it doesn't, that answers my question.
