ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定历史对你是否重要。如果不，那就解答了我的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you turn your back on your home, so be it. I'll remain here in the Divide for you to return. And you will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要背弃你的家，那就这样吧。我会留在大裂谷，等你回来。你会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not to blame for Ashton, the Chip, or the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿什顿、芯片和大裂谷的事不能怪我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All these roads, you walked. These packages you carried. Think it wasn't your choice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有这些路，你走过，这些包裹你带着。你认为这不是你的选择吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course it was your choice. You could have stayed in the Mojave. But you chose to come, couldn't let be - not in you to let go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这当然是你的选择。你本来可以留在莫哈维，但你选择了来到这，不能听之任之 - 不能让你放手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Came for no other reason than you were curious, restless - always have been. Had to know the why of it - now, I'll show you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来这的原因无非是你的好奇心，不安分 - 一直都是。必须知道为什么 - 现在，我来告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 我收到了你最后的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn’t think I’d be breathing to hear you say that. Message isn’t important, meaning is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到我还能活着听你说这话。消息并不重要，意义才是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had to speak of it, in case the words got lost in paper, ink, or other's voices. Maybe even yours, in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须说出来，以防这些单词被纸、墨水或其他的声音淹没。甚至可能是你的，迟早。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, meant for you. Courier to Courier. Belongs to you now, or history. Doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，是给你的，邮差给邮差。现在属于你了，或者属于历史。不重要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some recordings from you in Hopeville.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在黎明镇找到了一些你的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tapes... didn't think those would be found... you know the Divide better than I thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 磁带...没想到这些会被找到...你比我想象中更了解大裂谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had tech from the Big Empty, recorder a woman gave me... didn't survive the road, on its last legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自大空洞的技术，一个女人给我的录音机...没能在路上幸存，奄奄一息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cast it and the tapes aside... weren't worth the words anyway, not like I'd forget what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它和磁带扔到一边...反正也不值得多说，我也不会忘记发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you heard them... nothing but ramblings, reminders for a man who doesn't need them. Probably more, lying from here to the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你听了那些...只有胡言乱语，提醒一个不需要它们的人。可能更多，谎言从这里到大裂谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we first spoke in Hopeville, you mentioned you'd sworn not to kill me. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们第一次在黎明镇谈话时，你说过你发誓不杀我。为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the why of it. If you don't - I do, and that's enough. Shows trust only walks so far West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道个中原因。如果你不知道 - 我知道。展示了信任只能向西走这么远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earned more than that, though, getting this far. We walk the same road, carry the same colors. Can't break that by making the road red.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而走到这一步，已经赢得了更多。我们走过同样的路，带着相同的颜色。不能因为把路染红而破坏这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want more than that, walk the Divide. Answers'll come, closer you get to home... you and that machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要更多，就走过大裂谷。答案会来的，当你离家越近...你和那台机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what, they weren't that important then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...怎么，它们当时不那么重要？
[成功] 也许不。谁说得准呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, perhaps. Found them, heard them after I cast them aside - maybe there was purpose in that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，也许。找到了它们，在我将它们扔在一边之后听了它们 - 也许这是有目的的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they matter... if history matters... we'll see at the end of the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们重要...如果历史重要...我们会在路的尽头看到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't have recorded those messages if they didn't matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这些信息对你不重要，你就不会记录这些信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Words lost to history. Wouldn't have left them on the road otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 被历史遗忘的话。否则我也不会把它们留在路上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found more recordings from you on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在路上发现了你更多的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You scavenge words. Things I have no need of, no history there worth recounting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搜集言语。我不需要的东西，那里没有值得叙述的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scour the Divide, claw at it for meaning - but my words will give you no answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 翻找大裂谷，向它攫取意义 - 但我的言语不会给你答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... think they tell me... where you were. Things you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...认为他们告诉我...你在哪里，你做过的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] They won't help you understand what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 它们不会帮助你理解这里发生的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they won't help you understand me. Keep them, listen, study them - they won't help you here in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且它们不会帮助你理解我。留着它们，听着，研究它们 - 它们在大裂谷帮不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, there's a pattern. The more I hear, the more I understand your history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是一个样本。我听到的越多，就越了解你的历史。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Words lost to history. Wouldn't have left them on the road otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]被历史遗忘的话。否则我也不会把它们留在路上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what, they weren't that important then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...怎么，他们当时没那么重要？
[成功] 也许不。谁说得准呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, perhaps. Found them, heard them after I cast them aside - maybe there was purpose in that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，也许。找到了它们，在我将它们扔在一边之后听了它们 - 也许这是有目的的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they matter... if history matters... we'll see at the end of the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们重要...如果历史重要...我们会在路的尽头看到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't have recorded those messages if they didn't matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这些信息对你不重要，你就不会记录这些信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Words lost to history. Wouldn't have left them on the road otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]被历史遗忘的话。否则我也不会把它们留在路上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going after the Long 15? That's more miles than Legion can hold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要找15号公路？那是军团承受不了的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't hold it. Divide taught me you don't need to - just cut it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用占领它。大裂谷教会了我你不需要 - 切断它就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then the Mojave will fall, Bear will starve, its flag will burn. It's spent too long dying, the Long 15 will end it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后莫哈维将沦陷，熊会饿死，它的旗帜将被烧毁。它已经垂死太久了，15号公路将会终结它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, "when it woke?"
Machine couldn't speak by itself. Needed a terminal to access it... like the terminals in the silos here, or the machine with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器不能自己说话。需要一个终端来访问它...就像这里发射井的终端那样，或者与你一起的那台机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it was connected, it started speaking. And the Divide answered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当连接上后，它就开始说话了。而大裂谷回应了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a piece of machinery... military, holding memories, codes, maybe. When it woke, made these sounds... words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一台机器，军用的，保存了记忆，密码，也许。当它苏醒过来，发出这些声音...言语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it spoke, the Divide became fire, the ground... tore apart like the skies. Through it all, kept calling out - maybe calling for home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当它说话时，大裂谷变成了火海，地面...像天空一样被撕裂。这一切的一切，一直在呼唤 - 也许是呼唤家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand why you didn't kill me in Primm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白为什么你在普瑞姆没有杀了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Promises to keep. 'Courier shall not kill Courier.' Always - let them live, spread the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信守承诺。“邮差不得杀死邮差。”永远 - 让他们活着，传播消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] You didn't kill me in Primm because you still thought I was Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你在普瑞姆没有杀我是因为你还以为我是军团的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's orders. Some time before I realized the why of it. Wasn't just you. All couriers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒的命令，一段时间之后我才明白这是为什么。不仅仅是你，所有的邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No telling how many were Legion. Maybe all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道有多少人是军团。可能全部都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't sure about you. Until the Divide... all the NCR burning... that much death, it bears the mark of a Legion hand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于你我不确定，直到大裂谷,,,所有的NCR都在燃烧...那么的死亡，这带有军团之手的印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you killed like NCR. Like Hanlon, with mines, bombs... missiles. Killed Legion along with the Bear. Like a coward, kills from a distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你像NCR一样杀人。像汉隆那样，用地雷、炸弹...导弹。和熊一起杀死军团，像个懦夫一样，在远处杀人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were Legion, then NCR beat you, the West changed you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是军团，那么NCR控制了你，西部改变了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you made a promise not to kill me. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你承诺过不杀我，为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Promises to keep. 'Courier shall not kill Courier.' Always - let them live, spread the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信守承诺。“邮差不得杀死邮差。”永远 - 让他们活着，传播消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's our history? How do you know me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有什么历史吗？你是怎么认识我的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew of you, your name. Your road, to and from the Divide, what that meant for the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你，你的名字。你的道路，往返于大裂谷，以及这对军团意味着什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We never spoke, knew you through your actions. Knew you'd walked the West as I'd walked the East. Learned different lessons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从未交谈过，通过你的行动了解你。知道你像我走过东部一样走过西部，学到了不同的教训。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I would never have discovered the Divide without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且如果没有你，我永远也找不到大裂谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about this package I delivered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想多了解一下我送的这个包裹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what it was. Had the symbols of America on it. New markings. From after the Great War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那是什么。上面有美国的象征，新标志，来自大战之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought it might be America come again. Promise of another future. Another flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还以为可能是美国再次出现。另一个未来的承诺，另一面旗帜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before I go any farther, I deserve some answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我走得更远之前，我应得到一些答案。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've seen the Divide, walked it - farther than I thought you would. Not sure how much farther you have in you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经见过了大裂谷，走过了它 - 比我想象中更远。不知道你还能走多远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need answers, speak. You've earned them... even if only you and I can carry them from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要答案，就说出来。这是你应得的...即使只有你和我能从这里带走它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I have the answers, you've earned them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我有答案，你已经赢得了它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's more I need to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要知道的还有很多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... think they tell me... where you were. Things you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...认为他们告诉我...你在哪里，你做过的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] They won't help you understand what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 它们不会帮助你理解这里发生的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they won't help you understand me. Keep them, listen, study them - they won't help you here in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且它们不会帮助你理解我。留着它们，听着，研究它们 - 它们在大裂谷帮不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been collecting them. Listen to you talk about history enough, maybe I'll understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在收集它们。听你讲了足够多的历史，也许我会明白的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Words lost to history. Wouldn't have left them on the road otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]被历史遗忘的话。否则我也不会把它们留在路上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what, they weren't that important then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...怎么，他们当时没那么重要？
[成功] 也许不。谁说得准呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You, perhaps. Found them, heard them after I cast them aside - maybe there was purpose in that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，也许。找到了它们，在我将它们扔在一边之后听了它们 - 也许这是有目的的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they matter... if history matters... we'll see at the end of the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们重要...如果历史重要...我们会在路的尽头看到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't have recorded those messages if they didn't matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这些信息对你不重要，你就不会记录这些信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Words lost to history. Wouldn't have left them on the road otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]被历史遗忘的话。否则我也不会把它们留在路上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found some recordings from you on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在路上找到了一些你的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The tapes... didn't think those would be found... weren't worth the words anyway, not like I'd forget what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些磁带...没想到会找到这些...反正也不值得多说，我也不会忘记发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had the tech from the Big Empty, recorder a woman gave me... on its last legs, didn't survive the road. Cast it and the tapes aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自大空洞的技术，一个女人给我的录音机...奄奄一息，没能在路上幸存。把它和磁带扔到一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you heard them... they're of no consequence. Ramblings, reminders for a man who doesn't need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你听了那些...它们毫无意义。胡言乱语，提醒一个不需要它们的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You scavenge words. Things I have no need of, no history there worth recounting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你搜集言语。我不需要的东西，那里没有值得叙述的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scour the Divide, claw at it for meaning - but my words will give you no answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 翻找大裂谷，向它攫取意义 - 但我的言语不会给你答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk more about your recordings I found here in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想再跟你谈谈我在大裂谷找到的录音。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was never a Legion agent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来都不是军团的特工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that now. Doesn't change what was done. The Legion who died here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在知道了。但这不会改变已经发生的事，死在这里的军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you were Legion, you would answer for those deaths by Caesar's law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你是军团的人，你也要按照凯撒的律法为这些死亡负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't listened to them all. If there's time, I will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没有全部听完。如果有时间，我会的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I said before... it's of no consequence. Never intended you to find them, never intended you to hear them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正如我之前所说的...这无关紧要。从未打算让你找到它们，也从未打算让你听到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Questions in those tapes I still haven't found answers to. You won't be the one to give them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 录音带里的问题我还没有找到答案，你不会是那个给出答案的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you learned the wrong message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后你学到了错误的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really. Who's to say the truth of it. You? No. You walked from this, turned your back on it. Now you and others will answer for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确。谁能说出其中的真相，你吗？不，你从这里走开了，转身背弃了它。现在你和其他人要为此负责了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll start with the West. Let that burn. Then... if the East falters after, I'll bring the Divide there as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将从西部开始，让它燃烧。然后...如果东部畏缩了，我也会把大裂谷带到那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burn away the flags. Begin again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烧掉那些旗帜。重新开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might not believe in nations. I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能不相信有国家，我相信。
[成功] 你的行动承载着力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] Even if you have no faith in the NCR, I do. My actions have proven it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]就算你不信任NCR，我信。我的行动已经证明了这一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] There is conviction in your words, enough to rival a Legate, perhaps Caesar. You believe what you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你的言语充满信念，足够媲美一位特使，也许凯撒也行。你相信自己说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] The Legion is stronger than you know. If you would judge them, hear me first.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]军团的力量比你所知的更强大。如果你要审判他们，先听我说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Your actions have carried strength. More importantly, not for House, but for the families on the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你的行动承载着力量。更重要的是，不是为了豪斯，而是为了长街上的家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Vegas] Even if you have no faith in Vegas, I do... and my actions have proven it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [维加斯]就算你不信任维加斯，我信...而我的行动已经证明了这一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Words are not enough to bear the weight of your flag - if you follow anything at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]言语不足以承载你旗帜的重量 - 如果你追随着什么的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speeches are things of NCR, words without strength. Your actions have shown nothing. Your flag will burn. The Mojave will follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 演讲是NCR的小伎俩，是没有力量的言语。你的行动没有证明任何事。 你的旗帜将被烧毁，莫哈维紧随其后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] You might not believe in nations. I do.
[FAILED] You came from the West, walked there. You carry its sickness East to the Legion - and do not believe their cause enough to honor them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你来自西方，行走在那里。你把它的弊病带给了东部的军团 - 却不相信他们的事业，不尊重他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I give the Legion is a swifter death than the disease you bring. You have not the strength to bear a Legion standard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给予军团的将是比你带来的疾病更快的死亡，你没有力量来承受军团的旗帜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] You might not believe in nations. I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You serve Vegas ghosts, not the tribes Vegas devoured. House is not the people of Vegas - you have walked the Strip, yet have seen nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]你为维加斯的幽灵服务，而不是被维加斯吞噬的部落。豪斯不是维加斯的人民 - 你走过长街，却什么也没看见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your carelessness for the paths you walk - it has destroyed the city you serve. NCR will burn. Then the walls of Vegas will follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对自己走过的路漫不经心 - 这已经摧毁了你服务的城市。NCR会燃烧，然后维加斯的城墙也会随之倒塌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Vegas] You might not believe in nations. I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [维加斯]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yet you follow nothing at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 然而你什么也没有追随。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have walked the Mojave, let the shadow of flags fall upon you, yet walk carelessly, no allegiance. Your words - empty as your actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走过莫哈维，让旗帜的阴影落在你身上。然而走得漫不经心，没有忠诚。你的言语 - 和你的行为一样空洞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Rep] You might not believe in nations. I do.
If you speak for the two-headed Bear, I'll hear your words. Even if I will be the only one to hear them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要为双头熊说话，我会倾听你的言论。即使我是唯一的听众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you believe it should not die this day... then answer me why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你认为它不应该在这一天死去...那告诉我原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel I do not know the Legion's strength - then I will listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得我不了解军团的力量 - 那我也会听着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the ghosts of Vegas have come from behind their wall to speak for the West, I'll hear their words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果维加斯的幽灵们从围墙后走出来为西部说话，我会听到他们的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you believe that Vegas does not deserve to die as the Bear does... then answer me why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你认为维加斯不应该像熊一样死去...那就回答我为什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think this leads home?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你凭什么认为这能带你回家？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All roads lead back to one's home. Not your birthplace maybe, but home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的路都通向一个人的家。也许不是你的出生地，而是家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This road leads nowhere. There's nothing in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条路行不通，大裂谷里什么都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many in the Mojave think the Divide's nothing but canyon and storm. Wasn't always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多莫哈维的人认为大裂谷除了峡谷和风暴之外什么都没有。并不总是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was life, a town, farther West... not talking about an Old World town like Hopeville... more recent. Something you saw in your lifetime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里曾有生活，有城镇，更远的西部...不是说像黎明镇这样的小镇...更近。是你在有生之年看到的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It had the name "the Divide," too. But rather than cracks in the earth, it was a road from the West into the Mojave, a supply line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它也有一个名字叫“大裂谷”。但它不是大地的裂缝，而是一条从西部进入莫哈维的道路，一条补给线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took a Courier to make that road. You. Back then, you saw the road with eyes facing East. This time... the Divide's in the other direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开辟那条路需要一名邮差，你。那时，你是朝东看向这条路的。这一次...大裂谷在另一个方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if your eyes try to make sense of it when you reach it... home's not what it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果当你到达的时候眼睛试图理解它...家已经不再是过去的样子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not taking ED-E from me.
If you think you can take it from me, try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得你能从我这里夺走，那就试试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The machine you brought is mine now, it's coming home. I'll reduce it to parts, just enough to function, to be aware of what's happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你带来的机器现在是我的了，它要回家了。我会把它拆解成几个部分，刚好可以运行，以便了解发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gave it a name. What was it to you? Companion? Slave... weapon? All of that, nothing compared to its primary function.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给了它一个名字，它对你来说是什么？同伴？奴隶...武器？所有这些与它的主要功能相比都不算什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you bomb the West and East... is this how things should end?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你轰炸西部和东部...事情应该就这样结束？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] History has proven this. Our history.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功 历史已经证明过这一点了。我们的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seek to use your own crimes to prevent mine. There... is a strange honor in that. Perhaps the shadow of the Bull does walk with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你试图用你的罪行来阻止我的。这...是一种奇怪的荣誉，也许公牛的影子确实与你同行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The West, the East - they are not the Divide, and nothing you can do can prevent the missile's launch. Convincing me - changes nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西部，东部 - 它们不是大裂谷，你做什么都无法阻止导弹的发射。说服我 - 改变不了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no honor in murder from a distance, NCR or Legion. You know this from the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从远处谋杀没有荣誉可言，无论是NCR还是军团。你从大裂谷就知道了这一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] You answer me with questions. Doubt. You were strong enough to come here - but not strong enough to speak for all the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你用问题来回答我。不确定。你有足够的力量来到这里 - 但还没有强大到可以代表军团发声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the ending they deserve... a flag is a thing of the people that gather to it, as are all symbols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他们应得的结局...旗帜是人们聚集在一起的产物，正如所有的象征一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You believe. Yet you do not see that killing a symbol with its own weapon carries justice of its own... just as it will when the East dies as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信。但你没有看到用自己的武器来杀死一个象征本身就是一种正义...就像东部灭亡时那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas earned its right to survive, its people don't deserve what's about to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯赢得了生存的权利，它的人民不应该遭受即将发生的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] History has proven this. Our history.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功 历史已经证明过这一点了。我们的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you think that you have this strength? Enough to hold up NCR, long enough so that Vegas may live again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你有这种力量吗？足以支撑起NCR足够长的时间，让维加斯重获生机吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if you speak for Vegas and its ghosts, nothing you can do can prevent the missile's launch. Convincing me - changes nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你替维加斯和它的幽灵说话，你也无法阻止导弹的发射。说服我 - 改变不了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You told me once I gave life to the Divide. I can do it again, and give life to Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经告诉我，我赋予了大裂谷生命。我可以再来一次，给维加斯生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... your answer is not enough.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They deserve what comes. Vegas is born of the corrupt, the blind, lost, that gather to it. Without them... it would fall dark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他们应得的。维加斯是由堕落、盲目、迷失的人组成的...没有他们，它将陷入黑暗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You believe. Yet... you have been blinded by the wrong symbol. Let its light give you what strength it can... today marks its end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信。然而...你被错误的象征蒙蔽了双眼。让它的灯光给你它所能给予的力量，今天标志着它的终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There still might be a way out of this - I just need time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许还有办法...我只是需要时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've already handled everything it can throw at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经处理了所有可能的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide? What do you mean?
Our enemies gather outside... shadows of the Bear and Bull... they will have found their way in, just as you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的敌人聚集在外面...熊和公牛的影子...他们会找到进入的方法，就像你那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was always my intention - in case I could not kill you, the Marked Men would flood this place, cut off your escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一直是我的计划 - 万一我杀不了你，烙印者也会淹没这个地方，切断你的退路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we cannot prevent what comes, then let us make our stand here. Two Couriers, together, at the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们不能阻止将要发生的事，那就让我们站在这里。两个邮差，一起，在大裂谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if the missiles launch, and I die here - if I can convince you, that's enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使导弹发射，我死在这里，如果我能说服你，那对我来说就足够了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe that one person can make... or break... a nation. You already know this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信，一个人可以创造...或毁灭...一个国家。 你已经知道这一点了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It may be... that as much destruction has been written in the earth here... you may build something else, as you built the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是...这里的大地已经写下了如此多的毁灭...你可以建立别的，就像你建立大裂谷那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have spoken truly. There is a shadow of a nation behind you, the hope of a people... yet it may not matter. The Divide still stands against us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得很对。你身后有一个国家的影子，一个民族的希望...然而这可能无关紧要，大裂谷仍然与我们对立。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I just said all that because I'm betting you have some way to stop all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之所以这么说，是因为我相信你有办法阻止这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you resort to trickery. You were hoping that you could deceive me, reveal that somehow I can stop all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你诉诸于欺骗。你希望你能骗到我，揭示我有某种方法阻止这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fire will rain on the West and the East, as intended, and the last words of the messenger of the Bull - nothing but lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 火雨会落向西部和东部，正如预期的那样。而公牛使者的最后一句话 - 除了谎言什么都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: The West will burn, as intended, and Vegas will follow. The last words of its messenger, were not for the people of the city, but lies and deceit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西部将会如期燃烧，维加斯紧随其后。它的使者说的最后一句话，不是为了城里的人民，而是谎言和欺骗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your nation will burn, as intended, and the last words of its messenger, were not for its people, but to beg for mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的国家将如期燃烧，它的使者说的最后一句话，不是为了人民，而是乞求宽恕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because it should be given a chance? Its people don't deserve what's about to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为应该给它一个机会？它的人民不应该遭受即将发生的一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] History has proven this. Our history.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 历史已经证明了这一点。我们的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you think that you have this strength? Enough for all of NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为有这样的实力吗？足以对抗所有的NCR？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The West is not the Divide, and nothing you can do can prevent the missile's launch. Convincing me - changes nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西部不是大裂谷，你阻止不了导弹的发射.说服我-改变不了什么
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One can build a community, make it stronger. You saw it at the Divide, even blamed me for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人可以建立一个社区，使其更加壮大。你在大裂谷看到了这一点，甚至为此指责我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] No... your answer is not enough.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They deserve what comes... and should answer for it, as you should. The Bear is a thing of the people that gather to it, as are all symbols.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他们应得的...也应该像你一样为此负责。熊是人们聚集在一起的产物，和所有的象征一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You believe. Yet... you believe in the wrong symbol. Let it give you what strength it can... soon, it will be no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信。然而...你相信的是错误的象征。让它给你它的力量吧...很快，它将不复存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I care if you fire missiles at NCR? Go ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我在乎你向NCR发射导弹吗？去做吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You destroyed your own homeland. Seeing a nation burn? Didn't think that would matter any more to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你摧毁了自己的家园。看到一个国家燃烧？我以为这对你来说已经不重要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a strength in that... lack of attachment. Still, you're here now. If there's no more answers you want, then we'll end this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里面有一种力量...缺乏信念。不过，你现在已经在这里了。如果你不想知道更多的答案，那我们就结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't destroy the West, even with all the missiles here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使有那么多导弹，你也无法摧毁西部。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to destroy the Bear, just cut its throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要摧毁熊，只要割断它的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You taught me that at the Divide - only need to cut off the supply line, the road, to watch something greater die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在大裂谷教会了我 - 只要切断补给线，切断道路，就能看到更大的东西死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll turn the Long 15 into miles of fire, cut off the Mojave. NCR will fall back, lose Hoover Dam... and leave their throats exposed to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把15号洲际公路变成火海，切断莫哈维的通道。NCR会撤退，放弃胡佛大坝...把他们的咽喉暴露给军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Topic Storage: End Sequence with Ulysses in Temple. Do not translate. >
And knowing that you believe in the Bear's sickness and have given it strength... then that gives more reason to lay waste to your homeland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也知道你相信熊的疾病并赋予了它力量...那就更加有理由摧毁你的家园了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sickness of the Bear already lies within you, even if you uphold the East. If there were time, I would let you kill the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊的疾病已经在你体内了，即使你拥护东部。假如果有时间，我会让你杀死军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no, the Legion will burn as well. Without the West to challenge it... its shore will be closer than before. It will feed on itself, die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不，军团也会被烧毁。没有来自西部的挑战...它的海岸会比以前更近。它会以自己为食，然后死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without NCR to support it, Vegas will fall to the Legion. That grave of lights, back to dust and ghosts, as was meant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有了NCR的支持，维加斯将会落入军团之手。那座灯火通明的坟墓，又将归于尘土和幽灵，如其所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After this, only one flag will remain over the Mojave. Let that one fly, or destroy itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这之后，莫哈维的上空只会有一面旗帜。要么飘扬，要么自我毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't see, listen - even when it's all around you, no matter if I nailed it into your head like a gift from Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不看，不听 - 即使它就在你身边，不管我是否把它像凯撒的礼物一样钉进你的头颅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: You brought the Divide to life, Courier. You walked the road. Brought the Bear, then the Bull, brought me, following your tracks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给了大裂谷生命，邮差。你走过那条路，带来了熊，然后是公牛；带来了我，跟随着你的足迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when I saw the Divide you made, I saw a second chance, a new way of thinking. My world - no longer the East.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我看到你造就的大裂谷，我看到了第二次机会，一种新的思考方式。我的世界 - 不再是东部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you brought the West in that package. Destroyed it all. Nearly killed me, flesh and spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后你从那个包裹中带来了西部。毁灭了这一切，差点杀死我，肉体和精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You destroyed something larger than the Bear, greater than the Bull. And even when you could have turned away, you brought it again, in that machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你摧毁了比熊更大的东西，比牛更大的东西。甚至当你可以转身离开的时候，你又把它带来了，在那台机器里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You destroyed a nation taking its first breath. A place that could have been my home. Now, I'll destroy yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你摧毁了一个初生的国家。一个本可以成为我的家的地方。现在，我将摧毁你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is between you and me, not anyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你我之间的事，与其他人无关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... the paths we've walked. The roads, and the flags above them, carry equal blame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...我们走过的路，这些道路，和道路上的旗帜都负有同样的责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what - you intend to bomb the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，怎么，你打算炸了莫哈维？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the West. The East. It doesn't matter - the death of either one kills the other, Vegas along with it. The West shall answer first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，西部，东部。这无关紧要 - 任何一方的死亡都会杀死另一方，维加斯也会随之而死。西部将首先付出代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not the Mojave. The West, all that's been built since America died. Same symbols as before the war, now a flag carried by a tribe of children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是莫哈维。是西部，美国灭亡后所建立的一切。与战前相同的象征，现在成了一群孩子们挥舞的旗帜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You walked the West, didn't stay. You know the reason... the Bear grows without structure, follows a symbol without knowing its history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走过西部，没有停留。你知道原因...熊在没有结构的情况下生长，追随着一个象征而不知道它的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened at the Divide, what I did, was an accident. What you're doing - it's madness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大裂谷发生的事，我做的事，都是意外。你现在做的事，太疯狂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, now there is purpose. I believe you when you say you were... careless. The Divide... the Chip... the machine you brought here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，现在有了目标。我相信你说你曾经...漫不经心。大裂谷...芯片...你带来的机器...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Many messages can be taken from that, intended or not. What I do now is an act of conviction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以从中获取许多信息，不管是否有意。我现在所做的是一种信念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you blame me for the Divide, then let me answer for it, not others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你把大裂谷的事怪在我头上，那就让我来负责，而不是其他人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blame you? No, learned from you. Both the weapon to kill a nation, and the strength to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怪你？不，是跟你学的。既有杀死一个国家的武器，也有这么做的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You showed me a road, a way to carry my message. You've already answered for what you've done. Now the flag you follow will answer for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我指明了一条路，一条传递我信息的路。你已经为你的所作所为付出了代价，现在你所追随的旗帜将对此负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buried in the Divide. Part of it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埋在大裂谷里，现在是它的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wherever it is, it's been silent... if it spoke again, we'd know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论它在哪里，一直很沉默...如果它再次说话，我们就知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would I have brought it here?
I've walked the East. You've walked the West, more than I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我走过了东部。你走过了西部，比我更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Circle Junction. Reno. Vault City. Word of you at Fort Aradesh... Fort Abandon. Even further West than that, Brahmin drives on the Big Circle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 圆圈枢纽、里诺、地下掩体市。你在亚拉德什要塞的消息...也就是遗弃要塞。甚至更远的西部，婆罗门沿着大圆圈行驶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you saw out there, wasn't enough to make you stay. Maybe the markings on the package reminded you of the road home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你在外面看到了什么，都不足以让你留下。也许包裹上的标记让你想起了回家的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This package... you said it had markings? What was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个包裹...你说上面有个标记？什么样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Machinery. Simple on the outside, computer parts. Inside... more complicated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械。外观简单，电脑零件。内部...更加复杂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was the only time I'd heard a machine speak in the Divide, the only machine with a voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我在大裂谷唯一一次听到机器说话，也是唯一有声音的机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is revenge for nearly killing you, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这就是对差点杀了你的报复。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the name I'd give it. Not the name the dead would give it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我给它的名字，也不是死者会给它的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soldiers of the Bear died here... Legion died, too, my brothers. Still dying, both of them, all around us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊的士兵死在这里...军团也死了，我的兄弟们。他们俩仍在死去，就在我们周围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of the people that lived here survived... yet all of the West and the East, they hold on as the Divide tears at them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活在这里的人无一幸存...然而所有的西部和东部，都在大裂谷的撕扯中坚持着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Revenge isn't the message I have for you. More than that... Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 复仇并不是我给你的信息，不止如此...邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you blame me for this? An accident?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你把这归咎于我？ 一个意外？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blame? Accident? The names you hang on this... Courier... you carry death wherever you go, Mojave knows - or will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 归咎？意外？你的名字挂在这上面...邮差...你走到哪里都带着死亡，莫哈维知道 - 或者将会知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you answer for this. The road doesn't end here, there's more to come, I swear to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会看到你为这个付出代价的。这条路不会到此为止，还有更多的路要走，我向你发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you saw this happen, then how did you survive?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你目睹了这一切，那你是怎么活下来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should've died there... but now that I know you live... the machines here... saved me. I was the only survivor, or thought I was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该死在那里的...但现在我知道你还活着...这里的机器...救了我。我是唯一的幸存者，或者说我认为我是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your package, the message inside, awoke medical machines... close to the one that shadows you... began to build themselves, then others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的包裹，里面的信息，唤醒了医疗机器...和跟着你的那个很像...它们开始组装自己，然后是其他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They only take what parts they find in the Divide, never roam beyond it - can't even leave the silos without a human to shadow, like hounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们仅仅在大裂谷搜集自己所需，从不在大裂谷以外的地方游荡 - 甚至不能在无人跟随的情况下离开发射井，像猎犬一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe they saw the flag on my jacket, thought I was of America. If so, history saved me. A sign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许它们看到了我夹克上的旗帜，以为我是美国人。如果是这样，历史拯救了我，一个符号拯救了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place was important to the Legion?
Why did NCR want to keep the route open?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么NCR想要保持这条路线的畅通？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] NCR would have needed this supply line open to reinforce the Mojave - and Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]NCR需要这条补给线开放来增援莫哈维...和胡佛大坝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] The Legion would want to cut this road off if it had been a supply line to Hoover Dam.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]如果这条路是胡佛大坝的补给线那军团会想把它切断的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The why of it. Hoover Dam.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bear, NCR, couldn't be allowed to reach it easily. Long 15... Canaan... both bad enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊，NCR，不能让它轻易到达。15号公路...迦南...都够糟糕的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kimball, Caesar, House... you'd think their whole world was that wall, cutting the Colorado. If I'd never laid eyes on it, never spoke of it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 金博尔、凯撒、豪斯...你会以为他们的世界就是那堵墙，切断科罗拉多河。如果我从没见过它，从没提起过它...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...but once found, it was all Caesar could see. That, and the flag beyond it, another symbol, big enough to challenge him.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...而一旦发现了，凯撒眼里就只有它了。那上面还有一面旗帜，另一个象征，大到足以挑战他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Divide, one of the roads to it - Legion was tasked with cutting that artery. If you can't kill the Bear in one stroke, bleed it, starve it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而大裂谷 - 通往它的道路之一，军团的任务是切断这条动脉。如果你不能一举杀死熊，就给它放血，让它挨饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That kind of murder... it's what any of the Legion would have done. Now... the Divide belongs to history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种类型的谋杀...是任何一个军团都会的事情。现在...大裂谷属于历史了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something wrong? You sound... mad... at my robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么问题吗？ 你听起来...很生气...对我的机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Hate? No. There's nothing to hate in metal... steel, gold. Or platinum.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 恨？不。金属没什么可恨的...钢铁、黄金。或者铂金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your machine... it's just a tool, made of wreckage of the Divide... all that was brought here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的机器...它只是一个工具，由大裂谷的残骸构成...所有被带到这里的东西构成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a lot of hate for the robot with me. I can hear it in your voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对和我在一起的机器人有很多仇恨，我可以从你声音中听出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] When I speak in anger, Courier, you'll know it. Your machine? Worth no more hate than any other machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 当我愤怒的说话时，邮差，你会知道的。你的机器？不比任何其他机器更值得仇恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're saying I walked this road once from another direction - from West to East. To home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说我从另一个方向...从西到东...走过这条路。回家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The nations of the Mojave. Cracked and broken as the Divide... its people, the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维的国家。像大裂谷一样裂开和破碎...它的人民，也是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have walked at Caesar's command, across the East, into the West. Far enough to know Caesar's word did not drive me. Far enough to see the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾受凯撒之命，穿越东部，前往西部。远到足以知道凯撒的话无法激励我，远到可以看到尽头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've seen it. No Courier, whatever their flag can ignore it. Why you didn't stay in the West. Why you wandered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经见到了，没有邮差，无论他们的旗帜是什么都可以忽略。为什么你没有留在西部，为什么你一直在徘徊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no future in the Bear or Bull. The Bear is diseased, barely clings to life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊或牛都没有未来。熊已经病入膏肓，勉强苟延残喘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Bull... when the Legion reaches the sea, it will turn on itself and die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而公牛...当军团到达海边，它会自我毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing one will end both. And you made me see how one could do it. Your ignorance, carelessness - can be used with a purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死一个就能终结两者。你让看到了一个人要如何做到这一点，你的无知，漫不经心 - 可以被有目的的利用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this is why you're angry, you've seen nothing yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这就是你生气的原因，你还什么都没看到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this is revenge, then. For destroying the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这就是报复，因为摧毁了大裂谷的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's why you want me dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么你想要我死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My history isn't revenge, or hate. The road that brought us both here - isn't about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的历史不是复仇，也不是憎恨。这条路指引着我们两个走到这里 - 不是为了这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's about the message you carried. The one in that package, whether you knew it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是关于你带来的那个信息。包裹里的那个，不管你知不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The message that one can kill a nation. Can kill a symbol. And all that gather beneath its flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这段信息是关于一个人可以杀死一个国家，可以杀死一个象征，以及聚集在其旗帜下的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't blame you for the Divide. I blame you for what you made me see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不责怪你造就了大裂谷。我只因为你让我看到的东西而责怪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you will see what you brought to the Mojave, and that will be my message to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你将看到你究竟给莫哈维带来了什么，而这将是我给你的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All things come to an end. If you put faith in something outside yourself, tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有的事情都会结束。 如果你把信心放在自己以外的东西上，那就很难了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you cared about the Divide, then I'm sorry for what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的在乎大裂谷，那我为这里发生的事感到抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you believed in this place. What it once was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你相信这个地方，它曾经的样子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was hope here, another chance. A new nation, stirring to life. A place I could have set my flag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有希望，有另一个机会。一个新的国家，生命在萌动。一个我可以树立自己旗帜的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not the America of old. But something larger than the tribes of the East, something larger than the houses of the West. Something better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是过去的美国。但是比东方的部落更大，比西方的房子更大。更好的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide... could have bridged both, like Hoover Dam. Now like the Dam, it's too covered in blood to see what it could have been.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷...本可以成为连接两者的桥梁，就像胡佛大坝那样。现在也像大坝那样，被鲜血覆盖，看不出可能是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gave life to this place. I followed your road here, saw the Divide. You led me here, so that I could see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给了这个地方生命。我沿着你的道路来到这里，看到了大裂谷。你带我来这里，我才能看到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then, you brought it to an end.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad this place burned... obviously, it meant something to you, which makes it even better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴这个地方被烧毁了...显然，这对你来说很重要，那就更好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm responsible for this. My question is what your tie to this place is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为我是罪魁祸首。我的问题是你跟这地方有什么关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you blame me for what happened here at the Divide - why do you care?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你把大裂谷发生的事都怪在我身上...你为什么在乎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The community that was once here... and the package you brought... both had markings of the Divide. Markings of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿曾经的社区...和你带来的包裹...都有着大裂谷的印记，美国的印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've seen the marks, the symbol. As early as the Hopeville silo, maybe. Carried it etched on your weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过那些记号，那些象征。也许早在黎明镇的发射井就见过了，把它刻在了你的武器上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide, its buildings, its people, were built around those same markings, surrounded them here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷，它的建筑，它的人民，都是围绕着这些相同的标志而建的，在这里围绕着它们...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...markings like the flag on my back. When I followed your road to the Divide those years ago, I saw the symbol I wore all around me.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...像我背后的旗帜一样的印记。那些年，当我沿着你的路走向大裂谷时，我在周围看到了我佩戴的象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: An Old World symbol. Strong, to survive here - its people, strong. Outlast the Bear, outlast the Bull. Promise of something better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世界的象征。坚强，才能在这里生存 - 它的人民，坚强。熬过了熊，熬过了牛。预示着更好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar was right to want it dead. NCR was right to want to rake their claws in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒想要它死是对的。NCR想把他们的爪子伸向它也是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing it... changed me, just as seeing Hoover Dam changed Caesar and the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到它...改变了我，正如看到胡佛大坝改变了凯撒和NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing it end changed me, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到它的终结，也改变了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Killing NCR, cutting off their supply line at the Divide serves Legion, as do we all.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]杀死NCR，切断他们在大裂谷的补给线对军团有好处，对我们也一样。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I carry no hatred for duty... if that's what this was. The Divide was more than that. Its people, more than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不憎恨责任...如果这就是的话。大裂谷不止于此，它的人民，不止于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're Legion, are you angry because I destroyed the Divide supply line instead of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是军团，你会因为我破坏了大裂谷补给线而生气吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The supply line - the artery for the West? I have seen the blood of NCR at Legion hands many times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 补给线 - 西部的动脉？我已经多次见到军团的双手被NCR的鲜血浸染。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I carry no hatred for duty... if that's what this was. The Divide was more than that. Its people, more than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不憎恨责任...如果这就是的话。大裂谷不止于此，它的人民，不止于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then what? Did the Divide explosion kill your family? Your wife - children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢？大裂谷爆炸杀死了你的家人吗？你的妻子...孩子吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] The dead? You mean your brothers in the Legion - our brothers.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]死者？你是说你军团里的兄弟...我们的兄弟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion who died here... they didn't deserve to die, like those that died in the fires of Boulder City... bombs, Hanlon's gifts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死在这里的军团...他们不应该死去，就像那些死在巨石城大火中的人一样...炸弹，汉隆的礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their deaths were mercy compared to those who still walk. Any who die beneath the flag of the Bull... their death should be in battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与那些仍在行走的人相比，他们的死亡是仁慈的。任何死在公牛旗帜下的人...他们应该死在战场上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no... the dead number more than my brothers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是不...死者的数量比我的兄弟要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [NCR] The dead? You mean the Republic troops who were here?
ESP.TRADUIT: [NCR]死者？你是说这里的共和国军队？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The soldiers of the Bear? They were dead already, their symbol... diseased. Deserved to die as my brothers did at Boulder City, mines, bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊的士兵？他们已经死了，他们的象征...病态。就该像我的兄弟们在巨石城那样死去，地雷、炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I carry nothing for them. Their deaths here were a mercy - compared to the ones that still walk the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有带给他们任何东西。他们死在这里是一种仁慈 - 与那些仍在大裂谷中行走的人相比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you speak of the dead - you mean the Marked Men? The Legion and NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的死者，是指那些烙印者？军团和NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The soldiers of the Bear? They were dead already, their symbol... diseased. Deserved to die as my brothers did at Boulder City, mines, bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊的士兵？他们已经死了，他们的象征...病态。就该像我的兄弟们在巨石城那样死去，地雷、炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I carry nothing for them. Their deaths here were a mercy - compared to the ones that still walk the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有带给他们任何东西。他们死在这里是一种仁慈 - 与那些仍在大裂谷中行走的人相比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for my brothers in the Legion... they deserved to die in battle, as do all beneath the flag of the Bull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我军团的兄弟们...战死沙场是他们应得的，就像所有在公牛旗帜下的人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no... the dead number more than my brothers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是不...死者的数量比我的兄弟要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide explosion... what, did I kill your family? Your wife - children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷爆炸...等等，我杀死了你的家人吗？你的妻子...孩子吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My family? My tribe lives... its history? Died long ago, fell under the shadow of the Bull... consumed by another symbol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的家人？我的部落生活...它的历史？很久以前就死了，倒在公牛的阴影之下...被另一个象征所吞噬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, this isn't about family - or any common blood. It's blood shared by acts, not by chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这和家庭无关 - 或者说任何血缘。这是有行动而共有的血液，不是偶然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened here was an accident. Any anger you have, let it go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里发生的是一场意外。你有任何的愤怒，都放下吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're angry because I accidentally brought an explosive to the Divide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你很愤怒，因为我意外地把炸药带到了大裂谷？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accident? Ignorance is a choice. The Chip - a choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 意外？无知是一种选择。芯片 - 也是一种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for anger... it is what I carry for the dead, and all that come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于愤怒...这是我为死者和所有来到这里的人所背负的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The why of it?" You're the one who needs to answer that - why are you doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: “为什么呢？”你才是那个需要回答这个问题的人...你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to hear the answer of it. Not just history's answer... your answer for what happened here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想听听你的答案，不仅仅是历史的答案...你对这里发生的事的答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] I'll see that you answer for it.
Then Legion kills Legion. Farther you walk from the flag of the Bull, the more West creeps into you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后军团杀死了军团。你离公牛的旗帜越远，西部就越深入你的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] I didn't side with the Legion until the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]直到莫哈维我才站在军团一边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that now. Doesn't change what was done. The Legion who died here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在知道了。但这并不改变已经发生的事，这里死去的军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion doesn't know your history. I do. They find out what happened here, how many of their own died... they'll want an answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团不了解你的过往，我了解。他们发现了这里发生的事情，死了多少自己人...他们需要一个答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's inside that machine - that's all that mattered. All the machines here, made of wreckage from the Divide... and all that was brought here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这台机器里面的东西 - 才是最重要的。这里所有的机器都是由大裂谷的残骸制成的...以及所有被带到这里的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inside its frame, it carries the message you brought here... and it'll do what it was programmed to do: whatever it can to get home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在它的框架里，承载着你带来的信息...它会按照设定的程序去执行：尽一切可能回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The giants here will listen to it. I'll bring the Divide to your home, your nation. Let its flag burn, just like you let the Divide burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的巨人会听到。我将把大裂谷带到你的家，你的国家。让它的旗帜燃烧，就像你让大裂谷燃烧一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Mountain access code... Ulysses. Command override...
ESP.TRADUIT: 大山脉访问码...尤利西斯。指令超驰...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
