ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a messenger. Like us... and it shares our history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是一个信使。像我们一样...它分享我们的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel its loss... remember you could have turned away at any time. Gone back home, and none of this would have happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你感觉到它的迷失...记住你可以在任何时候转身离开，回到家，这一切就不会发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you had to make one last delivery, and that's why I knew you'd come, Courier. Couldn't stay away, it's who you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你必须做最后一次送货，这就是为什么我知道你会来，邮差。你无法置身事外，这就是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe there's something similar to be said about that Old World flag on your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你背上的旧世界国旗也有类似的含义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, what it means is that what pieces survive can become worse than they were before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这意味着幸存下来的东西可能会变得比以前更糟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's proof that killing a symbol is going to be harder than you thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这证明杀死一个象征比你想象中要难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back to symbols and history, then. Hard to kill... like Couriers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就回到象征和历史上来吧。很难杀死...就像邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're saying when the meaning gets lost - that what happens here, can make things worse. Happened in the Mojave. Flags of the Bear and Bull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是当失去意义时 - 这里发生的事，会让事情变得更糟。在莫哈维发生过，熊和牛的旗帜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you carry two symbols then - the mark of America and the Twisted Hairs, neither dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你身上有两个象征 - 美国的标志和卷发部落，都没有死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both... both survived, pieces of them. Remnants, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个...两个都活了下来，它们的碎片。残迹，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Twisted Hairs survived, even after Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是卷发部落幸存了下来，甚至在凯撒之后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, they didn't. They were ended, completely. Became part of history's march.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他们没有。他们结束了，彻底。成为了历史前进的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel there is meaning in the White Legs taking the braids of my tribe... what they did... insult, not respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你觉得白腿部落拿走我族人的辫子有任何意义的话...他们的做法...是侮辱，不是尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the death of that history, another was born, and you grew to respect the White Legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那段历史的消亡中，另一段历史诞生了，你逐渐尊重白腿部落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Respect the White Legs? That tribe of jackals? Never.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊重白腿？那帮豺狼？从来没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the log, you said they were shadows, in the way they wore their hair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在日志里，你说他们是影子，从他们的发型来看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The braids I wore. They took that from me, thought it made them more like me, more willing to have Caesar listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我蓄的辫子。他们从我这拿走了，以为这会让他们更像我，更能让凯撒听从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They didn't know what the braids meant, the mark of my tribe before Caesar came... before Vulpes came for them at Dry Wells.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不知道这些辫子意味着什么，在凯撒来之前我部落的标志...在沃尔普斯到枯井找到他们之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was death in that meeting, even while Vulpes smiled - asked for our help against the other tribes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那次会面中包含着死亡，即使是当在沃尔普斯微笑的时候 - 他请我们帮助对抗其他部落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the while, they were looking to cast our history on the fire. And did. Another tribe, consumed by the Bull - nothing left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自始至终，他们一直都在寻求将我们的历史付之一炬，并且做到了。又一个部落，被公牛吞噬 - 什么都没留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're wrong, and you led them to destroy your tribe at New Canaan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你错了，是你引导他们摧毁了你在新迦南的部落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm talking about the past, in the respect they showed you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是过去，从他们对你的尊重来看。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The White Legs might as well have been your people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些白腿部落也可能是你的人民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The White Legs? To even claim they were shadows of the Twisted Hairs...
ESP.TRADUIT: 白腿？甚至可以声称他们是卷发部落的影子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, whatever words you heard, they were not mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不管你听到什么，都不是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But your tribe was New Canaan.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any symbol deserves a chance to defend itself, by words or acts - not... this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何象征都应该有机会通过言语或行为来捍卫自己...而不是...这样。
正如你现在捍卫的那样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It hasn't proven itself wrong. That's why the Legion and NCR conflict must continue. To test it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它还没有证明自己是错的，这就是军团和NCR冲突必须继续下去的原因。来测试它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test it. As you test me? As if you believe there is some other road here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试它。就像你测试我一样？好像你相信这里还有其他道路似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing can prevent what comes. The missiles will launch. These questions - your words, or mine - what do they matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么能阻止即将到来的事了，导弹将会发射。这些问题- 你的话，或者我的话 -它们对你有什么重要的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 按你的标准？还是历史的？
两者都有。你为什么关心这些？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said in the logs yourself that technology's a dead road. These missiles will solve nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你自己在日志里说过科技是一条死路，这些导弹解决不了任何问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those are my words. After what happened with the Brotherhood... talking with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我说的话。在和钢铁兄弟会发生的事之后...和他们谈了谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then with the rulers of the Big Empty. But it is their philosophy that was flawed - their weapons, used with new perspective...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后是大空洞的统治者们。 但他们的哲学是有缺陷的 - 他们的武器，用新的视角来使用...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those weapons can be used to kill a symbol that has already proven itself wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些武器可以用来杀死一个已经被证明是错误的象征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you believe the destruction of the Divide was just, then I cannot stop you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你认为摧毁大裂谷是正义的，那我无法阻止你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just? There was no justice in it, it was an act of carelessness, a coward. Killing an idea, before it had a chance...
ESP.TRADUIT: 正义？这里面没有正义可言，这是一个粗心大意的行为，一个懦夫。扼杀一个想法，在它有机会之前...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see your meaning. You're tying this to our history... but it is different. The symbol I destroy, it has already proven itself wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白你的意思了。你把这与我们的历史联系起来...但这是不同的。我摧毁的那个象征，已经证明了自己是错误的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really think these missiles can kill everyone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的认为这些导弹能杀死所有人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill them - no. The symbol they follow? Yes, as surely as you did at the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了他们 - 不。他们追随的象征？是的，就像你在大裂谷所做的一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The question reminded the ones you spoke to of their purpose, why they cared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个问题提醒了那些与你交谈的人他们的目的，他们为什么关心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spoke those words in anger, and I did not expect an answer. All was lost... I thought it was the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是在愤怒中说出这些话的，我并不期望得到回答。一切都完了... 我以为这就是结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Past their graves of failed technology, they had cared about the flag they had followed... and the people beneath it. Even with them dead and gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过去失败科技的坟墓，他们关心的是他们追随的旗帜...以及那旗帜下的人。即使他们已经死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's no answer in that. I do this because I care, because I believe it must be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这里没有答案。我这样做是因为我在乎，因为我相信必须这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were trapped, needed to escape, and needed the distraction. It was the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被困住了，需要逃跑，需要转移注意力。这是钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never sought to escape. I went to them to get an answer or die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未试图逃跑。我找他们是为了得到答案或者死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was all you could say to prevent from being killed. That's what I'm hoping for here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了不被杀，你只能这么说。这就是我现在希望的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I asked that question, death was certain. I wasn't begging for mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我问这个问题的时候，死亡就是必然的。我不是在乞求宽恕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When all seemed lost, you asked it even though you feared the answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当一切似乎都失去的时候，你问了，尽管你害怕答案。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've heard my words and that's all you've taken from them, then I was right to cast them aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你听了我的话并且这就是你所得到的全部，那么我把他们扔到一边是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever had any ability to hear anything beyond your own footsteps... the Divide silenced it. Now, its voice will end you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你曾经有能力听到自己脚步之外的任何声音...大裂谷使它沉默了。现在，它的声音将终结你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the logs of the White Legs, you mentioned your tribe, and its past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在白腿部落的那段日志里，你提到了你的部落，和它的过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My tribe? That log... no, it concerned the White Legs, training them to kill. For Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的部落？那个日志...不，那是关于白腿部落的，训练他们去杀戮。为了凯撒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no meaning there beyond the road to New Canaan. The history of the murder of its people. And Caesar's past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了通往新迦南的路那里没有任何意义。还有屠杀人民的历史，以及凯撒的过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Who are you, who do not know your history?"
ESP.TRADUIT: "你是谁，不知道你自己的历史吗？"

ESP.ORIGINAL: That question... either you walked the Big Empty... you found the last of the holotapes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个问题...要么你去过大空洞...你找到了最后的全息磁带。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The words are mine. Whatever... "answer" you think they hold, you're wrong. It was a question, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些话是我说的...无论如何...你认为他们有“答案”，那你就错了。这只是个问题，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let your words answer it, from the tapes you left along the road to the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会用你的话来回答这个问题，从你在通往大裂谷的路上留下的录音带里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My words? And what do my words teach you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的话？我的话又能教你什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: < Topic Storage: Player mentions holotapes at end. Do not translate. >

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still don't understand - why are you doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不明白，你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've answered your own question. And you'll die with that question on your lips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经回答了自己的问题。你会带着这个问题死去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe destroying the symbol is never the answer. Changing it - that's something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信摧毁象征永远不是解决问题的办法。改变它...那是另一回事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It may be... that as much destruction has been written in the earth here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧...这里的土地上已经写下了如此多的毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One buried this place, yet it lived on between us. One may build it again - build others. Your history has proven this, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某个人埋葬了这个地方，但它却存在于我们之间。某个人可能会重建它 - 建造其他的。你的历史已经证明了这一点，在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is truth in your words. But even if there is hope in change... it may not matter. The Divide still stands against us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的话有一定道理。但即使有改变的希望...可能也并不重要。大裂谷仍然站在我们的对立面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you meant to kill me, you should have done it long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想杀我，早就该动手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believed in what I followed then. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信我当时所遵循的。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. Now, our allegiances are reversed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。现在，我们的立场颠倒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Being Frumentarii kept you from killing me in the past. You have no such defense now.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]作为一个军团特务，你过去没有杀我。你现在没有这种防备了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not if you believe in what you follow. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你相信你所追随的就不会。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. The truth is, you serve nothing, believe nothing. Killing you... meaningless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。但事实是，不为任何人服务，什么都不相信。杀了你...没有意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to die knowing you're wrong, and that's what history will remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你死的时候知道自己错了，这才是历史会记住的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We fight over how we will be remembered, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们为如何被记住而战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No danger there. You skipped past where you build the community, moved onto killing one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里没有危险。你跳过了创建社区的阶段，转而去杀死一个社区。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing can prevent what comes. The missiles will launch. These questions - your words, or mine - what do they matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么能阻止即将到来的事了，导弹将会发射。这些问题- 你的话，或者我的话 -它们对你有什么重要的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even suggest we're equals. You couldn't have done this without me bringing you what you need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别暗示我们是平等的。如果没有我给你带来你需要的东西，你不可能做到的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were tricked. Still, you take pride in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你被骗了。不过，你还是以此为荣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then stop this, you can't truly believe what you're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就停下，你不可能真正相信你所做的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, just the fact we're talking should mean you don't want to do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们在谈这件事说明你不想这么做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. You are wrong. Words will not bridge this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你错了。言语无法弥合这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide survived in you. If it felt like something fighting for, you can rebuild it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷在你心中。如果你觉得需要为之奋斗，你可以重建它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing can prevent what comes. The missiles will launch. These questions - your words, or mine - what do they matter to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么能阻止即将到来的事了，导弹将会发射。这些问题- 你的话，或者我的话 -它们对你有什么重要的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you are is some echo of me, following my road, letting my history dictate yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是我的回声，走我的路，让我的历史决定你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moral ground? What I did by accident, you're doing with purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 道德基础？我无意中做的事，而你是有目的的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're planning to kill a nation from a distance, just like NCR - just like you accused me of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算从远处毁灭一个国家，就像NCR...就像你指控我做的那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I care for your perspective. You walk blindly, foolishly into death, your own and others.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎你的看法。你盲目、愚蠢地走向死亡，你自己和其他人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do not rule my actions, and do not mistake my acts for yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能支配我的行为，也不要把我的行为误认为你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If one Courier built a community, seems to me you can do the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一个邮差能建立一个社区，在我看来你也可以这样做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said a home is a place you breathe life into, a moment where you know who you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说家是一个能让你感受到生命的地方，一个让你知道自己是谁的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is truth in that. History has proven it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是有道理的。历史已经证明了这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Mojave's proof that no homeland is sacred... until the larger symbols are destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但莫哈维证明了没有一个家园是神圣的...直到更大的象征毁灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever is built, the Bear, Bull... even Vegas... will tear it apart, convert it, either with purpose, or by accident.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论建造什么，熊、公牛...甚至维加斯...会撕裂它，改变它，不管是有意的，还是无意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "You can go home again, Courier." Not a message for me, for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: "你可以再次回家了，邮差。" 不是给我的信息，是给你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My home in the East, Dry Wells, is no more. It is part of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在东部的家，枯井，已经不在了。它是军团的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only other home... the chance of a home... was what you built at the Divide. Then you destroyed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一的另一个家...一个家的机会...是你在大裂谷建造的。然后你毁了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing more to say, I've already won. Everything you hate about me, you've become.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好说的了，我已经赢了。你憎恨我的一切，都变成了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you seek to anger me, words won't be enough. Your moral ground is weak here in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: [Frowns]如果你想激怒我，言语是不够的。你在大裂谷的道德基础很薄弱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have anything beyond words to change your mind. If you won't listen, it's over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了言语，我没有什么可以改变你的想法。如果你不听，那就结束吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think that's what's important here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为这是最重要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Our history... the Divide. That history has been written, its lessons learned.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]我们的历史...大裂谷。历史已被书写，教训已被汲取。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is nothing more to be dug from these cracks in the earth, no more fury to be torn from its sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大地的裂缝中再也挖不出什么东西，天空中再也撕扯不出更多怒火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not talking about NCR or the Legion, I'm talking about our history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不是在谈论NCR或军团，我说的是我们的历史。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] If those are your last words, they are weak ones. Actions would have had more voice.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]如果这是你的遗言，那也太软弱了。行动会发出更多的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is nothing more to be said between us. No words of yours will change what is about to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之间没什么好说的了。无论你说什么都改变不了即将发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The symbol you wear is dead, and you helped kill it. The question is - what will you do to fix it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你所佩戴的象征已经死亡，而你帮助杀死了它。 问题是...你会做什么来修复它？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe the missiles can't be stopped. If you believe me, though, we might get through this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信导弹是无法停止的。 不过，如果你相信我，我们或许能度过这一关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we must survive to carry its message... then that is what shall be done. I will not let America die here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们必须活着去传递它的信息...那这就是应该做的。我不会让美国死在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... it may not matter. Even if we lay down our weapons, the Divide... it still stands against us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...这可能不重要。即使我们放下武器，大裂谷...仍在与我们对抗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You interrupted its journey West, trapped it. If any part of America survived, it's cut off now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打断了它的西行，困住了它。如果美国有任何地区幸存下来，现在也被隔绝了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The package I brought was from Navarro, the Divide scanned ED-E's logs from the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我带来的包裹来自纳瓦罗，大裂谷扫描了ED-E在莫哈维的日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you seek to gain by telling me this. If you think that the symbol I wear is a weakness...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉我这些是想寻求什么？如果你认为我佩戴的象征是一种弱点...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Eyebot was a courier, sent to the West, to make contact with the remnants of America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼球机器人是一名邮差，被派往西部，与美国的残余势力取得联系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Its logs tell of a place where America survived... may still exist. And it's falling apart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个日志讲述了一个美国幸存下来的地方...可能仍然存在。而它正在分崩离析。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lie. There was only one message in the machine, only one message in the package you brought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你撒谎。机器里只有一条信息，你带来的包裹里只有一条信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide bore the symbol of America... as did the package from Navarro. The origins of the machine is... of no importance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷承载着美利坚的象征...纳瓦罗寄来的包裹也是。这台机器的来源...并不重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It has history inside it. The logs of what's left of "America."
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面有历史，记录仅存的"美国 "的日志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is nothing inside the machine except the means to awaken the missiles in the Divide. That is its only message.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那台机器里除了唤醒大裂谷导弹的方法之外什么都没有。那是它唯一的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If my words won't change your mind, what about the messages in the Eyebot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的话无法改变你的想法，那眼球机器人里的信息呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The machine made from the parts of Navarro? It had only one message in its core - to get home, at any cost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用纳瓦罗的零件制造的机器？它的核心里只有一条讯息 - 回家，不计一切代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It echoes its master... and soon the missiles here will as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在回应它的主人...很快这里的导弹也会如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least I don't hide behind a machine like a coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少我不会像个懦夫一样躲在机器后面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Machines... bombs, things of NCR, are your tools, not mine. When we meet, this machine won't keep me from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器...炸弹，NCR的东西，是你的工具，不是我的。当我们见面时,这个机器不会拦在我们之间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep talking like that, I'll see you dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再这样说，我就看你怎么死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You already tried once, won't give you another chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经试过一次了，不会再给你第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like the idea of a woman in the Legion surprises you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来军团里有个女人让你很惊讶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said "brothers" before. So - you're Legion, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前说过"兄弟们"。所以...你也是军团的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned "casting off my disguise?" What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才说"卸下我的伪装？" 是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no traitor, and when I walk, I don't hide my presence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是叛徒，当我行走的时候，我从不隐藏自己的存在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion wears many colors, East and West. You... maybe blinded by Vegas's light, or the promise of that Chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团穿着许多颜色，从东部到西部。你...也许是被维加斯的光芒蒙蔽了双眼，或者是被筹码的承诺所蒙蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or maybe you walked so far West, the Bear's sickness crept into you. We'll see. Your offenses before Caesar, the least of the crimes here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者可能你向西走得太远，熊的病悄悄侵入了你的身体。我们拭目以待。你在凯撒面前犯下的罪，在这里是微不足道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] You said you'd sworn not to kill me. If you're Legion, why are we at odds?
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你说你曾发誓不会杀我。如果你是军团，为什么我们会有矛盾？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You struck first. Not just at me... at the Legion. Or so I thought. Not sure of the history of it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你先出手的。不只是对我...对军团。或者是我这么认为的。现在还不确定这段历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever flag you follow, or followed then... either way, you got too much of the Bear's sickness in you to live. Divide's proof of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你追随什么旗帜，或者当时追随的什么...不管哪种，你身上有太多熊的疾病，无法生存。大裂谷就是证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want more than that, walk the road. Answers'll come, closer you get to home... you and that machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要更多，那就上路吧。答案会来的，当你离家越近...你和那台机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Legion doesn't kill Legion. Caesar's orders?
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]军团不杀军团，凯撒的命令？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of world would this be if Courier killed Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果邮差杀了邮差，这将是一个怎样的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got enough distance ahead of you - save your breath for the road, don't waste it on words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你前面还有很长的路 - 把你的呼吸留给道路吧，不要浪费在言语上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Legion does not kill Legion - but you're not that anymore. I'm going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]军团不杀军团...但是你已经不属于他们了。我会干掉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's all that drives you, it won't last. The Legion... it won't last either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这就是你的全部动力，它不会持续太久。军团...也不会持久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] So... when you called me traitor in Hopeville, that title belongs to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]所以...当你在黎明镇叫我叛徒的时候，那个头衔是属于你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it is a title you earned. Legion or not, you have betrayed more than you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是你赢得的头衔。不管你是不是军团，你的背叛比你自己想象的要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Seeing this place. It meant more to you than the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]看看这个地方，对你来说比军团更重要吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. And it did to you once, I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。对你来说曾经也是，我确信这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] Are you angry that this explosion undermined the Legion's plans? It was an accident.
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]你因为这次爆炸破坏了军团的计划而生气吗？那是个意外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accident? Ignorance is a choice. The Chip - a choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 意外？无知是一种选择。芯片 - 也是一种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for anger... it is what I carry for the dead, and all that come here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于愤怒...这是我为死者和所有来到这里的人所背负的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Legion] If I destroyed the NCR in this place, why do you care?
ESP.TRADUIT: [军团]如果我在这个地方摧毁了NCR，你还在乎什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion died here as well. What you did... that's not all that cuts at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团也死在这。你所做的...并不是我身上所有的伤口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) NPC : ED-E [01004CDA] (mod) Quest : ([01004CDB]NVDLC04DialogueEDE) Lonesome Road ED-E Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this how it must end between us? You followed the East once, you can do so again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之间必须这样结束吗？ 你曾经追随过东方，你可以再来一次。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot go back. I wandered too far, far enough to know my home was lost to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我回不去了。我游荡得太远了，远到足以让我知道我已经失去了家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could no more go back than you could return to the West. To NCR, and all its sickness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再也回不去了，就像你再也回不去西部一样。回NCR，和它所有的病症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what happens to NCR, but I can't allow you to harm the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎NCR会怎么样，但我不能允许你伤害军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not all the East will burn. The Legion does not need to be destroyed, only... contained within new borders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是所有的东部都会被烧毁。军团不必被摧毁，只需要...被控制在新的边界内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After that, it will fall as any culture bred on war, on forward momentum. It will falter, collapse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之后，它会像任何在战争中孕育的文明一样，在前进的势头中衰落。它会衰落，崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will start with their camp at Dry Wells... once my homeland. Justice of a sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会从他们在枯井的营地开始...我曾经的家乡。勉强称得上正义吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion doesn't abide traitors. What made you turn from the East?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团不容忍叛徒，是什么让你从东方转向？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even after the road you've walked, you only see a traitor before you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你走过了这条路，你也只能看到一个叛徒在你前面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know one person can break a nation. Legion tests nations, strengthens them - let it do so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道一个人就能摧毁一个国家。军团考验国家，使他们强大...就让它这样吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm heading back to the Mojave to settle some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要回莫哈韦去处理一些事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can hear the weight in your feet - you’re bound for that Old World wall. Hoover Dam. Maybe not now - in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能听到你脚下的重量 - 你要前往那堵旧世界的墙，胡佛大坝。或许不是现在 - 迟早。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ulysses [01003E40] (mod) Quest : ([01003E44]NVDLC04DialogueUlysses) Ulysses' Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm heading back to the Mojave to settle some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要回莫哈韦去处理一些事情。
可选：传递尤利西斯的临终遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL: Script quest for ED-E's climactic sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E令人心酸的牺牲剧情脚本任务

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the console to gain access to Ashton Missile Silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 激活控制台以进入阿什顿导弹发射井。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reach Ashton Silo Control Station at the end of the High Road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到达正路末端的阿什顿导弹发射井控制站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Navigate Hopeville Missile Silo to reach the Lonesome Road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操纵黎明镇导弹发射井到达孤独之路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find something to break the encryption on the blast door terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找点东西来破解加密的防爆门终端

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use ED-E to break the encryption on the blast door terminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用ED-E破解加密的防爆门终端。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use ED-E to unlock the mainframe.
Find the security codes for the missile silo network.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到导弹发射井网络的安全码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Optional: Have ED-E access the Commissary for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可选：让ED-E为你破解自动贩卖终端。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turn the silo's power back on.
Activate the mainframe to unlock the silo's exterior doors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 激活主机解锁发射井的外部门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Track down Ulysses in his Temple.

ESP.TRADUIT: 可选：停用尤利西斯的眼球机器人。
可选：传达尤利西斯的临终遗言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get through the Cave of the Abaddon and continue to the Temple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过地狱洞穴然后前往神殿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way to the roof of the collapsed office building and reach the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往倒塌的办公大楼屋顶然后到达大裂谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the caves to bypass the collapsed building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用洞穴绕过倒塌的建筑物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the Ashton Missile Silo lift and head for the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 激活阿什顿导弹发射井电梯然后前往大裂谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Survive the elevator ride to Ashton Missile Silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在前往阿仕顿导弹发射井的电梯中存活下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape the Tunnelers' cave and reach the High Road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃离掘穴者的洞穴然后到达正路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make your way through the Lonesome Road to the collapsed overpass tunnel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过孤独之路前往坍塌的立交桥隧道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the Laser Detonator on the warhead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在弹头上使用激光起爆器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the Canyon Wreckage near Primm and enter the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往普瑞姆附近的峡谷残骸，进入大裂谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While ED-E is a companion, the player can detect enemies at an increased range. Additionally, enemies will appear on the player's compass and can be targeted in V.A.T.S. even when cloaked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当ED-E在队伍内,玩家能在更远的距离内探测到敌人。同时，敌人将显示在玩家的罗盘并且即使隐匿的敌人也能被V.A.T.S.锁定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E doesn't set off mines. Text translation not needed.

The Divide broke cities, flayed skin from bone and threatened to destroy the world, but you survived it - and stopped it. You can put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes, and you also gain reputation with the Followers of the Apocalypse and the Brotherhood of Steel for stopping another Armageddon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然大裂谷摧毁了数座城市，将尸体剥皮抽筋并且威胁说要摧毁世界，但你幸存了下来 - 并阻止了这一切。你可以为任一属性添加一点，同时由于你阻止了另一场世界末日而获得了天启追随者与兄弟会的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more will the NCR continue its aggressive campaign of Eastern expansion. You can put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes. You also gain reputation with Caesar's Legion for annihilating the NCR's homeland, but lose reputation with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR将终止其激进的东扩战略。你可以为你的任一属性添加一点。同时由于你瓦解了NCR的故土而获得了凯撒军团的声望，但你失去了NCR的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is the burden of the dead to remind the living of what they have lost... You can put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes, and you also gain reputation with the Boomers and the Powder Gangers for your... destructive tendencies, but you lose reputation with the NCR and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提醒生者他们失去了什么是死者的责任...你可以为你的任一属性添加一点，同时由于你的...破坏欲，你获得了炸药帮与大炮族的声望，但是你失去了NCR与凯撒军团的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sic semper tyrannis! You can put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes. You also gain reputation with the NCR for breaking the back of Caesar's Legion, but you lose reputation with Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: Sic semper tyrannis！(拉丁语：这就是暴君的下场) 你能为你的属性值添加1点。同时因为你瓦解了凯撒军团的后方阵地你获得了NCR的声望，但你失去了凯撒军团的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The warrens of The Divide have taught you to keep your head down. Your movement speed is greatly increased while sneaking in light armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 密集而狭窄的大裂谷已经教会了你保持低调。你穿着轻甲潜行时移动速度将大大提高。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wasteland has taught you some hard lessons, but you've remembered them all. You gain +1% to earned experience per level gained. (For example, +25% experience at level 25.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土数次给予你惨痛的教训，但你已经记住了这一切。每升一级你获取的经验增加1%(比如,当你25级的时候将+25%经验值。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any time you sleep, you remove all of your Rads in addition to regaining all of your Health. (In Hardcore Mode, you still don't regain Health, but you lose 100 Rads.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你睡觉的时候，除了恢复全部生命值，还会清除所有的辐射。 (在硬核模式下，你依然无法恢复生命，但你将消除100点辐射。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your senses have become so keen that you can feel the slightest vibration in the ground. You gain +1 Perception and Agility attributes while outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的感官变得如此敏锐，以至于你能感觉到地面上最轻微的震动。在室外时，你获得+1感知和敏捷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't just read books, you tear into them. Damaged books you pick up become blank magazines, which you can use to copy your existing skill magazines at a workbench (or convert blank magazines back to books).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不只是读书，你还会撕书。你捡起的损坏的书会变成空白杂志，你可以用它在工作台上复制你现有的技能杂志(或将空白杂志转换回书籍)。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've learned to keep your senses alert to any danger. When crouched and not moving you gain a +2 to your Perception attribute to help you find enemies before they find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经学会了对一切危险保持警惕。当你蹲下且不移动的时候你的感知+2，以便你在敌人发现你之前发现他们

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're more at home under the open stars than under a roof. Any time you sleep outside, you gain the benefits of being Well Rested, even if you don't own the bed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在星空下比在屋檐下更自在。任何时候你在外面睡觉，你都能得到良好的休息，即使你没有自己的床。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wastelander with the most gear wins! (... or at least survives.) You can now carry an additional 50 pounds of gear (stacks with Strong Back perk).
ESP.TRADUIT: 装备最多的废土客获胜！(...或者至少能活下来。) 你的负重上限增加50。(与善背perk叠加)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've had lots of close calls. Whenever you finish a fight with less than 25% Health, your Luck increases by +4 for 3 minutes. You are also immune to critical hits, and your own critical hits inflict +50% damage. (Requires Neutral Karma.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有许多死里逃生的经历，如果你在生命值低于25%的情况下结束战斗，在接下来的3分钟内你的幸运值+4。同时你将免疫暴击，并且你自己的暴击伤害+50%。(需要中等道德)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your storied past has fallen from memory 'cause everyone thought you died. Your Karma is reset, you inflict +10% damage, and for every 100 points of Karma, you gain 10 Health. You are also immune to critical hits. (Requires Good Karma.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的传奇故事已经随风而逝，因为人们都以为你已经死了。你的道德值将重置，你造成的伤害+10%，并且每100点道德值将转换成10点生命值，同时你将免疫暴击。(需要道德良好)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you were bad once, but you ain't like that now. Your Karma has been reset to 0, you regenerate AP 25% faster, and your attack speed is increased by 20%. You are also immune to critical hits. (Requires Bad Karma.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许你曾经是个坏人，但已经洗心革面了。你的道德值已经被重置为0，你的AP再生速度提高25%，并且你的攻击速度提高了20%，同时你将免疫暴击。(需要道德败坏)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're so sneaky that you can sneak even with your Pip-Boy light on! Any time the Pip-Boy light is on, you gain a sneak bonus to offset the light's sneak penalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真狡猾，现在就算你的哔哔小子开着灯你也能正常潜行了！如果哔哔小子的灯亮着，你将获得一个潜行奖励以抵消灯光造成的潜行惩罚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your knowledge of robotic components allows you to break them more easily and salvage their mechanical corpses. You have a +25% chance to score critical hits against robots, and you'll also find more useful components on robots you destroy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你积累了大量关于机器人结构的知识，现在你能更轻易破坏它们并重新回收它们身上的机械零件。你增加了25%对机器人的暴击率，并且在已摧毁的机器人身上将获得更多有用的组件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've faced torture at the hands of the Marked Men... now it's payback time. (+10% Damage Resistance and +10% Damage against the Marked Men)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经受够了烙印者的折磨...现在，是血债血偿的时候了。 (对烙印者增加10%的伤害抗性和10%的伤害)

ESP.ORIGINAL: You left ED-E behind in Ulysses' Temple - not that you needed the help anyways. As long as you have no companions, your attacks inflict +10% damage and you have +10% accuracy in VATS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将ED-E留在了尤利西斯的神殿，反正你也不需要什么帮助。只要你没有队友，你的攻击造成的伤害+10%并且在VATS模式下增加10%精准度。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Traveling with ED-E has given you a chance to bond with him, unlocking five ranks of potential bonuses. While ED-E is in your party, you both gain:
Rank 1 - Weapon Condition Bonus (daily 25% weapon condition repair dialogue option) Rank 2 - Energy Cell Manufacture (daily Energy or Microfusion Cell creation dialogue option) Rank 3 - Increased DT (+2 DT) Rank 4 - Damage Bonus (+5 beam weapon damage) Rank 5 - V.A.T.S. Attack Bonus (+5% V.A.T.S. targeting)
ESP.TRADUIT: 与ED-E一同旅行使得你们俩紧密团结在一起,解锁了5个等级的潜能.当ED-E在你的队伍里,你们俩同时获得 等级 1 - 武器耐久度奖励 (每日 25% 耐久度修理的对话选项) 等级 2 - 能量电池制造 (每日 能量或核聚变电池制造的对话选项 等级 3 - 增强DT (+2 DT 等级 4 - 伤害奖励 (+5 光束武器伤害 等级 5 - V.A.T.S.攻击奖励 (+5% V.A.T.S. 命中率)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Used to track Tunneler tunneling behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用这个跟踪掘穴者的行踪。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have found a Flash Bang grenade! Flash Bangs are special grenades that:
- Deal Fatigue damage. - Reduce enemy weapon skills. - Have a chance to Frenzy Tunnelers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了一个闪光弹！闪光弹是一种特殊的手雷： -造成疲劳伤害. -减少敌人的武器技能. -有一定几率使掘穴者疯狂

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the control station's lever to open the Ashton silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用控制站的控制杆打开阿什顿导弹发射井。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the controls' lever to restore power to the silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用控制杆恢复导弹发射井的电力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mainframe is locked down with a secure, military-grade encryption sequence. The codes you uploaded to ED-E's system should be able to unlock it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主机被军事级别的加密序列锁定了，你上传到ED-E的系统的代码应该能够解锁。
黎明镇导弹发射井主机

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask ED-E to unlock the mainframe.

You've found the Laser Detonator Ulysses spoke of, a piece of Pre-War tech that can detonate the nuclear warheads scattered around the Lonesome Road. You can use it to open new paths, kill your enemies from afar, or even discover secret loot caches. Just point it at a warhead, hold down the trigger, and watch the explosion.
If what Ulysses said is true, you'll need this to advance, which means there must be a warhead blocking the way forward. You'll need to find the correct warhead and detonate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了尤利西斯所提及的激光起爆器，这种战前的技术可以引爆散落在孤独之路上的核弹头。你可以用它来开辟新的通路，从远处杀死你的敌人，或甚至是发现秘密贮藏的战利品。仅需要把它对准弹头，按住扳机，就可以观赏爆炸了。倘若尤利西斯所述是真实的，你会需要这个来前进，这样意味着在前进的道路上一定会有弹头阻挡，你需要找到正确的探头并且引爆它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The coordinates you received lead you to this canyon filled with storm-tossed wreckage. Beyond lies the Divide.
Lonesome Road is intended for experienced Couriers (Level 25 or higher). You cannot take companions with you on the road ahead (nor bring any you find out with you). You can carry whatever equipment and gear you have with you without restriction, however.
If the journey proves too difficult, or you need to resupply, you can retrace your steps and return to the Mojave at any time. If you are prepared, then continue on into the storms of the Divide... history awaits.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你收到的坐标将你引向这个充满风暴残骸的峡谷，在那之后就是大裂谷。
孤独之路是为有经验的邮差（25级或以上）准备的。你不能带着同伴走前面的路（也不能带着你发现的任何同伴）。不过，你可以不受限制地携带你的任何设备和装备。
如果旅途被证明太困难，或者你需要补给，你可以随时沿着原路返回莫哈维。如果你准备好了，那就继续前进，进入大裂谷的风暴中......历史在等待者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You cannot sleep while in combat.
The bright light drives the tunneler into a frenzy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 明亮的光线使掘穴者陷入疯狂！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This lever can't be activated yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这根控制杆还不能被激活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This terminal has already been used.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个终端已经被使用过了。
已经使用了蛇毒止血带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E has unlocked a commissary for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E已经为你解锁了一个自动供应终端！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just got your first Blank Magazine! Any time you pick up a damaged book it will be turned into one of these from now on. They're worth more than regular books and you can use them to make Skill Magazines! Any Skill Magazine you have on you can be copied using a blank one at a Workbench. There's even a recipe to turn it back into a book if you want!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚刚拿到了一本空白杂志！从现在起，任何时候你拿到一本损坏的书都会变成空白杂志。它们比普通书籍更有价值，你可以用它们来制作任何技能杂志！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't swim any farther in this direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能朝这个方向再游了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rushing Water has increased your attack speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 激流提高了你的攻击速度。
自动注射超级治疗针已使用。
自动注射治疗针已使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Roughin' It! Bedroll Kit allows you to sleep just about anywhere out under the stars. Select it in your Pip-Boy and sleep your cares away!
ESP.TRADUIT: 苦行！铺盖卷套装可以让你在星空下的任何地方睡觉。在你的哔哔小子中选择它，睡去你的烦恼！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, campers! The Roughin' It! Bedroll Kit is only approved for the great outdoors, so step outside and give 'er a try there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，露营者！苦行！铺盖卷套装只适用于户外，所以走出去试试吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, campers, lights out! (Close the Pip-Boy to start sleeping.)
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，露营者，关灯！（关闭哔哔小子开始睡觉）

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Auto-Doc is capable of performing a thorough physical exam and curing the patient of all common ailments - radiation sickness, lacerations, broken bones, even chemical addictions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这台自动医生能够进行彻底的身体检查并且治疗患者的所有常见疾病——辐射病,撕裂伤,断肢,甚至是药物上瘾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This claw is larger and more impressive than those of lesser Deathclaws. You might be able to turn it into a weapon if you find a workbench.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只爪子比那些较小的死亡爪的爪子更大，更令人印象深刻。如果你找到工作台，可以把它变成一把武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you ascend this elevator, you cannot return until you end this. If you have anything else you want to do before going ahead, take care of it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你上了电梯，在结束之前你不能回来。如果你在继续之前还有其他事情要做，现在就去做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Camarader-E Perk (Rank 5), increasing your accuracy in V.A.T.S. as long as ED-E is your companion. ED-E also gains an accuracy boost while he is your companion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经获得了E同志的Perk（等级5），只要ED-E是你的同伴，就会增加你在V.A.T.S中的精准度。在ED-E作为你同伴的时候,它也获得了精准度修正。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Camarader-E Perk (Rank 4), increasing your damage with beam weapons by +5. ED-E also gains +5 damage while he is your companion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经获得了E同志的Perk（等级4），你的能量武器伤害增加了5，ED-E在身为你同伴时也获得+5点伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Camarader-E Perk (Rank 3), giving you and ED-E both +2 DT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经获得了E同志的Perk（等级3），给你和ED-E增加了2点DT。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Marked Perk.
This door is locked, and needs electricity before opening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这扇门是锁着的，需要通电才能打开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You left ED-E behind in Ulysses' Temple - not that you needed the help anyway. As long as you have no companions, your attacks inflict +10 percent damage and you have +10 percent accuracy in VATS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将ED-E留在了尤利西斯的神殿，反正你也不需要什么援助。只要你没有同伴，你的攻击造成的伤害+10%并且提高VATS模式下10%的精准度。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like the missile hit somewhere on the other side of the Divide. You think you could reach the location of the blast from Hopeville... that is, if you feel brave enough to explore ground zero of a nuclear blast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来导弹命中了大裂谷另外一边的某个地方。你认为你可以抵达黎明镇爆炸的位置吗...也就是说，如果你有足够的勇气就去探索核爆炸的原爆点吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Divide broke cities, flayed skin from bone and threatened to destroy the world, but you survived it - and stopped it. You can put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes. You also gain reputation with the Followers of the Apocalypse and the Brotherhood of Steel for stopping another Armageddon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大裂谷摧毁了城市，剥皮剔骨，威胁着要毁灭世界。但你幸存了下来，并且阻止了这场灾难。通过这次磨练，你可以在你的S.P.E.C.I.A.L能力值上加上一点，而你也提高了在天启追随者和钢铁兄弟会中的威望。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your merciless nuclear assault on the nations of the Mojave has devastated the lands of both the Legion and the NCR and reached even the borders of the Mojave. At the Mojave Outpost, you can now travel through the western gate to Long 15, the site of a devastated NCR outpost. At Cottonwood Cove, you can now take a journey by river to Dry Wells, the site of a devastated Legion encampment. Be prepared - both areas are highly irradiated and infested with feral ghouls.
You have also unlocked the Dead Man's Burden Perk, allowing you to put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes. You also gain reputation with the Boomers and the Powder Gangers for your... destructive tendencies, but you lose reputation with the NCR and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你对莫哈韦国家的无情核攻击已经破坏了军团和NCR的土地，甚至波及了莫哈维的边界，在莫哈维前哨，你现在可以通过西边的大门前往15号公路，一个被毁灭的NCR前哨基地。在棉白杨湾，你现在可以通过河流前往枯井，一个被毁灭的军团营地。请做好准备，这两个区域都受到高度辐射，并且有大批野蛮的食尸鬼出没。
你已解锁了“逝者的重负”Perk，允许你在任意S.P.E.C.I.A.L属性上加一点。因为你的...毁灭性倾向，你也获得了大炮族与炸药帮的声望，但是你失去了NCR与凯撒军团的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your merciless nuclear assault on the NCR has devastated the lands of California and reached even the borders of the Mojave. At the Mojave Outpost, you can now travel through the western gate to Long 15, the site of a devastated NCR outpost. Be prepared - the area is highly irradiated and infested with former NCR ghouls.
You have also unlocked the Bear-Slayer Perk, allowing you to put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes. You also gain reputation with Caesar's Legion for annihilating the NCR's homeland, but lose reputation with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你对NCR无情的核攻击已经摧毁了加州的土地，甚至波及了莫哈韦的边界。在莫哈维前哨，你现在可以通过西边的大门前往15号公路，一个被毁灭的NCR前哨基地。准请做好准备，这个区域受到高度辐射，并且有大批野蛮的食尸鬼出没。
你已解锁了“屠熊者”Perk，允许你在任意S.P.E.C.I.A.L属性上加一点。由于毁灭了NCR的家园，你也获得了凯撒军团的声望，但是失去了NCR的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your merciless nuclear assault on Caesar's Legion has devastated the lands east of the Colorado and reached even the borders of the Mojave. At Cottonwood Cove, you can now take a journey by river to the site of Dry wells, a devastated Legion encampment. Be prepared - the area is highly irradiated and infested with Legion ghouls.
You have also unlocked the Scourge of the East Perk, allowing you to put a single point into any of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes. You also gain reputation with the NCR for breaking the back of Caesar's Legion, but you lose reputation with Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你对凯撒军团无情的核攻击摧毁了科罗拉多河以东的土地，甚至波及了莫哈韦沙漠的边界。在棉白杨湾，你现在可以通过河流前往枯井，一个被毁灭的军团营地。请做好准备，这个区域受到高度辐射，并且有大批野蛮的食尸鬼出没。
你已解锁了“东方之灾”Perk，允许你在任意S.P.E.C.I.A.L属性上加一点。因为摧毁了凯撒军团的后方，你也获得了NCR的声望，但是你失去了凯撒军团的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's Just Lucky You're Alive! (+4 Luck for 3 minutes)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还活着真是太幸运了！(增加4点幸运，持续3分钟)

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You found a module on this broken Eyebot that can upgrade ED-E. Installing this module grants you the first rank of the Camarader-E Perk, allowing ED-E to repair your currently-equipped weapon once per day.
This perk is accessed through ED-E's dialogue.
If you find more upgrade modules, you can unlock further ranks of this Perk. When you return to the Mojave, these upgrades will carry over to the original ED-E as well.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你在这个坏掉的眼机器人上找到了一个可以升级ED-E的模块。安装此模块将授予你“E同志”的Perk，允许ED-E每天修理您当前装备的武器一次。
这个Perk可以通过ED-E的对话获得。
如果你找到更多的升级模块，你可以解锁这个Perk的进一步升级。当你回到莫哈韦时，这些升级也会延续到最初的ED-E上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Camarader-E Perk (Rank 2), allowing ED-E to manufacture Small Energy Cells or Microfusion Cells once per day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你获得了“E同志”Perk(等级2)，允许ED-E每天制造一次小型能源电池或核融合电池。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will launch Ulysses' missiles against targets in the heartland of the NCR and the lands held by Caesar's Legion, raining nuclear fire down on both factions. Are you sure you want to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将会发射尤利西斯的导弹到NCR的核心领土与凯撒军团的所控制的地区上，向两派发射核弹。你确定要继续吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like Ulysses left you one last package...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来尤利西斯给你留下了最后一个包裹...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the United States Armed Services Joint Automated Commissary and Repair Station! Please input your selection below.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到美国三军联合自动化供应和维修站！请在下方输入您的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This terminal can only be unlocked by an Eyebot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个终端只能由眼球机器人解锁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have ED-E unlock the terminal for you.
With its beam triggered, this emitter is no longer functional.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光束被触发之后，发射极就不起作用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You can disable this emitter (and the beam originating at this emitter) if you have sufficient skill with electronics.
(Repair of 90 or greater required.)
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果你有足够的电子技术，你可以禁用这个发射极(以及从这个发射极发出的波束)。
(需要修理90或更高)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyebot has successfully shut down, reconfigure the Eyebot's targeting systems? (Science 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼球机器人已成功关闭，重新配置眼球机器人的定位系统吗？ （需要100科学）
重新配置眼球机器人定位系统

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyebot has successfully shut down, reconfigure the Eyebot's targeting systems? (Science 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼球机器人已成功关闭，重新配置眼球机器人的定位系统吗？ （需要100科学）
重新配置眼球机器人定位系统

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enemy cannot be bled! No takedown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人不能放血！无法拌摔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enemy takedown! Let's Dance attack hit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人干掉了！我们的游击战术成功。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player not sneaking! Let's Dance attack failed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玩家不能潜行！我们的游击战术失败。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will launch Ulysses' missiles against targets in the lands east of the Colorado controlled by Caesar's Legion, raining nuclear fire down on its cities and its tribes. Are you sure you want to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将发射尤利西斯导弹攻击位于科罗拉多以东的凯撒军团控制地区的目标，向其城市和部落发射核弹。你确定你想要继续吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will launch Ulysses' missiles against targets in the heartland of the NCR, raining nuclear fire down on its cities and its people. Are you sure you want to continue?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这将发射尤利西斯导弹打击NCR中心地带的目标，向其城市和人民发射核弹。你确定你想要继续吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The abort code is encrypted with an incredibly advanced Pre-War military encryption sequence. You'd have to be a code-breaking robot to crack it in time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中止代码是用战前非常先进的军事加密序列加密的，你得是个破译密码的机器人才能及时破解它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This terminal is already engaged in its countdown sequence and the abort code has been overridden. You might be able to change the missiles' target, or accelerate the countdown and launch the missiles immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此终端已进入倒计时序列，中止代码已被覆盖。你可以改变导弹的目标，或者加速倒计时，立即发射导弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Redirect the missiles to target both the NCR and Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调整导弹方向，瞄准NCR和凯撒军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Redirect the missiles to target Caesar's territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调整导弹方向，瞄准凯撒的领土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accelerate the countdown and launch the missiles at the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加速倒计时，向NCR发射导弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyebot has successfully shut down, reconfigure the Eyebot's targeting systems? (Repair 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼球机器人已成功关闭，重新配置它的定位系统吗？ （需要100修理）
重新配置眼球机器人定位系统

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send the Eyebot a shutdown command. (Science 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 向眼球机器人发送关闭指令。 (需要100科学)
发送眼球机器人的关闭指令
断开眼球机器人电源（修理）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disconnect the Eyebot from it's power source. (Repair 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 断开眼球机器人的电源。 （需要100修理）
发送眼球机器人关闭指令（科学）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Eyebot Control Station
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到眼球机器人控制站
断开眼球机器人电源（修理）
发送眼球机器人关闭指令（科学）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyebot has successfully shut down, reconfigure the Eyebot's targeting systems? (Repair 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼球机器人已成功关闭，重新配置它的定位系统吗？ （需要100修理）
重新配置眼球机器人定位系统

ESP.ORIGINAL: Send the Eyebot a shutdown command. (Science 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 向眼球机器人发送关闭指令。 (需要100科学)
发送眼球机器人的关闭指令
断开眼球机器人电源（修理）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disconnect the Eyebot from it's power source. (Repair 100 required)
ESP.TRADUIT: 断开眼球机器人的电源。 （需要100修理）
发送眼球机器人关闭指令（科学）

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E has unlocked a terminal for you!
This terminal can only be accessed by an Eyebot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个终端只能由眼球机器人访问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have ED-E unlock the terminal for you.
ED-E has restored power to the silo's access controls.
ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E已恢复了导弹发射井的访问控制。
ED-E连上了导弹发射井的主机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is an intact nuclear warhead. If what Ulysses said is true, the Laser Detonator in Hopeville should be able to trigger these to explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一枚完整的核弹头，如果尤利西斯说的是真的，黎明镇的激光起爆器应该能引爆这些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Eyebot Control Station
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎光临眼球机器人控制站
断开眼球机器人电源（修理）
发送眼球机器人关闭指令（科学）

ESP.ORIGINAL: ED-E has used the security codes to unlock the mainframe.

ESP.TRADUIT: ED-E连上了导弹发射井的主机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've already opened the bunker door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经打开了地堡的门。
黎明镇导弹发射井主机

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You can now access the silo's mainframe.
What would you like to do?
ESP.TRADUIT:
你现在可以访问发射井的主机了。
你想做什么?
黎明镇导弹发射井主机
打开导弹发射井碉堡的大门

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mainframe is locked down with a secure, military-grade encryption sequence. You'll need to find the security codes and upload them to ED-E to gain access to the mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主机被安全的，军用级别的加密程序锁定了。你得找到安全密码上传到ED-E系统才能进入主机。
黎明镇导弹发射井主机

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mainframe is locked down with a secure, military-grade encryption sequence. You'll need to find the security codes and upload them to ED-E to gain access to the mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主机被安全的，军用级别的加密程序锁定了。你得找到安全密码上传到ED-E系统才能进入主机。
黎明镇导弹发射井主机

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This terminal is damaged.
You may be able to fix it. [50 Repair]
What would you like to do?
ESP.TRADUIT:
终端损坏。
你也许可以修复它。[50修理]
你想做什么?
黎明镇导弹发射井哨塔安全终端

ESP.ORIGINAL: This silo is in lockdown mode in preparation for launch. No entry or exit is permitted until the launch sequence is completed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发射井已进入锁定状态准备发射。在发射程序完成之前，不允许进入或退出。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no response from the elevator.
Ulysses has seized control of ED-E. You have lost ED-E as a companion, and everything he was carrying has been transferred to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤利西斯已经控制了ED-E。你失去了ED-E这个同伴，他携带的所有东西都转移给了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This console controls access to the silo itself, but it is encrypted beyond your ability to hack. You will need to find something that can break the encryption in order to proceed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个控制台控制着导弹发射井本身的访问，但它是加密的，超出了你的破解能力。你需要找到能破解加密的方法才能继续。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This snowglobe has been added to the collection at the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个雪花球已经被添加到幸运38的收藏中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You cannot bring others with you into the Divide. This road is one you must walk alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能带着其他人一起进入大裂谷，这条路你必须一个人走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lonesome Road has been loaded. Your level cap has been increased by 5.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孤独之路已加载，你的等级上限已经增加了5级

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Pip-Boy has received a signal - coordinates that lead to the Canyon Wreckage west of Primm. Following the coordinates are the words "Courier Six." It's signed, "Ulysses."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的哔哔小子收到一个讯号——坐标指向普瑞姆镇以西的峡谷残骸。坐标后面写着“六号邮差”，署名是“尤利西斯”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Increases maximum condition of the weapon.

ESP.TRADUIT: 转化 空白杂志-书籍

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find all of the RALPHIE the Robot posters in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大裂谷找到所有“机器人拉尔菲”的海报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Detonated all of the warheads in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 引爆大裂谷里的所有核弹头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Acquired all upgrades for the Divide's signature weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到红色眩光火箭筒的所有改装配件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dared to venture into the Courier's Mile.
Discovered all the locations in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发现了大裂谷的所有地点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Launched the nuclear missile from the Ashton silo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从阿什顿发射井发射了核导弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find all of ED-E's upgrades in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在大裂谷找到所有ED-E的升级硬件。
探索所有尤利西斯的过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncovered all 6 references to the past of Courier 6... your past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到了关于6号邮差过去的6个线索...你自己的过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Found all journal entries in the Divide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到了大裂谷的所有日志记录。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take Lift to The High Road

ESP.TRADUIT: 阿什顿导弹发射井电梯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate Lift to Ashton Missile Silo
ESP.TRADUIT: 激活电梯到艾什顿导弹发射井
恢复黎明镇发射井的电力
黎明镇导弹基地 - 西部入口
黎明镇导弹基地 - 东部入口
黎明镇导弹基地指挥部
黎明镇导弹基地 - 装载站

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take Lift to Ashton Missile Silo
ESP.TRADUIT: 乘电梯到阿什顿导弹发射井
黎明镇发射井地堡入口
前往黎明镇导弹发射井
